# Keberlanjutan Tema Theme Continuity

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/4c4340ea31bba68032ef8d4ab775765c3cc52cb22e980047a16a4af6740b2f4f.jpg)

2018

# Terang untuk Negeri

Light for Nation

Pada tahun 2018, Perseroan, melalui PT DSSP Power Mas Utama, fokus dalam menyelesaikan pembangunan proyek IPP PLTU Kendari-3 dan IPP PLTU Kalteng-1.

Melalui kedua proyek ini, Perseroan berharap dapat memberikan terang untuk negeri danBERKONTRIBusi dalam menciptakan masaapan yang lebih baik bagi masarakat.

In 2018, the Company, through PT DSSP Power Mas Utama, focused on completing the construction of IPP PLTU Kendari-3 and IPP PLTU Kalteng-1 projects.

Through these two projects, the Company hoped to provide light for the nation and contribute to creating a better future for the community.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/8d6c0eb03637d392ed08cbe03a60671a1fed36f0396d7351fae060421550cefb.jpg)

2020

# Menggapai Masa Depan yang Berkelanjutan

Embracing a Sustainable Future

Pada bulan November 2020, Perseroan berhasil merampungan pembangunan IPP PLTU Kalteng-1.

Dengan Berkembangnya peluang bisnis EBT sejalan dengan semakin gencarnya kampanye penggunaan energi bersih di seluruh dunia, Perseroan mengambil kebikan strategis untuk mengalihkan  $75\%$  saham PT DSSP Power Mas Utama. Strategi ini diharapkan dapat mendukung upaya Perseroan dalam merealisasikan rencana ekspansilanjutan Perseroan.

Perseroan menetakapan arah strategi bisnis untuk makukuan penjakanan peluang bisnis Barang yang dapat memberikan nilai tambah jangka panjang bagi Perseroan, termasuk mengembangkan bisnis EBT dan bisnisologi.

In November 2020, the Company completed the construction of the IPP PLTU Kalteng-1.

With the growing opportunities of the NRE business in line with the increasingly intensive campaigns for the use of clean energy around the world, the Company took a strategic policy to transfer  $75\%$  of PT DSSP Power Mas Utama's shares. This strategy was expected to support the Company's efforts in realizing future expansion plans.

The Company has set the direction of its business strategy to explore new business opportunities that can provide long-term added value for the Company, including developing NRE businesses and technology businesses.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/37f909e6922945b6abe2b2be0f4f486d4c71db507586d0638873aadf59519812.jpg)

2019

# Menuju Pertumbuhan Berkelanjutan

Towards the Sustainable Growth

Pada bulan Oktober 2019, IPP PLTU Kendari-3 beroperasi secara komersial. Sementara itu, pembangunan IPP PLTU Kalteng-1 mencapai的前提下 penyelesaian.

Perseroan berharap keda IPP PLTU ini dapat mendukung peningkatan kinerja berkelanjutan Perseroan di tahun-tahun-mendatang.

In October 2019, IPP PLTU Kendari-3 started its commercial operation. Meanwhile, the construction of IPP PLTU Kalteng-1 reached the completion stage.

The Company expected that the two IPP PLTUs could support the improvement of the Company's sustainable performance in the coming years.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/98326d1098fb4896e1e9aa82f0d13f3905153ee789983f1d874f90d90d954c77.jpg)

2021

# Melangkah menuju Dunia Ekonomi Baru

Stepping Forward to the World of New Economy

Pada tahun 2021, Perseroan memantapkan arah strategi bisnis untuk melangkah menuju Dunia Ekonomi Baru.

Sejalan dengan rencana pemerintah untuk mencapai netralitas karbon pada tahun 2060, Perseroan mendirikan PT Daya Mas Geopatra Energi, entitas anak, untuk mulai menjajaki peluang bisnis tenagaapanas bumi.

Sementara itu, sejalan dengan tren digitalisasi, Perseroan berperan aktif dalam melakukan pengembangan prasarana infrastruktur teknoologi yang terintegrasi dan berkualitas tinggi dan melakukan investasi pada perusahaanrintisan di bidang teknoologi, mengembangan inovasi digital, serta terus memaksimalkan kerjasama untuk mendorong pengembangan ekonomi digital.

In 2021, the Company solidified the direction of its business strategy to move toward the New Economic World.

In line with the government's plan to achieve carbon neutrality by 2060, the Company has established PT Daya Mas Geopatra Energi, a subsidiary, to start exploring opportunities in the geothermal power business.

Meanwhile, in line with digitalization trends, the Company plays an active role in developing integrated and high-quality technological infrastructure and invests in start-ups in technology, develops digital innovations, and continues to maximize cooperation to encourage the development of the digital economy.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/5c05073207c29851c2d574f40000590ebbde6010266ea50750f41a3cbf0bf1f4.jpg)

# 2022

# Mengukir Masa Depan melalui Transisi Energi dan Transformasi Digital

Crafting the future through Energy Transition and Digital Transformation

Pada tahun 2022, Perseroan aktif dalam makukuan kegiatan eksplorasi di bisnis energi panas bumi dan melaksanan serangkaian investasi dan kerjasama di bisnis technologi.

Langkah ini menjadi komitmen Perseroan dalam makukuan transisi energia dan transformasi digital yang dapat memberikan kontribusi nyata bagi kemujuan negeri.

In 2022, the Company was active in carrying out exploration activities in the geothermal business and carrying out a series of investments and collaborations in the technology business.

These steps show the Company's commitment to carrying out an energy transition and digital transformation that can make a real contribution to the progress of the country.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/e6b7ef63571e3c1fa757506cdea21d81d0a5019e4f4670d8f928e8f201b9d050.jpg)

# 2023

# Mengembangkan Potensi Energi dan Teknologi untuk Masa Depan yang Lebih Baik

Developing Energy and Technology Potentials for a Better Future

Pada tahun 2023, Perseroan makukan restrukturasi internal berupa pererimaan saham GEMS dan pengalihan saham Golden Energy and Resources Limited. Dengan rampungnya restrukturasi internal, Perseroan berfokus dalam makukan pengembangan usaha di Indonesia.

Perseroan terus berupaya mencgali potensi dalam negeri dan aktif dalam menjaki peluang usaha Barang di bisnis EBT dan tekologi.

In 2023, the Company carried out internal restructuring in the form of receiving GEMS shares and transferring shares of Golden Energy and Resources Limited. With the completion of internal restructuring, the Company focused on developing its business in Indonesia.

The Company seeks to explore domestic potential and is active in exploring new business opportunities in the NRE and technology businesses.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/09e07ec694a81ed10f498f0ba9e997bbfdbbc9491042eee84ad19cecc601c0bb.jpg)

# 2024

# Inovasi Menuju Pertumbuhan yang Berkelanjutan

Innovation Towards Sustainable Growth

Pada tahun 2024, Perseroan memperkuat komitmen terhadap praktik bisnis berkelanjutan yang dapat menciptakan nilai keberlanjutan jangka panjang yang ramah lingkungan dan bertanggung jawab.

Salah situ langkah yang diambil adalah dengan berperan aktif dalam mempercepat pengembangan bisnis EBT dan tekologi.

In 2024, the Company strengthened its commitment to sustainable business practices that can create long-term environmentally friendly and responsible sustainability value.

One of the steps taken is to actively participate in accelerating the development of NRE business and technology.

# Ikhtisar Perdagangan Saham

# Share Trading Highlight

Perseroan seksukan pembelian kembali saham sebanyak 154.105.327 saham pada tahun 2023, seksukan pemecahan saham dengan rasio 1:10, dan mengalihkan sebanyak 24.815.000 saham telah pembelian kembali saham pada tahun 2024.

Sehubungan dengan pemecahan saham dan pengalihan saham telah pembelian kembali saham, jumlah saham beredar Perseroan per 31 Desember 2024 menjadi sebanyak 6.189.284.930 saham dengan nilai nominal sebesar Rp25/saham (semula 770.552.320 saham kepada 616.446.993 saham setelah dilaksanakanya pembelian kembali saham, masing-masing dengan nilai nominal sebesar Rp250/saham). Dengan tidak penutupan saham sebesar Rp37.000/ saham pada 31 Desember 2024, nilai kapitalisasi相对较 esah saham Perseroan adalah Rp229.003.542.410.000 untuk setara dengan USD 14.854.926.207 pada kurs Rp16.162/USD.

Sejak penawaran umum perdana tanggal 10 Desember 2009 tingga 31Desember 2024, Perseroantidakmelakukanaksiikorporasiberupa penggabungan saham, pembagian dividen saham, pembagian saham bonus, dan/atau penerbitan obligasi/sukuk konversi.

The Company bought back 154,105,327 shares in 2023, conducted a stock split with a ratio of 1:10, and transferred 24,815,000 shares resulting from the share buyback in 2024.

In connection with the stock split and transfer of shares resulting from the share buyback, the number of outstanding shares of the Company as of December 31, 2024, was 6,189,284,930 shares with a nominal value of Rp25/share (formerly 770,552,320 shares or 616,446,993 shares after the share buyback, each with a nominal value of Rp250/share). With a closing price of Rp37,000/ share on December 31, 2024, the market capitalization of the Company's shares was Rp229,003,542,410,000 or equivalent to USD 14,854,926,207 at the exchange rate of Rp16,162/USD.

From the initial public offering on December 10, 2009, until December 31, 2024, the Company did not carry out corporate actions related to reverse stock, share dividend distribution, bonus share distribution, and/or convertible bond/sukuk.

# 2. LAPORAN MANAJEMEN MANAGEMENT REPORT

# Laporan Dewan Komisaris  
Report by the Board of Commissioners

Salam sejaptera kepada para pemegang saham dan pemangku keltingan lainnya, Greetings to the shareholders and other stakeholders,

Tantangan dalam perekonoman global tetap menjadi faktor utama yang memengaru stabilitas ekonomi dunia sepanjang tahun 2024. Dampak dari kondisi ini terlihat pada rendahnya tingkat pertumbuhan ekonomi secara global, Seeingga proyeksi perekonoman dunia diperkirakan akan tetap stabil namun berada pada tingkat pertumbuhan yang rendah.

Sementara itu, pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia pada tahun 2024 melanjutkan tren pertumbuhan yang stabil di kisaran  $5.03\%$ . Tingkat inflasi yang tetap rendah dan terkendali pada level  $1.57\%$ , mencerminkan kebikan moneter yang efektif dalam menjaga daya beli masyarakat. Nilai tukar Rupiah juga menunjukkan ketahanan terhadap dinamika global yang memengaruh相对较 valuta asing dan berhasil ditup pada level Rp16.162/USD pada akhir bulan Desember 2024.

Di tengah dinamika dan tantangan yang dihadapi di tahun 2024, Dewan Komisaris menjadi Perseroan tetap mampu mencatatkan kinerja keuang dan operasional yang baik.

Laporan ini disusun menjadi pentuk pertanggungjawaban Dewan Komisaris dalam merespont tantangan yang dihadapi oleh Perseroan serta dalam mengambil kebijakan strategis yang mendukung pencapaian kinerja operasional dan keuangan menuju kesuksesan yang berkelanjutan. Laporan ini juga merupakan telah keluut evaluasi Dewan Komisaris terhadap kinerja Direksi dalam mengelola perusahaan dan pandangan mengenai pengerapan governansi korporat di dalam perusahaan.

# Pencapaian Perseroan dan Penilaian Dewan Komisaris terhadap Kinerja Direksi

Dengan penuh kerendahan hati, Dewan Komisaris memanjatkan puji syukur kepada Tuhan Yang Maha Esa atas segala rahmat dan karunia-Nya atas setiap langkah perjalanan Perseroan. Setiap pencapaian dan pelajaran yang telah dipetik sepanjang tahun ini merupakan buah dari dedikasi dan upaya bersama, yang menjadi pengalamanan berharga bagi Perseroan.

Dewan Komisaris memahami sepenuhnya telah tahun 2024 adalah tahun yang PENH dengan dinamika dan tantangan bagi Perseroan. Dewan Komisaris memahami kompleksitas dan hambatan, baik dari faktor eksternal yang memengaruh pasar global maupun kondisi ekonomi domestik yang PENH ketidakpASTian, yang dihadapi oleh Direksi dalam menjalankan tugasnya, sehingga pada tahun 2024, Perseroan mencukutan pendapatan usaha sebesar USD 3.017,8 juta (-39,8% y-o-y) dan LABA Tahun berjalan sebesar USD 542,8 juta (-37,3% y-o-y). [GRI 2-12-b] [GRI 2-12-c]

Global economic challenges continued to be a key factor affecting worldwide economic stability throughout 2024. These conditions have significantly contributed to the low level of global economic growth, leading to projections that, while the global economy is expected to remain stable, it will do so at a low growth rate.

Meanwhile, Indonesia's economic growth in 2024 continues the stable growth trend at around  $5.03\%$ . The inflation rate, which remains low and controlled at the level of  $1.57\%$ , reflects effective monetary policies in maintaining the purchasing power of the public. The Rupiah exchange rate also showed resilience against global dynamics affecting the foreign exchange market and successfully closed at the level of Rp16,162/USD at the end of December 2024.

Amid the dynamics and challenges faced in 2024, the Board of Commissioners assesses that the Company remains capable of recording good financial and operational performance.

This report is prepared as a form of accountability of the Board of Commissioners in responding to the challenges faced by the Company and in making strategic policies that support the achievement of operational and financial performance towards sustainable success. This report also serves as one form of evaluation by the Board of Commissioners on the performance of the Board of Directors in managing the company and their views on the implementation of corporate governance within the company.

# Achievement of the Company and Assessment of the Board of Commissioners on the Performance of the Board of Directors

With utmost humility, the Board of Commissioners expresses thanks to God Almighty for all His grace and mercy at every step of the Company's journey. Every achievement and lesson learned throughout this year is the fruit of dedication and collective effort, which has become a valuable experience for the Company.

The Board of Commissioners fully understands that 2024 is a year full of dynamics and challenges for the Company. The Board of Commissioners understands the complexities and obstacles, both from external factors affecting the global market and the domestic economic conditions full of uncertainty, faced by the Board of Directors in carrying out their duties, so that in 2024 the Company recorded revenues of USD 3,017.8 million  $(-39.8\% y - o - y)$  and profit

for the year of USD 542.8 million (-37.3% y-o-y). [GRI 2-12-b] [GRI 2-12-c]

Dewan Komisaris mengresiasi Direksi dan seluruh kanyakan Perseroan atas kerja keras, dedikasi, komitmen, dan kepermimpinan Direksi dalam mengemban tugas dan tanggung jawab pengelolaan perusahaan, seesingga kegiatan operasional Perseroan dan entitas anak dapat berjalan dengan lancar.

Di bisnis pertambangan, Perseroan mencukanan penurunan volume penjualan dan pendapatan batu bara sebesar  $4,4\%$  y-o-y dan  $40,7\%$  y-o-y. Selain karena penurunan volume penjualan batu bara, penurunan ini juga disebabkan karena penurunan hari batu bara serta dampak tidak dikonsolidasikannya GEAR ke dalam laporan posisi keuangan konsolidasian Perseroan akibat pengalihan seluruh saham Perseroan dalam GEAR pada bulan Agustus 2023. Meskipun demikian, Dewan Komisaris menjadi的前提下 mengelaksang dan melaksanakan rencana penambangan efektif, mengembangkan infrauktur yang mendukung penggangkatan kapasitas produksi, melakukan pengendalian biaya yang efisien. Pengelolaan kontraktor yang optimal oleh Direksi turut berperan dalam memitigasi dampak negatif dari penurunan hari batu bara global. Perseroan melalui entitas untuk berhasil memenuhi DMO sekitar  $37\%$  pada tahun 2024. [GRI 2-12-a] [GRI 2-12-b] [GRI 2-12-c]

Pada bisnis EBT, Perseroan fokus untuk makukanan pengembangan bisnis pembangkit listrik berbasis EBT. Upaya ini merupakan bagian dari komitmen Perseroan untuk mendukung transisi energia yang berkelanjutan dan ramah lingkungan.

Hingga 31 Desember 2024, Perseroan melalui entities anak telah漫长ukanan survei pendahuluan energiaapanas bumi{serta mendirikan entities anak untuk mengembangkan bisnis energiaapanas bumi di Cisolok-Cisukarame, Jawa Barat dan Nage, Nusa Tenggara Timur. Sementara itu, melalui PT Daya Mas Agra Sejahtera, entities anak, Perseroan telah memproduksi dan memasarkan sel dan panel surya denganmerek dagang Dian Solar. Pada bulan Desember 2024, Perseroan melalui tersebut perusahaan patungan yang dibentuk bersama dengan Trina Solar Energy Development Pte. Ltd. dan PT PLN Indonesia Power Renewables,nyaalah memproduksi sel dan panel surya pertamanya di pabrik yang berlokasi di Kawasan Industri Kendal,Jawa Tengah.Melalui langkah transisi strategis, Perseroan berharap dapat memanjaatkan peluangasar EBT yang semakin Berkembang dan mencapatkan kontribusi bisnis EBT terhadap pendapatan dan laba jangka panjang,sekaligus mengurangi ketergantungan pada sumber energia fosil dan berkontribusi terhadap pengurangan emisi karbon. [GRI 2-12-a]

Di bisnis teklogi, Perseroan membrukanan peningkatan pendapatan sebesar  $56.6\%$  y-o-y. Peningkatan ini terutama disebabkan karena peningkatan pendapatan pada layanan internet dan TV berbayar. Perseroan fokus dalam memperkuat infrastruktur untuk mendukung pembangunan ekosistem digital dengan mendorong pemasangan home-pass serta melaksanan strategi pemasaran yang intensif untuk mencjangkauasar yang lebih luas. Selama tahun 2024, jumlah home-passy yang berhasil terpasang lebih dari 6,4 juta home-pass (+90,9% y-o-y), menandakan pencapaian yang@cukup signifikan dalam ekspansi jaringan dan upaya Perseroan untuk memperluan jangkauan layanan kepada pelangan. Untuk mengembangkan portofolio bisnis teklogi, Perseroan melalui entitas untuk memantaatkan peluang pengembangan pada bisnis layanan pusat data dan melakukan investasi di berbagai perusahaan tekologi lainnya. [GRI 2-12-a]

The Board of Commissioners appreciates the Board of Directors and employees of the Company for their hard work, dedication, commitment, and leadership in carrying out the company's management duties and responsibilities, ensuring that the operational activities of the Company and its subsidiaries can run smoothly.

In the mining business, the Company recorded a decline in coal sales volume and revenue of  $4.4\%$  y-o-y and  $40.7\%$  y-o-y. In addition to the decrease in coal sales volume, this decline was also caused by the drop in coal prices and the impact of GEAR not being consolidated in the consolidated financial position report of the Company, due to the divestment of GEAR and its subsidiaries in August 2023. Nevertheless, the Board of Commissioners considers that the Board of Directors has successfully designed and implemented an effective mining plan, developed infrastructure that supports increased production capacity, and conducted efficient cost control. The optimal management of contractors by the Board of Directors also played a role in mitigating the negative impact of the decline in global coal prices. The Company, through its subsidiaries, successfully met the DMO approximately at  $37\%$  in 2024. [6RI 2-12-a]

# [GR12-12-b] [GR12-12-c]

In the NRE business, the Company focuses on developing a business for NRE-fueled power plants. This effort is part of the Company's commitment to support a sustainable and environmentally friendly energy transition.

Up to December 31, 2024, the Company through its subsidiaries has conducted preliminary surveys of geothermal energy and established subsidiaries to develop geothermal energy businesses in Cisolok-Cisukarame, West Java, and Nage, East Nusa Tenggara. Meanwhile, through PT Daya Mas Agra Sejahtera, a subsidiary, the Company has produced and marketed solar cells and panels under the trademark Dian Solar. In December 2024, the Company, through a joint venture company established together with Trina Solar Energy Development Pte. Ltd. and PT PLN Indonesia Power Renewables, also produced its first solar cells and panels at a plant located in the Kendal Industrial Estate, Central Java. Through strategic transition steps, the Company expects to capitalize on the increasingly growing NRE market opportunities and enhance the contribution of the NRE business to long-term revenue and profit while also reducing dependence on fossil energy sources and contributing to carbon emissions reduction. [GRI2-12-a]

In the technology business, the Company recorded a  $56.6\%$  y-o-y increase in revenue. This increase was mainly due to an increase in the revenue of internet services and pay TV. The Company focuses on strengthening infrastructure to support the development of the digital ecosystem by encouraging the installation of home-passes and implementing intensive marketing strategies to reach a broader market. During the year 2024, the number of home-passes reached more than 6.4 million home-passes  $(+90.9\%$  y-o-y), indicating a significant achievement in network expansion and the Company's efforts to broaden its service coverage to customers. To develop its technology business portfolio, the Company through its subsidiaries is leveraging development opportunities in the data center services and investing in various other technology companies. [GRI 2-12-a]

Di bisnis bahan kimia, Perseroan mencukukan penurunan pendapatan sebesar  $56.7\%$  y-o-y. Penurunan ini terutama disebabkan karena penurunan permintaan pelangan. [GRI 2-12-a]

# Pengawasan terhadap Implementasi Strategi Perseroan

Dewan Komisaris telah melaksanakan tugas dan tanggungjawabnya dengan penuh integritas, sesuai dengan Anggaran Dasar Perseroan dan Piagam Dewan Komisaris. Sepanjang tahun 2024, Dewan Komisaris secara aktif melaksanakan fungsi pengawasan terhadap jalanya operational Perseroan ada memberikan saran dan masukan yang konstruktif mengenai kepadahan terhadap peraturan dan perundang-undangan yang berlaku, kebujakan internal, ada pengelolaan perusahaan oleh Direksi. Dewan Komisaris mencilaikesesuaian antara pelaksanaan kebujakan dan pengelolaan perusahaan dengan visi dan misi Perseroan, serta memberikan persetujuan terhadap berbagai strategi bisnis dan rencanaaksi korporasi untuk tahun 2024, memastikan bahwa setupiap keputusan yang diamibil sejalan dengan tujuan jangka panjang Perseroan. [GRI] 2-12-a

Sehubungan dengan aksi perubahan iklim, Dewan Komisaris telah ikut mengawasi implementasi strategi perusahaan terkait perubahan iklim dengan melakukan evaluasi terhadap laporan perkembangan pencapaian target daninisiatif keberlanjutan dan memastikan Bahwa kebujakan dan langkah yang diambil sejalan dengan regulasi lingkungan yang berlaku serta harapan pemangku kepada orang untuk menciptakan dampak positif yang berkelanjutan bagi perusahaan dan lingkungan.

Untuk memastikan efektivitas pengawasan, Dewan Komisaris melaksanan fungsi pengawasan secara berkala melalui penyelenggaraan rapat Dewan Komisaris, rapat gabungan Dewan Komisaris dengan Direksi, seda pertemuan dengan Komite Audit, Komite Manajemen Risiko, Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi, Unit Audit Internal, Unit Manajemen Risiko, dan Sekretaris Perusahaan. Secara khusus, Komisaris Independen Perseroan juga mengadakan Rapat Dewan Komisaris serta rapat dengan komite-komite terkait tanpa dihadiri oleh pejabat eksekutif Perseroan. Langkah ini merupakan bagian dari mekanisme penilaian independen terhadap efektivitas pengelolaan perusahaan, guna memastikan keberlanjutan dan integritas dalam pengambilan keputusan.

In the chemicals business, the Company recorded a  $56.7\%$  decline in revenue. This decline was mainly due to the decrease in customers demand. [GRI2-12-a]

The Board of Commissioners has thoroughly reviewed the implementation of the duties and responsibilities of the Board of Directors as well as the supporting units that play a role in supporting the performance of the Board of Directors. This evaluation process encompasses various important aspects, including the Company's performance, the achievements of set targets, the effectiveness of strategy formulation and sustainability policies, as well as input from the Audit Committee, Risk Management Committee, and Nomination and Remuneration Committee. Based on the evaluation results, the Board of Commissioners assesses that the Board of Directors has managed the Company throughout 2024 with the utmost caution, professionalism, and responsibility, especially in responding to challenges and changes related to the external environment. The Board of Commissioners assesses that the decisions made by the Board of Directors reflect a strong commitment to implementing long-term sustainability principles.

# Supervision on the Implementation of the Company's Strategy

The Board of Commissioners had carried out its duties and responsibilities with full integrity, in accordance with the Company's Articles of Association and Charter of the Board of Commissioners. Throughout 2024, the Board of Commissioners actively performed its supervisory functions over the Company's operation and provided constructive advice and input regarding compliance with applicable regulations and laws, internal policies, and the management of the company by the Board of Directors. The Board of Commissioners assessed the alignment between the implementation of policies and the management of the company with the Company's vision and mission, as well as approved various business strategies and corporate action plans for 2024, ensuring that every decision made is in line with the Company's long-term goals. [GRI 2-12-a]

In relation to climate change actions, the Board of Commissioners has been overseeing the implementation of the company's climate-related strategies by evaluating progress reports on target achievements and sustainability initiatives, and ensuring that the policies and measures taken are in line with applicable environmental regulations and stakeholder expectations to create a sustainable positive impact for the company and the environment.

To ensure the effectiveness of supervision, the Board of Commissioners carries out its supervisory function regularly through the holding of the Board of Commissioners meetings, joint meetings of the Board of Commissioners with the Board of Directors, as well as meetings with the Audit Committee, the Risk Management Committee, the Nomination and Remuneration Committee, Internal Audit Unit, Risk Management Unit, and Corporate Secretary. Specifically, the Independent Commissioners of the Company also held the Board of Commissioners meetings and meetings with relevant committees without the presence of the Company's executive officers. This step is part of an independent assessment mechanism of the effectiveness of the company's management, aimed at ensuring sustainability and integrity in decision-making.

Melalui pelaksanaan rapat gabungan dengan Direksi, Dewan Komisaris menerima pemaparan komprehensif mengenai rencana kerja, pelaksanaan kegiatan operasional, kondisi keuangan,{serta rencanaaksi korparsi Perseroan. Informasi tersebut menjadi landasan bagi Dewan Komisaris untuk melaksanan fungsi pengawasan yang efektif dan memberikan arahan yang dapat untuk mendorong keberHASILAN jangka panjang perusahaan. [GRI 2-12-0]

# Prospek Usaha Perseroan

Bisnis pertambangan memiliki prospek usaha yang penuh tantangan di tahun 2025, di tengah ketidakpastian ekonomi global yang di antaranya dipicu oleh dinamika geopolitik serta transisi energia. Namun, Perseroan memandang因为她 batu bara akan tetap menjadi komponen penting dalam bauran energia pada tahun 2025, didorong oleh permintaan dari negara-negara di Asia.

Bisnis EBT Indonesia diperkurakan akan semakin diperkuat dengan target kapasitas pembangkit listrik mencapai 71 GW pada tahun 2025-2034. Fokus utama antara lain akan diberikan pada pengembangan energi tenaga surya. Peluang bisnis EBT ini semakin terbuka lebar, seiring dengan upaya pemerintah untuk mempercepat pembangunan infrastruktur smart grid dan penyimpanan energi berbasis baterai untuk menc Gatkan pasokan listrik untuk mendukung komitmen menuju netralitas karbon.

Bisnis tekologi diperkirakan mengalami pertumbuhan pesat, seiring dengan adopsi tekologi 5G. Tekologi 5G diperkirakan akan menjadi pilar utama dalam era transformasi digital yang semakin cepat dan kompetitif diasar global, yang mampu membuka konektivitas Barang dan mencakatan kebutuhan akan solusi keamanan siber canggih.

# Business Prospect of the Company

The mining business has a challenging outlook in 2025, amid global economic uncertainty driven by, among others, geopolitical dynamics and the energy transition. However, the Company believes that coal will remain an important component in the energy mix in 2025, driven by demand from Asian countries.

Indonesia's NRE business is expected to be further strengthened with a target power generation capacity of 71 GW by 2025-2034. The main focus will be on the development of solar energy. The business opportunities in NRE are becoming increasingly wide open, in line with the government's efforts to accelerate the development of smart grid infrastructure and battery-based energy storage to enhance electricity supply in support of the commitment towards carbon neutrality.

Technology businesses are expected to experience rapid growth, along with the adoption of 5G technology. 5G technology is expected to become a key pillar in the era of increasingly rapid and competitive digital transformation in the global market, capable of opening new connectivity and increasing the demand for advanced cybersecurity solutions.

Meanwhile, the chemical business is expected to continue playing a vital role in supporting global food security, especially amid rapid population growth and the increasingly evident impacts of climate change. Although the chemical business faces significant challenges due to supply chain disruptions caused by the Russia-Ukraine conflict and increasingly stringent environmental regulations, the demand for chemicals is expected to continue to rise to maintain food supply stability.

The Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors actively discuss the Company's performance developments and continuously monitor industry dynamics periodically to ensure an appropriate response to market changes. The Board of Commissioners has also conducted a comprehensive review, provided constructive suggestions/input, and given full support to the Board of Directors' work plan for 2024, including initiatives to develop the NRE business and new technologies. Based on that evaluation, the Board of Commissioners assesses that the business plans and strategies formulated by the Company are on the right track to achieve sustainable growth and drive innovation in the future. [GRI 2-12-a]

# Whistleblowing System

The Company implements a whistleblowing system to provide a means for stakeholders to submit feedback, complaints, and/or report indications of violations that have the potential to cause losses to the Company and/or the Company's employees. The updated system, adjusted to changing needs and prevailing regulations, is expected to foster a culture of transparency and accountability within the Company. Through the implementation of a whistleblowing system, the Company expects to be more proactive in detecting and addressing potential violations, creating a clean and healthy work environment, enhancing and maintaining the Company's good reputation, and ensuring long-term business sustainability. [GRI 2-12-a]

In 2024, the Company received several reports, all of which have been followed up on. Based on the evaluation results of the implementation of the whistleblowing system, the Board of Commissioners expects that the reporting handling process has been carried out well by the established procedures.

The Board of Commissioners encourages the Company to continue strengthening and developing the implementation of the whistleblowing system to make it more effective in detecting and handling violations in the future. [GRI 2-12-c]

# Prospek dan Strategi Keberlanjutan Tahun 2025

Bisnis pertambangan memiliki prospek usaha yang penuh tantangan di tahun 2025, di tengah ketidak pastian ekonomi global yang di antaranya dipicu oleh dinamika geopolitik serta transisi energia. Namun, Perseroan memandang因为她 batu bara akan tetap menjadi komponen penting dalam bauran energia pada tahun 2025. Permintaan batu bara dari negara-negara di Asia, terutama Tiongkok, India, dan Jepang akan menopang pasar batu bara. Tren permintaan dan harga batu bara dapat berubahjika kondisi geopolitik memanas. Perseroan, melalui entitas anak, berupaya mencatingkatkan kinerja bisnis pertambangan dari setiap aset yang dimiliki dengan makukanan investasi dalam infrastruktur dan sarana tambang untuk menunjang operasional yang lebih maksimal, mengoptimalkan efisiensi operasional melalui pengendalian biaya Produksi yang berorientasi pada keunggulan biaya unto memperkuat daya saing, melanjutkan pemetaan digital dan otomatisasi proses operasional pertambangan, mencatkan praktik pertambangan berkelanjutan dengan mengurangi emisi melalui elektrifikasi alat berat dan penggunaan EBT di lokasi tambang, dan makukan diversifikasi pasar ekspor untuk mengurangi ketergantungan pada pasar Tiongkok dan India. [GRI 2-12-a]

Bisnis penyediaan tenaga listrik diperkirakan akan mengalami pertumbuhan konsumsi listrik nasional sebesar  $6,9\%$  secara tahun pada kurun waktu tahun 2025-2029. Pertumbuhan ini secara umum didorong oleh peningkatan kegiatan ekonomi dan investasi di sektor manufaktur dan tekologi dalam negeri. Untuk memenuhi kebutuhan energia yang terus mencapat, pemerintah Indonesia mengakselerasi pembangunan pembangkit listrik PLN dan swasta dengan target kapasitas total mencapai 71 GW untukperiode dari tahun 2025 sampai dengan tahun 2034. Sebagai bagian dari komitmen aksi perubahan iklim dan sieiring dengan gerakan global menuju transisi energia bersih dan pengurangan emisi karbon, Perseroan melalui entitas anak telah menjaki peluang untuk bertransisi dan masuk ke dalam pengembangan bisnis EBT,seperti bisnis energi surya dan tenaga panas bumi. Dengan strategi ini, Perseroan optimis dapat tetap mempertahankan kinerja operasi yang berkelanjutan di bisnis penyediaan tenaga listrik. [GRI 2-12-a]

# Prospects and Sustainability Strategies for 2025

The mining business has a challenging business outlook in 2025, amid global economic uncertainty driven by, among others, geopolitical dynamics and the energy transition. However, the Company believes that coal will remain an important component in the energy mix in 2025. The demand for coal from Asian countries, particularly China, India, and Japan will support the coal market. The trend in coal demand and prices can change if geopolitical conditions heat up. The Company, through its subsidiaries, seeks to enhance the performance of its mining business from each owned asset by investing in infrastructure and mining facilities to support more optimal operations, optimizing operational efficiency through production cost control that is cost leadership-oriented to strengthen competitiveness, continuing digital roadmap and operational process automation in mining, improving sustainable mining practices by reducing emission through the electrification of heavy equipment and the use of NRE sources at mining sites, and diversifying export markets to reduce dependence on the Chinese and Indian markets. [GRI 2-12-a]

The power generation business is expected to experience a  $6.9\%$  annual growth in national electricity consumption within the period of 2025-2029. This growth is generally driven by increased economic activity and investment in the domestic manufacturing and technology sectors. To meet the continuously increasing energy demand, the Indonesian government is accelerating the construction of PLN and private power plants with a total capacity target of 71 GW for the period from 2025 to 2034. As part of the commitment to climate action and inline with the global movement towards a clean energy transition and carbon emission reduction, the Company, through its subsidiaries, has explored opportunities to transition and enter the development of NRE businesses, such as solar energy and geothermal power. With this strategy, the Company is optimistic that it can continue to maintain sustainable operational performance in the electricity supply business. [GRI 2-12]

# Corporate Governance and Commitment in Implementing CSER

The year 2024 marks an important milestone for the Company in strengthening the consistent and comprehensive implementation of best practices in GCG. This effort is not only focused on more efficient and effective internal management but also on fulfilling the interests of stakeholders, in order to create a balance of business growth and long-term business sustainability. [GRI 2-12-a]

By adhering to sustainability values, the Code of Conduct, and prevailing laws and regulations, the Company is committed to creating a healthy, safe, and responsible work environment. The Company consistently strives to follow guidelines and best practices at both national and international levels to ensure compliance and effectiveness in the implementation of corporate governance.

To maintain the relevance and effectiveness of the implemented systems, the Company periodically evaluates and continuously strengthens the internal control system, the whistle-blowing system, risk management, and business risk mitigation strategies. In line with the rapid development of digitalization, the Company also strengthens its information security and data protection systems through comprehensive policy and procedure updates to anticipate potential threats to the security of the Company's data and the personal data of the Company and its stakeholders. Transparency continues to be strengthened through ongoing improvements in information disclosure in the Annual Report as well as the IDX's and Company's websites, in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. [GRI 2-12-c]

Pada tahun 2024, Perseroan telah membuat duala kali RUPS, yaitu RUPST dan RUPSLB, yang diselenggarakan pada tanggal 25 Juni 2024. Selain itu, Direksi juga melaksanakan 17(tujuh belas) kaliRAPAT, termasuk di antaranya 5 (lima) kali rapat gabungan dengan Dewan Komisaris. Dalam rapat gabungan dengan Dewan Komisaris, Direksi mencampiikan pembaruan terkait kondisi operasional, kondisi keuanganan, dan rencana aksi korporasi. Sementara dalam rapat dengan divisi yang relevant, Direksi memastikan implementasi strategi serta mengevaluasi perkembangan kinerja masing-masing unit bisnis Perseroan. [GRI 2-12-b] [GRI 2-12-c]

Perseroan tersebut 2 (dua) kali Paparan Publik, yaitu Paparan Publik Insidentil pada tanggal 25 Juni 2024 guna memberikan pemaparan mencenai rencana pemecahan saham Perseroan dan Paparan Publik Tahunan pada tanggal 10 Desember 2024 guna memberikan pemaparan kepada pemangku kepentingan mengenai kinerja dan strategi bisnis Perseroan.

Perseroan Juda inginutsertakan seluruh anggota Dewan Komisaris, Direksi, komite-komite, dan unit pendukung dalam setidaknya tahun lokakarya, pelatihan, atas seminar, dengan ketentuan minimal 12 (dua belas) jam pelatihan per tahun guna mencapatkan kompetensi dalam pengawasan dan pengelolaan perusahaan.

Sejalan dengan komitmen untuk menciptakan nilai bagi pemangku kepentingan, Perseroan terus berupaya memberikan dampak positif bagi masyarakat dan lingkungan di sekitar wilayah operasionalnya. Bersama entitas akan, Perseroan memerkitau keterlibatan dengan komunitas lokal melalui berbagai program daninisiatif sosial. Sepanjang tahun 2024, Perseroan dan entitas akan tetahmerealisasikan lebih dari 50 program TJSL dengan manfaat yang dirasakan oleh lebih dari 38.000 pereima. Program-program ini mencakup aspek sosial dan lingkungan, yang disusun berdasarkan kebutuhan dan ekspektasi masing-masing pemangku kepentingan.

Khusus di bidang lingkungan, Perseroan, melalui entitas anak, menaruh perhatian pada pengurangan emisi karbon, pengelolaan limbah, dan konservasi sumber daya alarm. Inisiatif yang dilakukan mencakup penerapan efisiensi energia, pemanfaatan tekologi ramah lingkungan,erta program penghijauan guna mengurangi dampak operasi terhadap lingkungan. Perseroan juga terus mencakkan kesadaran serta participasi karyawan dalam upaya konservasi lingkungan. Khusus di bisnis pertambangan, Perseroan melalui entitas akan juga memperkuat komitmen terhadap praktik pertambangan yang berkelanjutan melalui penggunaan EBT di area tambang, program reklamasilahan dengan penanaman vegetasi untuk menyerap karbon, serta penguatan keterlibatan masyarakat lokal melalui program tanggung jawab sosial.

Sebagai penghargaan ataskomitmen melaksakan GCG, Perseroan dan entitas anak berhasil memperoleh berbagai penghargaan di tahun 2024. Pencapaian ini menjadi bukti nyata atas integritas serta tanggung jawab Perseroan dalam menjalankan operasional bisnis yang berkelanjutan.

In 2024, the Company held two GMS, i.e., the AGM and the EGM, which were held on June 25, 2024. In addition, the Company also held 17 (seventeen) Board of Directors meetings, 5 (five) of which were joint meetings with the Board of Commissioners. In joint meetings with the Board of Commissioners, the Board of Directors presented updates on operational conditions, financial conditions, and corporate action plans. Meanwhile, in the meeting with the relevant divisions, the Board of Directors ensured the implementation of strategies and evaluated the performance progress of each business unit of the Company. [GRI 2-12-b] [GRI 2-12-c]

The Company held 2 (two) Public Exposures, i.e., the Incidental Public Expose on June 25, 2024, to provide an explanation regarding the Company's stock split plan and an Annual Public Expose on December 10, 2024, to provide an explanation to stakeholders regarding the Company's performance and business strategy.

The Company also involves all members of the Board of Commissioners, Board of Directors, committees, and supporting units in at least one workshop, training, or seminar, with a minimum requirement of 12 (twelve) hours of training per year to enhance competencies in supervision and management of the company.

Aligned with its commitment to create value for stakeholders, the Company continues to strive to provide a positive impact on the community and the environment around its operational areas. Together with its subsidiaries, the Company strengthens its engagement with local communities through various social programs and initiatives. Throughout 2024, the Company and its subsidiaries have implemented more than 50 CSER programs, benefiting over 38,000 recipients. These programs encompass social and environmental aspects, which are structured based on the needs and expectations of each stakeholder.

Specifically in the environment sector, the Company, through its subsidiaries, pays attention to reducing carbon emissions, waste management, and natural resource conservation. The initiatives undertaken include implementing energy efficiency, using environmentally friendly technology, and greening programs to reduce the operational impact on the environment. The Company also continues to raise awareness and participation among employees in environmental conservation efforts. Especially in the mining business, the Company, through its subsidiaries, also strengthens its commitment to sustainable mining practices by using NRE in mining areas, land reclamation programs with vegetation planting to absorb carbon, and enhancing local community engagement through social responsibility programs.

As a recognition of the commitment to implementing GCG, the Company and its subsidiaries successfully received various awards in 2024. This achievement is tangible proof of the Company's integrity and responsibility in conducting sustainable business operations.

# Penutup

Direksi mengucapkan apresiasi yang sebesar-besarnya kepada seluruh pihak yang telah memberikan kepercayaan, dukungan, dan kerja sama sepanjang tahun 2024. Perseroan menjadi hari ini setiap pencapaian yang telah dirah tidak terlepas dari kontribusi para pemegang saham, anggota Dewan Komisaris, anggota Komite, kanyakan, serta seluruh pemangku keluarga lainnya.

Dengan komitmen yang kuat untuk menjaga kepercayaan yang telah diberikan, Perseroan akan terus berupaya mencapai kesuksesan bersama secara berkelanjutan, Seeingga dapat senantiasa memberikan nilai tambah bagi seluruh pemangku kepentingan.

# Closing Remark

The Board of Directors would like to express its sincere appreciation to all parties who have provided such trust, support, and cooperation throughout 2024. The Company realizes that all achievements cannot be separated from the contribution of shareholders, members of the Board of Commissioners, members of the Committees, employees, and other stakeholders.

With a strong commitment to maintaining the trust that has been given, the Company will continue to strive for sustainable mutual success, thereby consistently providing added value to all stakeholders.

Keterangan / Notes:  
1 Pada tuhn 2024, Perseroan tel ahakkan aki porasi sehubungan deng saham Perseroan yaitu 1) pemecahan saham deng raso 1:10 dimana nilai nominal saharmeneral malinga um perubanan dari Rp250 mejadi Rp25, sehingga jumah saharn tercatat yang sebelunnye berjumah 770.552.320 lebar saharn megalam megalam mejali 7.705.523.200 lebar sah efektif sejakq tangal 18 Juli 2024 serta 2) pengalihan saharn bisih pembelian kembali saharn sejumah 24.815.000 lebar saharn pada bulan Agustus 2024.  
In 2024, the Company carried out corporate action concerning the Company's shares, i.e. 1) a stock split with a ratio of 1:10 in which the nominal value of the shares of the Company has changed from Rp250 to Rp25, thus the total of previously listed shares amounting to 770,552,320 shares also has changed to a total of 7,705,523,200 shares effective since July 18, 2024, as well as 2) share transfer resulting from buyback of shares amounting to 24,815,000 shares on August 2024.

Keterangan / Notes:  
1) Pemecahan saham merupakan langkah korporasi dinilai menarisk begin investor, karena dapat Memberi yang saham kepada leib terjangkau. Sehubungan dengan pengumangan rencahan pemecahan saham, volume perdagangan dan harga saham Perseroan mengalami lonjakan yang cukup signifikan, sehingga pada tanggal 16 Januari 2024 dan 28 Mei 2024, BEI mengumikan terjadinya penegakan harga saham Perseroan di luar kebiasaan (unusual market activity). Untuk memastikan Kondisi相对较 darungiti publicistik riterit, BEI melakukan penentihan sementara perdagangan saham Perseroan pada tangai 19 Januari 2024, 19 Juni 2024, dan 15 Juli 2024.  
1) Stock splits are considered an attractive corporate move for investors, as they can make the stock price more affordable. In connection with the announcement of the stock split plan, the trading volume and the company's stock price experienced a significant surge, leading IDX to announce unusual market activity on January 16, 2024, and May 28, 2024. To stabilize market conditions and protect the public/retail investors, the IDX temporarily suspended trading of the Company's shares on January 19, 2024, June 19, 2024, and July 15, 2024.

APJATEL is a non-profit organization that aims to provide a means of communication and information for telecommunications and information network operators to smooth the process of developing telecommunications and information networks in Indonesia, especially in relation to the coordination process between government at both the central and regional levels. By becoming a member of APJATEL, the Company, through its subsidiaries, is expected to be able to collaborate, exchange information and experiences, consult, and obtain advocacy from business networks that have the same business challenges.</td></tr><tr><td>Masyarakat Telematika Indonesia (MASTEL) mastel LIVING ENABLER</td><td>Nasional National</td><td>• PT Eka Mas Republik</td><td>Anggota Member</td><td>MASTEL adulthood menjadi organisasi nirlaba mandiri yang bertujuan menyediakan kepada招投标 peluangan mengoleologi informasi, komunikasi, dan pensiarananya mengadaikan mengitungan peningkatan kualitas hidup manusia, melalui penyelenggaraan sekter telematika di Indonesia. Dengan menjadi anggota MASTEL, Perseroan melalui entities anak, diharapkan dapat berkolaborasi, bertukar informasi dan pengalaman, berkontultasi, dan mendapatkan advokasi dari jaringan bisnis yang memiliki tantangan bisnis yang sama.

Dengan menjadi anggota APMI, Perseroan melalui entities anak, diharapkan dapat berkolaborasi, bertukar informasi dan pengalaman, berkontultasi, dan mendapatkan advokasi dari jaringan bisnis yang memiliki tantangan bisnis yang sama. 
APMI is a non-profit organization that aims to advance the multimedia industry to realize a science and technology-based society as part of nation-building and develop the multimedia industry through broadband development and creative industries in it. # 2023

Perseroan seksutif dan pengobatan kumbali sebanyak 154.105.327 saham Perseroan

The Company has bought back 154,105,327 Company's shares

- Perseroan melalui tersebut perusahaan patungan yang dibentuk bersama dengan Trina Solar Energy Development Pte. Ltd. dan PT PLN Indonesia Power Renewables makukuan peletakan batu pertama pembangunan pabrik pembuatan sel dan modul surya terintegrasi berkapasitas 1 gigawatt peak per tahun di Kawasan Ekonomi Khusus Kendal - Jawa Tengah

The Company, through a joint venture company established together with Trina Solar Energy Development Pte. Ltd. and PT PLN Indonesia Power Renewables performed a groundbreaking ceremony for the construction of the first integrated solar cell and module manufacturing plant with a capacity of 1-gigawatt peak per year in the Kendal Special Economic Zone - Central Java

- Perseroan makukanan restrukturisi entitas anak,cean
Perseroan memiliki mayoritas saham GEMS secara langsung dan tidak lagi memiliki saham GEAR

The Company restructured its subsidiaries, which resulted in the Company directly owning the majority of GEMS shares and no longer owning GEAR shares

- Perseroan, melalui entitas anak, merambah bisnis kesehatan melalui pendirian klinik kesehatan dan farmasi yaitu GWS Medika dan GWS Farma di Kalibata City, Springhill Kemayoran, dan Green Pramuka Square Jakarta

The Company, through its subsidiary, has expanded into the healthcare business through the establishment of medical clinics and pharmacy stores, i.e. GWS Medika and GWS Farma at Kalibata City and Springhill Kemayoran, and Green Pramuka Square Jakarta

- Perseroan mencatatkan Obligasi dan Sukuk Mudharabah Berkelanjutan I Dian Swastatika Sentosa (Tahap I, II, dan III) Tahun 2024 dengan total nilai sebesar Rp5,5 triliun  
The Company listed the Shelf Registration Bonds and Sukuk Mudharabah I Dian Swastatika Sentosa (Phase I, II, and III) Year 2024 with a total value of Rp5,5 trillion  
- Perseroan melaksanan pemecahan saham dengan rasio pemecahan 1:10  
The Company carried out the stock split with a split ratio of 1:10  
- PT Daya Mas Agra Sejahtera, entitas anak, mendirikan usaha pengembangan panel surya dengan merek dagang Dian Solar
PT Daya Mas Agra Sejahtera, a subsidiary, established a solar panel development business under the Dian Solar brand  
- PT Daya Sentosa Sakti Renewables (dahulu PT Daya Anugerah Sejati Utama), entitas anak, memenangan lelang Wilayah Kerja Panas Bumi(WKP) Cisolok dan WKP Nage  
PT Daya Sentosa Sakti Renewables (formerly PT Daya Anugerah Sejati Utama), a subsidiary, won the auction for the Cisolok Geothermal Working Area (WKP) and the Nage WKP  
- Perseroan melalui tersebut perusahaan patungan yang dibentuk bersama dengan Trina Solar Energy Development Pte. Ltd. dan PT PLN Indonesia Power Renewables telah memproduksi sel dan panel surya pertamanya di pabrik yang berlokasi di Kawasan Industri Kendal, Jawa Tengah

The Company, through a joint venture company established together with Trina Solar Energy Development Pte. Ltd. and PT PLN Indonesia Power Renewables, also produced its first solar cells and panels at a plant located in the Kendal Industrial Estate, Central Java

# Misi, Visi, Nilai-Nilai Keberlanjutan, dan Budaya Perusahaan Perseroan

# Mission, Vision, Sustainability Values, and Corporate Culture of the Company

Untuk memastikan Bahwa visi, misi, dan strategi, serta system pengendalian internal dan manajemen risiko tetap sesuai dengan tujuan jangka panjang Perseroan, Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi menelaah secara Berkala visi, misi, dan strategi, serta system pengendalian internal dan manajemen risiko Perseroan.

Berdasarkan penelaahan yang telah dilakukan, Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi berpendapat kepada visi, misi, strategi, serta systemd pengendalian internal, dan manajemen risiko yang dilaksakan Perseroan konsisten dengan tujuan jangka panjang dan nilai-nilai keberlanjutan Perseroan. [AC6S E.1.4.]

To ensure that the vision, mission, and strategy, as well as the internal control and risk management systems, remain aligned with the Company's long-term goals, the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors periodically review the Company's vision, mission, and strategy, as well as the internal control and risk management systems.

Based on the review that has been conducted, the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors believe that the Company's vision, mission, strategy, internal control, and risk management systems are consistent with the Company's long-term goals and sustainability values. [ACGS E.1.4.]

The Company has developed and integrated the Company's sustainability values into Code of Conduct, Corporate Culture, and Company Policies and Regulations to serve as guidance for members of the Board of Commissioners, members of the Board of Directors, and employees of the Company and its subsidiaries.

The Code of Conduct and Corporate Culture were ratified in 2015 and have been socialized to all personnel of the Company through orientation programs, placement of posters in work areas, as well as publication on the Company's website.

Key Points of the Company's Code of Conduct and Corporate Culture AC6S E.2.1. G-07

# Reputasi Perseroan

Pengurus dan karyawan wajib menjagana name baik Perseroan dan pimpinan Perseroan.

# Kepentingan Perseroan

Pengurus dan karyawan wajib mengutamakan kepentingan Perseroan di atas kepentingan pribadi kepada kelompok. Dalam menjalankan tanggung jawabnya, pengurus dan karyawan dilarang untuk mencampurkan kepentingan Perseroan dengan kepentingan pribadi kepada kelompok.

# The Company's Reputation

Management and employees must protect the image of the Company and its leaders.

# The Company's Interest

Management and employees must prioritize the Company's interests over personal or group interests. In conducting their responsibilities, management and employees are prohibited from mixing the Company's interests with personal or group interests.

# Kejujuran

Honesty

# Kepatuhan

Compliance

Pengurus dan karyawan wajib bertindak jujur, termasuk memberikan dokumen atau data yang akurat dan dapat dipertanggungjawabkan dan tidak diperbolehkan untuk memanipulasi dokumen atau data denganalan apapun.

Management and employees must act with honesty, including to provide accurate and accountable data and documents and it is prohibited to manipulate data or documents for any reason.

Pengurus dan karyawan tanggung jawab mematuh turan perundang-undangan, im, norma, dan praktik bisnis ting baik dalam menjalanan tegiatan usaha Perseroan. management and employees st comply with regulations, s, norms, and good business practices in running the Company's business.

# Kerahasiaan

Confidentiality

Pengurus dan karyawan wajib melindungi dan menjaga kerahasiaan data dan informasi mencenai Perseroan dan data dan informasi tersebut butanya dipergunakan seperlunya untuk menjalankan kegiatan usaha Perseroan.

Management and employees must protect and maintain the Company's confidential data and information and such data and information must be used as necessary to conduct the Company's business.

# Benturan Kepentingan

Conflict of Interests

Pengurus dan kanyakan dilarang terlibat secara langsung maupun tidak langsung dalam pengambilan keputusan terhadap transaksi untuk kebikan di mana yang bersangkutan memilaki benturan kepentangan. Management and employees are prohibited to involve, either directly or indirectly, in the decision-making of certain transaction(s) or policy(ies) of which they have conflict of interests.

# Perdagangan dan

# Informasi

# Orang Dalam

Insider Trading and

Information

Pengurus dan kanyakan dilarang mengunjukan informasi non-publik mengenai Perseroan untuk kepentingan pribadi ata di luar kepentingan Perseroan dan Perseroan melarang segala pentuk perdagangan informasi non-publik mengenai Perseroan. Management and employees are prohibited from using the Company's non-public information for personal interests or non-Company interests and the Company prohibits any kind of trading of the Company's non-public information.

Professionalism

# Non Diskriminasi

# Non-Discrimination

Pengurus dan karyawan berhak mendapatkan perlakuan nondiskriminatif dalam seluruh aspek hubungan kerja, termasuk ketesaraan gender dalam rekrutmen, penempatan kerja, promosi, mutasi, kompensasi, dan kesempatan untuk mengikuti pelatihan.

Management and employees shall enjoy non-discriminatory treatment in all aspects of employment, including gender equality in recruitment, job placement, promotion, transfer, compensation, and training opportunities.

# Sikap Hormat dan Sopan

# Respect and Courtesy

Pengurus dan karyawan wajib saling menghormati, berlaku soper, berpakaian rapi, dan bertindak sesuai dengan norma-norma yang berlaku, dan mendukung terciptanya lingkungan kerja yang kondusif. Management and employees must have mutual respect, act politely, wear proper attire, and act in accordance with applicable orms and support the conducive working environment.

# Tindakan Tidak Terpuji

# Improper Act

Pengurus dan kanyakan dilarang melakukan tandakan tidak terpuji spepi penggunaan obat terlarang, penipuan, pelecehan seksual, kekerasan, korupsi, atau hal-hal lainnya yang bertentangan dengan peraturan, hukum, dan norma yang berlaku, baik di dalam maupun di luar lingkungan Perseroan.

Management and employees are prohibited to act improperly such as using illegal drugs, fraud, sexual harassment, violence, corruption, or any other things that are against regulations, laws, and applicable norms, both within or outside the Company's premises.

# Kesehatan dan

# Keselamatan Kerja

# Occupational Health and Safety

Pengurus dan karyawan wajib menaati dan melaksanakan prinsip-prinsip kesehatan dan keselamatan kerja.

Management and employees must obey and observe occupational health and safety principles.

# Lingkungan Hidup dan Masyarakat

# Community and

# Environment

Pengurus dan karyawan wajib menjaga kelestarian lingkungan sekitar serta hubungan baik dengan masyarakat sekitar. Management and employees must preserve the surrounding environment and communities as well as maintain good relationships with local communities.

# Pengembangan Diri

# Self-Improvement

Pengurus dan karyawan didorong untuk terus mencatkan kompetensi diri dan mengikuti perembangan lingkungan eksternal agar dapat memberikan kontribusi yang lebih baik kepada Perseroan. Management and employees are encouraged to continuously improve self-competency and stay updated on external affairs to contribute better to the Company.

# Terobosan

# Breakthrough

Pengurus dan kanyakan didorong untuk memberikan usulan kepada ini untuk dapat mendukung pertumbuhan Perseroan.

Management and employees are encouraged to provide new suggestions or ideas to support the Company's growth.

The Company seeks to integrate its strategies, operations, internal control system, and risk management with the Code of Conduct and Corporate Culture. The Company publishes, distributes, communicates to its employees, and periodically reviews the Company Regulation booklet. [GRI 205-2] [GRI 2-23-f] [GRI 2-24-a]. The Company expects that all its personnel can understand and be committed to carrying out their responsibilities to act positively by the Code of Conduct and Corporate Culture. [GRI 2-24-a] [ACGS E.2.2.]

Generally, evaluation of implementation and enforcement of the Code of Conduct and Corporate Culture is carried out through an annual performance evaluation mechanism by the higher officials. Any disciplinary actions and violations of the Code of Conduct, Corporate Culture, and Company Regulation will be followed up with a comprehensive investigation process. Violations may be subject to sanctions under the Company's policy, such as written warnings, warning letters (I, II, III), or even termination of employment, depending on the severity of the violation committed. [ACGS E.2.3.]

Integritas Juda diberlakukan bagi pihak ketiga yang bekerja sama dengan Perseroan speerti vendor, dan pemasok. Untuk memastikan bahwa para vendor dan pemasok juga memenuhi standar etika dan kepadahan yang tinggi sesuai dengan nilai-nilai Perseroan, pemilihan vendor dan pemasok dilakukan melalui proses tender yang ketat.

Selama tahun 2024, Perseroan tidak menc Meriima laporan terkait pelanggaran Kode Etik dan/atau Peraturan Perusahaan Perseroan yang signifikan.

Integrity is also applied to third parties who cooperate with the Company, such as vendors and suppliers. To ensure that vendors and suppliers also meet high ethical and compliance standards in accordance with the Company's values, the selection of vendors and suppliers is carried through a strict tender process.

During 2024, the Company did not receive any reports related to significant violations of the Company's Code of Conduct and/or Company Regulations.

Perseroan)--yuhai hui yuoyi. Perusahaan memiliki pengaruh yang signifikan pada keberlangsungan dan kesuksesan usaha Perseroan. Untuk mencaringkatkan kualitas budaya perusahaan dan mendukung terciptanya lingkungan kerja yang lebih baik, Perseroan dan entitas anak yang relevant Berkomitmen untuk membruka akses kepada semua pemangku kepentingan, termasuk karyawan, untuk dapat memberikan masukan, saran, dan kritik yang konstruktif kepada Perseroan.

Untuk memperoleh umpan balik internal, Perseroan dan entitas anak, antara lain, melakukan survei untuk mengukur tingkat kematangan Budaya Perusahaan.

Di tingkat perusahaan induk, pengukuran tingkat kematangan Budaya Perusahaan dilakukan melalui proses exit interview. Hal ini mengusat rumah kanyakan di perusahaan induk relatif sedikit, seesingga informasi tentang Budaya Perusahaan dapat diteroleh relativ mudah melalui interaksi informal. Exit interview ini dilakukan untuk memahami atas pengunduran diri (baik yang terkait dengan Budaya Perusahaan, manajemen, dan/atau hal-hal lainnya), disamping untuk mengumpulkan umpan balik dari kanyakan yang telah mengajukan permohonan pengunduran diri, sebelum kanyakan yang bersangkutan mencgalkan perusahaan. Perseroan berharap agar umpan balik yang diterima dapat digunakan untuk menciptakan hubungan dan lingkungan kerja yang lebih harmonis dan menciptakan retensi kanyakan.

The Company realizes that the maturity level of Corporate Culture has a significant impact on the sustainability and success of the Company's business. To improve the quality of the corporate culture and support the creation of a better working environment, the Company and its relevant subsidiaries are committed to opening access to all stakeholders, including employees, to provide constructive feedback, suggestions, and criticism to the Company.

To obtain internal feedback, the Company and its subsidiaries, among other things, conducted surveys to measure the maturity level of Corporate Culture.

At the parent company level, the maturity level of Corporate Culture is measured during the exit interview process. This is considering the number of employees at the parent company is relatively small, so information about Corporate Culture can be obtained relatively easily through informal interactions. This exit interview is conducted to understand the reasons for resignation (whether related to Company Culture, management, and/or other matters), in addition to gathering feedback from employees who have submitted resignation requests before the employee concerned leaves the company. The Company expects that with the feedback received, the Company can develop better positive relationships within the company and increase employee retention.

Di tingkat entitas anak, pengukuran tingkat kematangan Budaya Perusahaan dilaksanan oleh entitas akan Perseroan yang relevant melalui pelaksanaan survei kepuasan kanyakan berkala dan/atau berpartisipasi dalam berbagai ajang penghargaan,seperti penghargaan Best Companies to Work For in Asia yang diraih GEMS untukperiode 2019-2020 dari HR Asia dan penghargaan Great Place to Work yang diraih PT Eka Mas Republik selama 3(tiga)kali berturutturut pada tahun 2022-2024. Penghargaan-penghargaan ini antara lain mengukur pengalaman dan tingkat kepuasan kanyakan terhadap hubungannya dengan manajemen, kolega, dan pekerjaan; dan merupakan pengakuan global kepada perusahaan-perusahaan yang memiliki budaya tempat kerja dengan kepercayaan dan kinerja tinggi.

At the subsidiary level, measurement of the maturity level of Corporate Culture is carried out by the relevant subsidiaries of the Company through the implementation of periodic employee satisfaction surveys and/or participation in various award events, such as the Best Companies to Work For in Asia award won by GEMS for the 2019-2020 period from HR Asia and the Great Place to Work award won by PT PT Eka Mas Republik for 3 (three) consecutive times in 2022-2024. These awards, among others, measure the experience and level of employee satisfaction with their relationship with management, colleagues, and work; and are global recognition for companies that have a workplace culture with high trust and performance.

Profile of the Board of Commissioners

[GRI-2-9-b] ACGS D.2.5.

Sehubungan dengan berakhirnya masa jabatan Dewan Komisarisperiode tahun 2019-2024, pada tahun 2024, Perseroanmelakukan perubahan susunan anggota Dewan Komisaris. Dengan mempertimbangkan rekomendasi dari Dewan Komisaris, Perseroan mengusulkan kepada dan mendapatkan persetujuandari para pemegang saham pada RUPST tanggal 25 Juni 2024untuk menetakapan susunan anggota Dewan Komisarisperiode2024-2029,dengan menambah jumlah anggota Dewan KomisarisPerseroan menjadi sejumlah 6 (enam) orang, di mana 4 (empat)orang di antaranya  $(67\%)$  dari jumiah seluruh anggota DewanKomisaris) adalah Komisaris Independen. Hal ini dilakukan untukmenjaga independensi pengawasan atas pengelolaan Perseroan,mempertimbangkan oleh Dewan Komisaris Perseroan tidak dipimpin oleh seorang Komisaris Independen. ACGSE.2.4. ACGSE.4.2.

[ACGS(B).E.4.1.]

In relation to the end of the term of the Board of Commissioners for the period 2019-2024, in 2024, the Company made changes to the composition of the Board of Commissioners. Considering the recommendations from the Board of Commissioners, the Company proposed to and obtained approval from the shareholders at the AGM on June 25, 2024, to establish the composition of the Board of Commissioners for the 2024-2029 period, by increasing the number of the Company's Board of Commissioners to 6 (six) members, of which 4 (four) members (67% of the total number of Board of Commissioners) are Independent Commissioners. This is done to maintain the independency of oversight over the Company's management, considering that the Company's Board of Commissioners is not led by an Independent Commissioner. ACGS

E.2.4.]ACGS.E.4.2. [ACGS(B).E.4.1.]

# Sumber Daya Manusia Human Resources

SDM memegang peran yang penting dalam memastikan kesuksesan dan keberlanjutan operasi Perseroan dan entitas anak. Setiap kinerja dan kontribusi yang diberikan oleh kanyakan dapat berpengaruh langsung terhadap arah dan laju pertumbuhan perusahaan, baik dalam hal efisiensi operasional, inovasi, maupun daya saing. Oleh karena itu, SDM merupakan bagian esensial dari strategi jangka panjang yang berfokus pada pencapaian nilai tambah bagi perusahaan.

Sebagai wujud komitmen terhadap pengelolaan SDM yang berkualitas, Perseroan secara proaktif memberikan perhatian utama pada perencanaan, pengelolaan, dan pengembangan SDM yang berkelanjutan. Hal ini bertujuan untuk menciptakan lingkungan kerja yang mendukung pengembangan kompetensi, seda memastikan setiap individu dapat berkontribusi secara maksimal dalam mencapai tujuan strategis perusahaan.

Perseroan juga secara rutinpekukanan evaluasi terhadap berbagaisistem dan kebikan yang Berkaitan dengan SDM,seperti prosesrekrutmen & seleksi,penempatan kanyakan,serta memastikanbahwa systemd penilaian kinerja berjalan secara transparan danobjektif.Perseroan berfokus pada pengembangan kompetensi melalui program pelatihan yang relevanta,erta memerhatikanpemberian kompressasi yang kompetitif dan kebikan retensi yangefektif untuk menjaga kepuasan serta loyalitas kanyakan. Tidak kalah penting,Perseroan jugasensantiasa berupaya untukmemperbaharui dan mencatkan systemd kesehatan,keselamatan,dan keamanan kerja juga,untuk menciptakan lingkungan kerja yangaman dan mendukung kesejahteraan seluruh kanyakan.

# Profil Karyawan

Profil karyawan Perseroan dan entitas anak per 31 Desember 2024, 31 Desember 2023, dan 31 Desember 2022 (tidak termasuk karyawan grup GEAR tetapi termasuk karyawan GEMS dan entitas anak, kecuali dinyatakan lain), adalah sebagai berikut:

HR plays an important role in ensuring the success and sustainability of the Company's and its subsidiaries' operations. The performance and contribution made by employees can directly influence the direction and pace of the company's growth, in terms of operational efficiency, innovation, and competitiveness. Therefore, HR serves as an essential part of the long-term strategy focused on achieving added value for the company.

As a manifestation of commitment to quality HR management, the Company proactively gives primary attention to the planning, management, and sustainable development of HR. This aims to create a work environment that supports competency development, as well as ensuring that each individual can contribute maximally to achieving the company's strategic goals.

The Company also regularly evaluates various systems and policies related to HR, such as recruitment & selection, employee placement, and ensures that the performance appraisal system operates transparently and objectively. The Company focuses on competency development through relevant training programs, as well as paying attention to competitive compensation and effective retention policies to maintain employee satisfaction and loyalty. Equally important, the Company also continuously seeks to update and improve the health, safety, and security systems to create a safe work environment that supports the well-being of all employees.

# Rekrutmen dan Seleksi

Perseroan secara Berkala seksutukan evaluasi untuk memastikan bahwa SDM yang dimiliki memiliki pengetahunan, ketrampilan, dan kapasitas yang sesuai, dengan kebutuhan,{serta dalam jumlah yang memadai. Berdasarkan telah evaluasi, Perseroan mengidentifikasikan ada akan tinknya kebutuhan posisi bara, penambahan tenaga kerja, dan/atau rotasi kepada pergantian karyawan untuk mendukung pencapaian target dan tujuan strategis perusahaan.

Proses rekrutmen dilakukan untuk menarik kandidat yang memiliki kompetensi, pengalaman, dan karakter yang sejalan dengan kualifikasi jabatan yang dibutuhkan, sebelum dilanjutkan ke的前提下 seleksi berikutnya.

Secara umum, proses rekrutmen dan seleksi karyawan mencakup tahapan-tahapan-Sebagai berikut:

- Pemeriksaan Berkas Lamaran  
Tes Psikologis  
Tes Kompetensi Teknis  
Wawancara  
- Pemeriksaaan Kesehatan  
- Penerimaan dan Orientasi

Dengan proses ini, Perseroan bergomitmen untuk memastikan oleh setiap kanyakan yang bergabung memiliki potensi untuk berkontribusi secara maksimal dalam mendukung visi dan misi Perseroan.

# Recruitment and Selection

The Company periodically conducts evaluations to ensure that its HR possesses the appropriate knowledge, skills, and capacity, according to needs and adequate numbers. Based on the evaluation results, the Company identifies the need for new positions, additional workforce, and/or employee rotation or replacement to support the achievement of the company's targets and strategic goals.

The recruitment process is carried out to attract prospective employees with the competencies, experiences, and characters that match the required qualifications for the position, before proceeding to the next selection stage.

In general, the employee recruitment and selection process includes the following stages:

Application Form Screening  
Psychological Test  
Technical Test  
Interviews  
Medical Check-up  
Hiring and Onboarding

With this process, the Company is committed to ensuring that every employee who joins has the potential to contribute maximally in supporting the Company's vision and mission.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/a010d1e5792735800f7697783e5915757197cb0ee014fa75efc7de9b92241fdf.jpg)

# Program Pengenalan Perusahaan bagi Karyawan Baru

Perseroan melaksanan program pengenalan perusahaan bagi karyawan Barang untuk memberikan pengetahuan umum tersebut Perseroan.

Program ini dirancang untuk memastikan bahwa setiap karylawanbaru dapat beradaptasi dengan baik dan memahami sepenuhnya visi, misi, serta nilai-nilai yang dipegang oleh Perseroan. Dalam program pengenalan ini, karylawanEARU dan diperkenalkan dengan berbagai aspek penting,seperti pemaparan mengenai nilai-nilai perusahaan yang mendasari setup keputusan dan tindakan, pemahaman tentang kode etik yang menjadi pedoman perilaku di lingkungan kerja, serta wawasan menyeluruh mengenai bidang usaha dan kebujanan SDM. Selainitu, peserta juga akan diberikan penjelasan yang jelas tentang uraian umum mengenai tugas dan tanggung jawab yang akan diemban dalam jabatanmereka.

Melalui pelaksanaan program, Perseroan berharap setup karyawan dapat memiliki pemahaman yang kuat mengenai budaya dan nilai perusahaan, Seeingga dapat berkontribusi secara maksimal terhadap pencapaian tujuan bersama.

# Program Pendidikan dan Pelatihan [GRI 404-2]

Perseroan mendukung pengembangan professtional setup kanyak希望大家能够参与，因为您将会得到更多的奖励。

Pengadaan pelatihan dikoordinasikan oleh divisi SDM Perseroan sekurangnya 2 (dua) kali dalam setahun. Perseroan juga mendorong divisi SDM untuk proaktif dalam merancang dan melaksanan program-program pelatihanbaru.

Program pendidikan dan pelatihan dapat berupa peningkatan keterampilan lunak dan/atau keterampilan teknis, yang mencakup aspek pengetahunan, ketrampilan, dan sikap perilaku. Hal ini dirancang dan diadakan sejalan dengan pertumbuhan bisnis Perseroan dan entitas anak.

Melalui program pendidikan dan pelatihan ini, Perseroan berupaya membrangun SDM yang tidak dapatanya kompeten, tetapi juga memilikisikap dan karakter yang sesuai dengan budaya perusahan,sehingga mampu Berkontribusi optimal dalam mencapai tujuan jangka panjang.

# Induction Program for New Employees

The Company conducts a corporate induction program for new employees to provide a general overview of the Company.

This program is designed to ensure that every new employee can adapt well and fully understand the vision, mission, and values upheld by the Company. In this orientation program, new employees will be introduced to various important aspects, such as an overview of the company's values that underpin every decision and action, an understanding of the code of ethics that serves as a behavioral guideline in the workplace, and a comprehensive insight into the business field and HR policies. In addition, participants will also be given a clear explanation of the general description of the duties and responsibilities they will undertake in their positions.

Through the implementation of the program, the Company hopes that every employee can have a strong understanding of the company's culture and values, so they can contribute maximally to the achievement of common goals.

# Education and Training Program GRI 404-2 AC6SC.6.2

The Company supports the professional development of each employee by involving them in various relevant educational and general training programs that are useful for developing each employee's competencies to support the successful execution of their work. Each employee is encouraged to continuously update and enhance their skills and knowledge in accordance with industry developments and job requirements.

The procurement of training is coordinated by the Company's HR division at least twice a year. The Company also encourages the HR division to be proactive in designing and implementing new training programs.

Education and training programs can include the enhancement of soft skills and/or technical skills, which encompass aspects of knowledge, skills, and behavioral attitudes. These are designed and conducted in line with the growth of the Company's business and its subsidiaries.

Through this education and training program, the Company seeks to build human resources who are not only competent but also possess attitudes and character that align with the company's culture, thereby being able to contribute optimally to achieving long-term goals.
