# Penghasilan (Beban) Lain-Lain

Penghasilan (beban) lain-lain terutama berasal dari pendapatan bunga, beban bunga, keuntungan (kerugian) selisih kurs mata uang asing, dan ekuitas pada rugi bersih investasi.

The Group's operating expenses consisted of selling expenses, general and administrative expenses, and exploration expenses.

In 2024, the Group recorded operating expenses of USD 577.7 million or decreased by  $29.3\%$  from the operating expenses in 2023 of USD 817.5 million. The decrease was mainly due to the decrease in selling expenses of USD 159.1 million and general and administrative expenses of USD 80.8 million.

The decrease in selling expenses in 2024 was mainly due to the decrease of freight charges of USD 141.1 million and decrease in marketing and communication expenses of USD 19.5 million.

The decrease in general and administrative expenses in 2024 was mainly due to the decrease in salaries and allowances by USD 58.4 million, decrease in professional fees by USD 23.0 million, and decrease in insurance by USD 11.6 million net-off with the increase in tax and licensing expenses by USD 11.9 million.

In 2023, the Group recorded operating expenses of USD 817.5 million or decreased by  $5.0\%$  from the operating expenses in 2022 of USD 860.9 million. The decrease was mainly due to the decrease in general and administrative expenses of USD 51.3 million net-off, mainly with an increase in selling expenses of USD 8.3 million.

The increase in selling expenses in 2023 was mainly due to the increase in freight charges of USD 2.5 million, an increase in stockpile services expenses of USD 6.9 million, an increase in salaries and allowances expenses of USD 3.2 million, netted off mainly with a decrease in marketing and communication expenses of USD 3.7 million.

The decrease in general and administrative expenses in 2023 was mainly due to the decrease in salaries and allowances by USD 25.5 million, decrease in tax and licensing expenses by USD 28.2 million and decrease in professional fees by USD 19.2 million.

Grup mencatatkan penghasilan (beban) lain-lain bersih sebesar USD 59,6 juta pada tahun 2024 atau naik  $180.8\%$  jika dibandingkan dengan tahun 2023 yang sebesar (USD 73,8 juta). Kenaikan penghasilan (beban) lain-lain bersih Grup terutama disebabkan oleh kenaikan ekuitas pada laba (rugi) bersih ventura bersama sebesar USD 55,7 juta, kenaikan pendapatan bunga sebesar USD 19,4 juta, dan kenaikan lain - lain bersih sebesar USD 20,5 juta dikurangi penurunan beban bunga sebesar USD 46,6 juta.

Grup mencatatkan beban lain-lain bersih sebesar USD 73,8 juta pada tahun 2023 atau turun  $58.2\%$  jika dibandingkan dengan tahun 2022 yang sebesar USD 176,7 juta. Penurunan beban lain-lain bersih Grup terutama disebabkan oleh penurunan beban bunga sebesar USD 51,4 juta, dikurangi dengan kenaikan pendapatan bunga sebesar USD 18,3 juta dan kenaikan keuntungan selisih kurs matauang asing -bersih sebesar USD 18,1 juta.

# Arus Kas dari Aktivitas Operasi

Kas bersih yang dipereleh Grup dari aktivitas operasi pada tahun 2024 adalah sebesar USD 693,4 juta. Arus kas positif Grup dari aktivitas operasi pada tahun 2024 tersebut menurun  $32.8\%$  jika dibandingkan dengan tahun 2023 yang mencatatkan arus kas positif dari aktivitas operasi sebesar USD 1.031,1 juta. Penurunan tersebut disebabkan terutama karena penurunan pemberimaan dari pelanggan sebesar USD 1.776,4 juta, dikurangi dengan penurunan pembayaran kepada kontraktor, pemasok, karyawan dan lainnya sebesar USD 1.260,1 juta, dan penurunan pembayaran pajak penghasilan badan sebesar USD 178,5 juta.

Kas bersih yang dipereleh Grup dari aktivitas operasi pada tahun 2023 adalah sebesar USD 1.031,1 juta. Arus kas positif Grup dari aktivitas operasi pada tahun 2023 tersebut menurun  $50.7\%$  jika dibandingkan dengan tahun 2022 yang mencatatkan arus kas positif dari aktivitas operasi sebesar USD 2.092,2 juta. Penurunan tersebut disebabkan terutama karena penurunan pemberimaan dari pelanggan sebesar USD 1.209,6 juta, dikurangi dengan penurunan pembayaran kepada kontraktor, pemasok, dan lainnya sebesar USD 150,5 juta, dan kenaikan pembayaran pajak penghasilan badan sebesar USD 27,0 juta.

# Arus Kas untuk Aktivitas Investasi

Kas bersih Grup yang digunakan untuk aktivitas investasi pada tahun 2024 adalah sebesar USD 594,9 juta, naik  $0.5\%$  dibandingkan dengan tahun 2023 yang mencatatkan kas bersih yg digunakan untuk aktivitas investasi sebesar USD 592,0 juta, disebabkan terutama karena kenaikan piutang lain - lain sebesar USD 400,0 juta, penurunan penambahan investasi jangka panjang sebesar USD 134,2 juta, penurunan penerimaan dari pelepasan investasi entitas anak sebesar USD 275,4 juta, dikurangi kenaikan penambahan aset tetap sebesar USD 58,2 juta, penurunan perubahan dalam aset lain - lain sebesar USD 38,6 juta dan penurunan dampak pelepasan entitas tersebut sebesar USD 692,8 juta.

Kas bersih Grupy yang digunakan untuk aktivitas investasi pada tahun 2023 adalah sebesar USD 592,0 juta, turun  $65.7\%$  dibandingkan dengan tahun 2022 yang mencatatkan kas bersih yg digunakan untuk aktivitas investasi sebesar USD 1.726,5 juta, disebabkan terutama karena penurunan penambahan investasi jangka panjang sebesar USD 387,1 juta, penurunan terhadap pembayaran imbalan yang ditangguhkan sebesar USD 100,0 juta, penurunan pembayaran atas akuisisi entitas anak setelah dikurangi saldo kas dan setara kas pada tanggal akuisisi sebesar USD 1.223,4 juta, dikurangi keaikan penambahan aset tetap sebesar USD 93,9 juta, keaikan pereimaan dari pelepasan investasi entitas anak sebesar USD 275,4 juta dan dampak pelepasan entitas anak sebesar USD 692,8 juta.

In 2023, the Group recorded a negative cash flow of USD 470.0 million. The negative cash flow was contributed by the negative cash flow received from investing and financing activities amounting to USD 592.0 million and USD 909.1 million, respectively, net-off with the positive cash flow used in operating activities amounting to USD 1,031.1 million.

# Cash Flows from Operating Activities

Net cash provided by the Group from operating activities in 2024 amounted to USD 693.4 million. The Group's positive net cash flow from operating activities in 2024 decreased by  $32.8\%$  compared to 2023 that recorded positive cash flow from operating activities of USD 1,031.1 million. The decrease was primarily contributed by the decrease in the receipts from customers by USD 1,776.4 million, net-off with the decrease in payments to contractors, suppliers, employees, and others by USD 1,260.1 million, and decrease of payments of corporate income tax by USD 178.5 million.

Net cash provided by the Group from operating activities in 2023 amounted to USD 1,031.1 million. The Group's net positive cash flow from operating activities in 2023 decreased by  $50.7\%$  compared to 2022 that recorded positive cash flow from operating activities of USD 2,092.2 million. The decrease was primarily contributed by the decrease in the receipts from customers by USD 1,209.6 million, net-off with the decrease in payments to contractors, suppliers, and others by USD 150.5 million, and an increase in payments of corporate income tax by USD 27.0 million.

# Cash Flows for Investing Activities

The Group's net cash used in investing activities in 2024 amounted to USD 594.9 million, increased by  $0.5\%$  compared to 2023 that recorded net cash flows used in investing activities amounted to USD 592.0 million, mainly due to the increase in other receivable by USD 400.0 million, decrease of addition in long-term investments by USD 134.2 million, and decrease in proceeds from sale of investment in a subsidiaries by USD 275.4 million, net off with the increase in additions to fixed assets of USD 58.2 million, a decrease in changes in other assets of USD 38.6 million, and a decrease in effect of disposal of subsidiaries of USD 692.8 million.

The Group's net cash used in investing activities in 2023 amounted to USD 592.0 million, decreased by  $65.7\%$  compared to 2022 that recorded net cash flows used in investing activities amounted to USD 1,726.5 million, mainly due to the decrease of addition in long-term investments by USD 387.1 million, decrease of payment for deferred consideration amounted to USD 100.0 million, and decrease of payment for acquisition of a subsidiary net-off cash and cash equivalent balance at acquisition date amounted to USD 1,223.4 million, net-off with the increase of acquisitions of property, plant and equipment by USD 93.9 million, increase of proceeds from sale of investment in a subsidiaries by USD 275.4 million and disposal subsidiaries by USD 692.8 million.

# Kemampuan Membayar Utang

Grup merujuk pada rasio likuiditas dan rasio solvabilititas untuk mengukur kemampuan penyelesaian kewajiban.

Rasio likuiditas menunjukkan kemampuan untuk memenuhi kewajiban keuangan yang harus segera dipenuhi. Rasio likuiditas yang digunakan Grup adalah rasio lancar, yaitu dengan inginur kemampuan aktiva lancar Grup dalam membayar kewajiban jangka pendek. Pada tahun 2024, rasio lancar Grup adalah sebesar  $233.1\%$ , mengalami kenaikan dari  $172.7\%$  pada tahun 2023. Kenaikan ini terutama disebabkan karena kenaikan aset lancar sebagai bagaimana telah dijelaskan di bagian bersangkutan.

Rasio solvabilitas dimaksudkan untukCCCCCCukur sampai seperapa jauh aktiva atop modal Grup dapat membiayai pinjaman. Rasio solvabilitas yang digunakan Grup adalah rasio liabilitas terhadap ekuitas dan rasio liabilitas terhadap aset. Pada tahun 2024, rasio liabilitas terhadap ekuitas dan rasio liabilitas terhadap aset adalah sebesar  $90.1\%$  dan  $47.4\%$ , mengalami kenaikan dari  $78.0\%$  dan  $43.8\%$  pada tahun 2023. Kenaikan ini terutama disebabkan karena kenaikan liabilitas jangka pendek dan liabilitas jangka panjang seabagaimana telah dijelaskan di bagian bersangkutan.

Grup memiliki kemampuan untuk memenuhi kewajibannya pada tanggal jatuh tempo.

# Solvency

The Group refers to the liquidity and solvency ratios to measure the ability to pay off its liabilities.

The liquidity ratio shows the ability to meet the financial obligations that must be met immediately. The liquidity ratio used by the Group is the current ratio, i.e., by measuring the ability of the Group's current assets to pay its short-term liabilities. In 2024, the Group's current ratio was  $233.1\%$ , which increased from  $172.7\%$  in 2023. The increase was mainly due to an increase in current assets as described in the relevant section.

The solvency ratio is intended to measure to which extent the assets or capital of the Group can support the loan. The solvency ratios used by the Group are the liabilities-to-equity ratio ratio and liabilities-to-asset ratio. In 2024, the liabilities-to-equity ratio and liabilities-to-asset ratio were  $90.1\%$  and  $47.4\%$ , increased from  $78.0\%$  and  $43.8\%$  in 2023, respectively. These increases were mainly due to an increase in current liabilities and non-current liabilities as described in the relevant section.

The Group has the capability to fulfil the payment of its obligations on the due dates.

# Receivables Collectability

The Company's trade accounts receivable turnover ratio in 2024 was 10.2 times, decreased compared to 11.4 times in 2023.

The Group does not have any issues related to the collectability of its trade accounts receivable, as most of the Group's receivables are classified as current receivables.

Pada tahun 2024, Grup mencadangkan USD 7,2 juta sebagai cadangan kerugian penurunan nilai untuk piutang usaha.

Berdasarkan evaluasi terhadap kolektabilitas piutang usaha, manajemen perpendapat kepada cadangan kerugian penurunan nilai@cukup untuk menuup pemungkan kerugian dari tidak tertagihnya piutang usaha. Manajemen juga perpendapat kepada tidak terdapat risiko terkonsentrasi secara signifikan atas piutang usaha dari pihak ketiga.

# Piutang Lain-Lain Jangka Panjang

Pada tanggal 31 Desember 2024, Grup tidak memiliki piutang usaha jangka panjang.

Grup memiliki piutang lain-lain jangka panjang sebesar USD 0,5 juta pada tanggal 31 Desember 2024, dimana angka piutang tersebut but tidak terdapat cadangan kerugian penurunan nilai. Berdasarkan evaluasi terhadap kolektabilitas piutang lain-lain jangka panjang, manajemen berpendapat kepada cadangan kerugian penurunan nilaicekup untuk menutup pemungkanan kerugian dari tidak tertagihnya piutang lain-lain jangka panjang.

# Struktur Modal dan Kebijakan atas Struktur Modal

In 2024, the Group had reserved USD 7.2 million as allowance for impairment loss of trade accounts receivable.

Based on the evaluation of trade accounts receivable collectability, management believes that the allowance for impairment loss was adequate to cover the possibility of loss due to uncollectible receivables. Management also believes that there was no significant concentrated risk on trade accounts receivable from third parties.

# Long-Term Other Receivables

As of December 31, 2024, the Group had no long-term trade receivables.

The Group had long-term other receivables that amounted to USD 0.5 million as of December 31, 2024, which the receivables figure does not include an allowance for impairment. Based on the evaluation of long-term other receivables collectability, management believes that the allowance for impairment loss was adequate to cover the possibility of loss due to uncollectible long-term other receivables.

Perseroan bergomitmen untuk mengoptimalkan struktur modal untuk membiayai aset tidak lancar Seeingga diharapkan dapat memaksimalkan nilai pemegang saham.

# Capital Structure

The Group's capital structure was primarily from equity. As of December 31, 2024,  $52.6\%$  of the capital was equity.

Long-term debt ratio may increase in the next few years due to the possibility of increasing bank loans to finance new projects.

The Company believes that its capital structure remains at a reasonable and healthy level.

# Capital Structure Policy

The Company is committed to optimizing its capital structure to finance non-current assets with the expectation of maximizing shareholder value.

Perseroan tersebutakan sumber pembiayaan belanja modal dan projek-proyekbaru dengan urutan sebagai berikut: kas internal, utang jangka pendek, utang jangka panjang, dan penerbitan sahambaru.

Perseroan senantiasa berupaya memperhatikan hak-hak kreditur dengan memenuhi kewajiban pembayaran secara tersebut waktu, menjaga rasio keuangan tertentu, dan menyediakan informasi yang dibutuhkan.

# Perbandingan Antara Target dan Pencapaian Tahun 2023 dan 2024 Serta Target Tahun 2025

The Company prioritizes sources for financing the capital expenditures and new projects in the following order: internal cash, short-term debt, long-term debt, and issuance of new shares.

The Company seeks to always take into account the rights of creditors by meeting its payment obligations in a timely manner, maintaining certain financial ratios, and delivering the required information.

# Kebijakan dan Pembagian Dividen

Perseroan dapat membagikan dividen tingga  $30 \%$ dari LABa bersih setelah pajak. Pembagian dividen mempertimbangkan kecukupan modal, rencana belanja modal, dan persyaratan pembiayaan, dengan memperhatikan peraturan perundang- undangan yang berlaku dan persetujuan para pemegang saham.

Sampai saat ini, Perseroan belum membagikan dividen kepada pemegang saham Perseroan, mengat Perseroan telah memiliki kebutuhan Dana yang@cukupbesaruntukmembiayaiproyek-proyek BARU DI ENTitas anak Perseroan.

# Dampak Nilai Tukar Mata Uang Asing

Dampak nilai tukar mata uang asing timbul karena transaksi yang dilakukan dalam mata uang selain mata uang fungssional yang berasal dari aset dan reliabilitas moniter dalam mata uang asing terutama mata uang Rupiah. Keuntungan/kerugian selisih kurs yang timbul dikreditkan/dibebankan pada laporan LABa rugi dan penghasilan komprehensif lain konsolidasian.

Pada tanggal 31 Desember 2024, 31 Desember 2023, dan 31 Desember 2022, kurs konversi yakni kurs tengah Bank Indonesia untuk matauang USD terhadap Rupiah masing-masing telah sebesarRp16.162 per USD,Rp15.416 per USD,dan Rp15.731 per USD.

# Dividend Policy and Distribution

The Company may distribute dividends up to  $30\%$  of its net profit after tax. The distribution of dividends shall take into account capital adequacy, capital expenditure plan, as well as financial covenant, subject to the prevailing regulations and shareholders' approval.

To date, the Company has not distributed dividends to its shareholders, considering that the Company still requires substantial capital expenditure to finance new projects in the Company's subsidiaries.

# Impact of Foreign Currency Exchange Rates

The impact of foreign currency exchange rates arose from transactions that were conducted in currencies other than the functional currency derived from assets and monetary liabilities denominated in foreign currencies, especially Rupiah. Gain/loss arose due to the difference in the exchange rate was credited/charged to the consolidated statements of profit or loss and other comprehensive income.

On December 31, 2024, December 31, 2023, and December 31, 2022, the conversion middle rate of Bank Indonesia for the USD against the Rupiah amounted to Rp16,162 per USD, Rp15,416 per USD, and Rp15,731 per USD, respectively.

# Informasi dan Fakta Material yang Terjadi Setelah Tanggal Laporan Akuntan

Pada tanggal 6 Februi 2025, Perusahaan menandatangani akta perjanjian kredit dengan BNI dengan dengan tidak maksimum Rp 1.000.000.000.000 untuk jangka waktu 12 (dua belas) bulan. Fasilitas kredit tersebut dijamin antara lain dengan aset Perusahaan.

# Informasi Kelangsungan Usaha

Pada tahun 2024, Perseroan telah makukan evaluasi terhadap kelangsungan usaha Grup, dengan mempertimbangkan antara lain kinerja operasi dan keuangan, manajemen, ketersediaan sumber daya, masalah internal, dan perkara hukum yang dihadapi Grup.

Berdasarkan evaluasi yang telah dilakukan, Perseroan menjadi bahwa pada tahun 2024, tidak terdapat hal-hal yang berpotensi berpengaruh signifikan terhadap kelangsungan usaha Grup.

Untuk melindungi risiko manajemen dan meminimalkan potensi kerugian akibat perubahan dan/atau kejadian-kejadian tidak terduga, Perseroan telah merancang strategi pengelolaan kegiatan operasional dan risiko usaha yang terkoordinasi dan terintegrasi secara strategistis. Grup memiliki kemampuan dan sumber daya yang;cukup memadai untuk mempertahankan keberlanjutan usaha di tahun-tahun mendatang.

# Material Information and Facts Occurring After The Date of The Independent Auditors' Report

On February 6, 2025, the Company signed a deed on credit facility agreement with BNI with a maximum amount of Rp 1,000,000,000,000 for twelve (12) month period. The credit facility is secured by, among others, the Company's assets.

# Going Concern Information

In 2024, the Company had evaluated the continuity of the Group's business, considering, among others, the operational and financial performance, management, the availability of resources, internal problems, and legal cases faced by the Group.

Based on evaluations that have been conducted, the Company considers that in 2024 there were no matters that could potentially give a significant impact on the Group's business continuity.

To protect management risks and minimize potential losses due to changes and/or unforeseen events, the Company has designed a strategy for managing operational activities and business risks that is coordinated and strategically integrated. The Group has sufficient capabilities and resources to maintain business continuity in the coming years.

# 5 GOVERNANSI KORPORAT CORPORATE GOVERNANCE

# Penerapan Governansi Korporat

Corporate Governance Implementation

Perseroan berkomitmen untuk secara konsisten dan menyeluruh mencapakan prinsip-prinsip serta praktik-praktik Good Corporate Governance (GCG) terbaik untuk memastikan pengelolaan internal yang transparan dan akuntabel serta memperhatikan kepentingan seluruh pemangku kepentingan, guna menciptakan hubungan yang harmonis dan berkelanjutan dengan semua pihak terkait. [ACGS D.2.6.]

Perseroan体系建设
Perseroan mengadopsi kerangka Governansi, Risiko, dan Kepatuhan dan berpedoman antara lain pada 8 (delapan) prinsip governansi korporat Indonesia yang bersumber pada 4 (empat) pilar governansi korporat sebagaimana tercantum pada Pedoman Umum Governansi Korporat Indonesia 2021 yang diterbitkan oleh Komite Nasional Kebijakan Governansi.

Dengan pengerapan governansi korporat yang baik, diharapkan dapat mencapatkan daya saing nasional dan internasional, memperkuat kepercayaan pemangku kepentingan, mendorong pengelolaan yang profesionai dan efektif dengan berlandaskan pada nilai moral dan tanggung jawab perusahaan dan kepadauman kepada peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku, meminimalkan penyimpangan, dan mendukung pertumbuhan bisnis Perseroan yang berkelanjutan.

# [GI-2-27]

# Struktur Governansi Korporat [GRI-2-5-a] [GRI-2-9-a]

Perseroan memahami bahwa governansi korporat terintegrasi adalah krusial untuk memastikan bahwa operasional entities tidak dapat bertumbu dengan baik, dengan tetap memperhatikan peraturan dan prinsip-prinsip governansi korporat yang baik.

Perseroan telah memiliki struktur perusahaan dan struktur organisasi yang terintegrasi, yang Perseroan nilai dapat mendukung integrasi, sinergi, dan komunikasi yang efektif di seluruh tingkatan di berbagai fungsi (termasuk fungsi manajemen sumber daya manusia, manajemen risiko, kepadahan, dan tanggung jawab sosial perusahaan) di dalam Perseroan secara koheren, efektif, efisien yang memampukan Perseroanmerepon tantangan dengan lebih baik untuk mencapai tujuan Perseroan.

Perseroan memiliki 3 (tiga) organ governansi korporat utama, yaitu RUPS, Dewan Komisaris, dan Direksi. Dibantu oleh organ-organ pendukung, yaitu Komite Audit, Komite Manajemen Risiko, Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi, Unit Audit Internal, Unit Manajemen Risiko, dan Sekretaris Perusahaan. Ketiga organ governansi korporat utama tersebut melaksanan fungsi pengendalian internal, manajemen risiko, dan kepadauhan.

The Company is committed to consistently and thoroughly implementing the best principles and practices of Good Corporate Governance (GCG) to ensure transparent and accountable internal management and consider the interests of all stakeholders, to create harmonious and sustainable relationships with all related parties. ACGS D.2.6.

The Company adopts the Governance, Risk, and Compliance framework and is guided, among others, by the 8 (eight) principles of Indonesian corporate governance adopted from the 4 (four) pillars of corporate governance stated in the General Guidelines of Indonesian Corporate Governance 2021 published by the National Committee on Governance Policy.

Implementing good corporate governance is expected to enhance national and international competitiveness, strengthen stakeholder trust, encourage professional and effective management based on moral values and corporate responsibility, and compliance with prevailing laws and regulations, minimize deviations, and support the Company's sustainable business growth. [GRI-2-27]

# Corporate Governance Structure [GRI-2-5-a] [GRI-2-9-a]

The Company realizes that integrated corporate governance is crucial to ensure that the operations of subsidiaries can grow well while still adhering to regulations and principles of good corporate governance.

The Company has an integrated corporate structure and organizational structure, which the Company believes can support integration, synergy, and effective communication across all levels in various functions (including human resource management, risk management, compliance, and corporate social responsibility) within the Company in a coherent, effective, and efficient manner that enables the Company to respond to challenges better to achieve its objectives.

The Company consists of 3 (three) main organs of corporate governance, namely the GMS, the Board of Commissioners, and the Board of Directors. Assisted by supporting organs, namely the Audit Committee, the Risk Management Committee, the Nomination and Remuneration Committee, the Internal Audit Unit, the Risk Management Unit, and the Corporate Secretary. The three main organs of corporate governance carry out the internal control, risk management, and compliance functions.

This policy contains standard procedures for procurement of goods and/or services starting from the supplier/contractor's selection process by the requirements set by the Company and/or subsidiaries, the appointment process, delivery of goods and/or services process, and the assessment process.

# Board Resolution Policy

This policy is prepared with the aim to ensure that every important and material decision-making, including decisions related to merger, consolidation, acquisition, spin-off, and/or investment has been carried out based on the principle of prudence by considering the best interests of the Company, its shareholders, and other stakeholders.

# RUPS

GMS

RUPS adalah organ Perseroan yang memiliki kewenangan yang tidak dilimpahkan kepada Dewan Komisaris dan/atau Direksi, sesuai dengan beatasan yang ditetapkan dalam Anggaran Dasar Perseroanserta peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku.

RUPS juga menjadi forum bagi para pemegang saham untuk menc gunakan hakmereka dalam menuyampaikan pendapat dan memperoleh informasi terkait Perseroan, selama hal tersebut berhubungan dengan agenda RUPS dan didasarkan pada prinip keberlanjutan serta kepentingan terbaik bagi Perseroan.

Perseroan seksuasi semasa mengusahan dan pengurusan yang telah dilakukan sebagai orang untuk perbaikan struktur, proses, dan tidak gencpan. Perseperan yang dengan persekitas ini mengusi kategori yang terintegrasi di rumah dan rumah yang mengusahan.

GMS is an organ of the Company holding the authorities that are not given to the Board of Commissioners and/or the Board of Directors within the limits specified in the Company's Articles of Association and the prevailing laws and regulations.

GMS is a forum for shareholders to be able to exercise their rights in expressing opinions and obtaining information regarding the Company, provided that it is related to the agenda of the GMS and based on the sustainability and best interests of the Company.

The Company conducts periodic evaluations of the supervisory and management actions taken as one of the feedback mechanisms for the Company to improve the structure, processes, and outcomes of corporate governance in the future. As one form of accountability, the Company summarizes the results of integrated corporate governance in the financial statements as well as the consolidated annual reports of the Company and its subsidiaries, which have been submitted by the Company for approval and ratification by the shareholders at the Company's AGM.

# Hak-Hak Pemegang Saham

# Rights of Shareholders

Perseroan hijya memiliki 1 (satu) seri saham. Setiap pemegang saham Perseroan memiliki hak suara yang sama, di mana setiap 1 (satu) saham memiliki 1(satu) hak suara.[ACGS A.5.1] [ACGS(P)4.2.] [ACGS(P)4.3.]

Dengan memperhatikan ketentuan sebagaimana tercantum dalam Anggaran Dasar Perseroan dan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku, Perseroan memberikan kesempatan kepada para pemegang saham untuk mendapatkan hak yang setara, antara lain sebagai berikut:

- hak untuk meminta penyelenggaraan RUPS [ACGS A.2.15.]  
- hak untuk mengusulkan mata acara RUPS, termasuk mengajukan calon anggota Direksi/Dewan Komisaris, sejauh memenuhi persyaratan dan usulan telah diterima oleh Direksi Perseroan selambat-lambatnya 7 (tujuan) hari sebelum tanggal pemanggilan RUPS [ACGS A.2.2] [ACGS A.2.15].  
- hak untuk menghadiri RUPS  
- hak untuk memberikan kuasa kepada pihak lain untuk hadir dalam RUPS dalam hal pemegang saham yang berhak hadir dalam RUPS tersebut berhalangan hadir  
- hak untuk memperoleh informasi keuangan Perseroan dan materi RUPS  
- hak untuk pengajukan pertanyaan, pendapat, ata saran yang berhubungan dengan mata acara yang dibicarakan  
- hak untuk memberikan suara (setuju/tidak setuju/abstain) pada setiap usulan mata acara RUPS [ACGS A.2.]  
- hak untuk memperoleh pembagian dividen, dalam hal RUPS memutusan untuk membagikan keuntungan Perseroan kepada pemegang saham  
- hak untuk makukan komunikasi dengan manajemen dan/atau pemegang saham lainnya [ACGS(P)A.2.1]

Pemegang saham berhak untuk berpartisipasi secara efektif dan memberikan suara dalam RUPSserta memperoleh informasi mengenai aturan-aturan, termasuk prosedur pemungutan suara. Perseroan menyediakan materi RUPS dan/atau informasi material lain yang relevant dan lengkap - termasuk profil anggota Dewan Komisaris dan/atau Direksi dalam hal terdapat mata acara kerkit penggangkatan untuk pengangkatan kembali anggota Dewan Komisaris dan/atau Direksi dalam RUPS, seabagaimana diperlukan pemegang saham untuk pengambilan keputusan di situs web Perseroan, situs web BEI, dan situs web penyedia e-RUPS sejak tanggal pemanggilan RUPS. Perseroan membagikan tata tertib RUPS, termasuk di:dalamnya tata cara pemungutan suara, kepada pemegang saham dan/atau khasanya yang hadir dan membacakan Tata tertib RUPS sebelum RUPS dimulai. [ACGS A.2.4] [ACGS A.6.3.]

The Company only issues 1 (one) class of shares. Each shareholder of the Company has the same voting rights, of which each share represents 1 (one) voting right. [ACGS A.5.1] [ACGS(P)4.2] [ACGS(P)4.3.]

By considering the provisions as stated in the Company's Articles of Association and applicable laws and regulations, the Company provides shareholders with the opportunity to obtain equal rights, among others, as follows:

right to request for the holding of a GMS [ACGS A.2.15.]  
- right to propose GMS agenda, including nominating candidates for the Board of Directors/the Board of Commissioners, as long as they meet the requirements and the proposal have been received by the Company's Board of Directors no later than 7 (seven) days before the date of the invitation to the GMS [ACGS A.2.2] [ACGS A.2.15.]  
right to attend the GMS  
- right to grant power of attorney to other parties to attend the GMS in the event that the shareholders who are entitled to attend the GMS are unable to attend  
- right to obtain financial information of the Company and the material of the GMS  
- right to submit questions, opinions, or suggestions, related to the relevant agenda  
- right to vote (agree/disagree/abstain) on each proposal of the GMS agenda [ACGS A.2.]  
- right to receive dividends, in the event that the GMS decides to distribute the Company's profits to the shareholders  
right to communicate with management and/or other shareholders [ACGS(P) A.2.1.]

Shareholders have the right to participate effectively and vote at the GMS and obtain information regarding the rules, including voting procedures. The Company provides GMS materials and/or other relevant and complete material information - including the profiles of members of the Board of Commissioners and/or Directors in the event that there are agenda items related to the appointment or re-appointment of members of the Board of Commissioners and/or the Board of Directors at the GMS, as required by shareholders for decision-making on the Company's website, IDX's website, and the e-GMS provider's website since the date of notice of the GMS. The Company distributes the GMS rules, including voting procedures, to shareholders and/or their proxies who are present and read out the GMS rules before the GMS begins. ACGS A.2.4 ACGS A.6.3.

# Hak-Hak Pemegang Saham

# Rights of Shareholders

Perseroan Berkomitmen untuk senantiasa memberikan perilakuan yang adil kepada setiap pemegang saham, sedingga mereka dapat melaksanan hak-haknya. Hak untuk berpartisipasi dalam RUPS diberikan kepada pemegang saham yang tercatat dalam;dafar pemegang saham Perseroan yang diterbitkan oleh Biro Administrrasi Efek Perseroan.[G-08]

The Company is committed to always providing fair treatment to every shareholder, so that they can exercise their rights. The right to participate in the GMS is granted to shareholders listed in the Company's shareholder registry issued by the Company's Securities Administration Bureau.[G-08]

Perseroan@mengumumkan pemberitahuan dan pemanggilan RUPS dalam Bahasa Indonesia dan Bahasa Ingris melalui situs web Perseroan, situs web BEI, serta situs web penyedia e-RUPS. Dalam pemanggilan RUPS, Perseroan menyampaikan atas dan penjelasan untuk setupi mata acara yang membutuhkan persetujuan dari pemegang saham. Untuk transaksiseperti merger, akuisisi, dan/atau pengambilihan yang memerlukan persetujuan pemegang saham, Perseroan menujuk pihak independen guna makukan penilaian dan memberikan pendapat kewajaranatas transaksi tersebut. Laporan telah penilaian dan pendapat kewajaran dari pihak independen tersebut disampaikan kepada otoritas yang berwenang dan diunggah di situs web BEI{serta situs web Perseroan, bersamaan dengan pemberitahuan atau pemanggilan RUPS, seksuai dengan relevansinya.[ACGS A.2.14.] [ACGS A.3.1.]

The Company publishes the announcement and notice for the GMS in Indonesian and English through the Company's website, the IDX's website, and the e-GMS provider's website. In the notice of the GMS, the Company provides reasons and explanations for each agenda item that requires shareholders' approval. For transactions such as mergers, acquisitions, and/or takeovers that require shareholders' approval, the Company appoints an independent party to conduct an assessment and provide a fair opinion on the transactions. The report of the assessment results and fairness opinion from the independent party is submitted to the relevant authorities and uploaded on the IDX's website as well as the Company's website, along with the announcement and notice for the GMS, as applicable [ACGS A.2.14.] [ACGS A.3.1.]

Perseroan memperkenankan pemegang saham yang berhalangan hadir dalam RUPS untuk memberikan suara dalam RUPS (voting in absentia) dengan tetap memperhatikan ketentuan yang berlaku. Untuk memfasilitasi para pemegang saham yang berhalangan hadir dalam RUPS, Perseroan menyediakan Formulir Surat Kuasa pada Laporan Tahunan dan situs web Perseroan. Perseroan juga menyediakan akses bagi pemegang saham untuk mencgangunan fasilitas e-Proxy KSEI. Perseroan menyediakan akses yang aman bagi pemegang saham untuk mencgangunan fasilitas e-voting KSEI (real-time in absentia) dalam hal RUPS diselenggakaran secara elektronik. [ACGS A.2.9.] [ACGS A.6.5.] [ACGS (B

# A.1.1.] [ACGS(B)A.1.1.]

The Company allows shareholders who are unable to attend the GMS to vote at the GMS (voting real-time in absentia) while still adhering to the applicable regulations. To facilitate shareholders who are unable to attend the GMS, the Company provides a Power of Attorney form in the Company's Annual Report and website. The Company also provides access for shareholders to use KSEI's e-Proxy facility. The Company provides safe access for shareholders to use KSEI's e-voting facility (real-time in absentia) in the event that GMS is held electronically. [ACGS A.2.9.] [ACGS A.6.5.] [ACGS (B) A.1.1.] [ACGS (B) A.1.1.]

Kehadiran Komisaris Independen, Direksi, Komite, dan AP dalam RUPS Perseroan merupakan dapat perwujudan komitmen Perseroan dalam memfasilitasi hak pemegang saham untuk Berkumunikasi dan berdialog dengan manajemen, mengajukan pertanyaan, dan mendapatkan informasi atas pertanyaan yang disampaikan dalam RUPS.

The presence of the Independent Commissioners, Board of Directors, Committees, and AP at the Company's GMS is one of the manifestations of the Company's commitment to facilitating the rights of shareholders to communicate and dialogue with management, ask questions, and obtain information on questions submitted at the GMS.

# Kewenangan RUPS

# Authorities of the GMS

Kewenangan yang dimiliki oleh RUPS, antara lain sebagai berikut:

- [{engkat dan memberhentikan anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi}  
- menyetujui perubahan Anggaran Dasar  
mengesahkan Laporan Tahunan  
menetakapan penggunaan LABa bersih Perseroan termasuk namun tidak terbatas untuk memutuskan pembagian dividen final kepada pemegang saham  
menentukan percentase kenaikan gaji anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi dan mengambil keputusan tersebut penetapan remunerasi anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi  
- menyetujui penunjukan AP dan KAP untuk makukan audit terhadap Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian Perseroan  
- [{engambil keputusan terkait aksi korporasi atau keputusan strategis lainnya yang diajukan Direksi}

The GMS has, among others, the authority to:

- appoint and dismiss member(s) of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors  
- approve the amendment(s) to the Articles of Association  
approve the Annual Report  
- determine the allocation of the Company's profit for the year, including but not limited to deciding the distribution of the final dividend to shareholders  
- determine the percentage of salary increase for members of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors as well as decide on the determination of the remuneration of members of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors  
- approve the appointment of AP and KAP to audit the Company's Consolidated Financial Statements  
make decisions related to corporate actions or other strategic decisions proposed by the Board of Directors

# Mekanisme Pengambilan Suara dalam RUPS

# Voting Mechanism at the GMS

Mata acara RUPS yang diusulkan adalah untuk tahun hal, sehingga keputusan RUPS pada setiap mata acara diberikan untuk tahun hal, bukan untuk gabungan hal, keluiali untuk tahun yang berdasarkan pertimbangan Perseroan mencapitalkut dan dipisahan. [ACGS A.6.1.]

GMS agenda are listed by items, and thus resolutions are made individually, not for combined items, except for those which based on the Company's considerations cannot be separated. [ACGS A.6.1]

Para pemegang saham dan/atau kuasanya diberikan kesempatan untuk mengajukan pertanyaan, pendapat, usul, dan/atau saran sebelum pemungutan suara pada setiap mata acara RUPS dilakukan.Nama penanya, pertanyaan yang diajukan,Nama pemberi jawaban, dan jawaban yang diberikan, dicatat oleh notaris dalam risalah RUPS.

Shareholders and/or their proxies are given the opportunity to submit questions, opinions, suggestions, and/or comments, before voting on each GMS agenda. The participants' names, the questions asked, the respondents' names, and the answers provided are recorded by a notary in the minutes of the GMS.

Keputusan dalam RUPS Perseroan diambil berdasarkan musyawarah untuk mencapai mufakat. Dalam hal musyawarah untuk mufakat tidak tercapai,.make pengambilan keputusan dilakukan melalui pemungutan suara.

Resolutions of the Company's GMS are taken based on deliberation to reach a consensus. In the event that consensus is not achieved, then the decision-making will be proceeded through voting.

Pemungutan suara tidak dilakukan dengan metode jejak pendapat dengan cara pemercontohan dan/atau dengan Cara mengacungankan tangan, namun melalui fasilitas e-Proxy yang tersedia pada aplikasi Electronic General Meeting System PT Kustodian Sentral Efek Indonesia (eASY.KSEI)<serta denganCCCCCC>, mengukanagan surat suara seksingga para pemegang saham dapat memberikan suaranya secara rahasia. [ACGS A.2.10.]

Voting is not carried out by poll method by sampling and/or by a show of hands, but through the e-Proxy facility available on the Electronic General Meeting System application provided by PT Kustodian Sentral Efek Indonesia (eASY.KSEI) as well as by using ballot papers so that shareholders can vote anonymously. [ACGS A.2.10.]

2. Memberikan pelunasan dan pembebasan tanggung jawab sepenuhnya (acquit et decharge) kepada anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Perseroan atas tindakan pengawasan dan pengurusan yang telah dilakukan oleh masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris dan DireksiSelama tahun buku 2023 sebagai tindakan tersebut bercermin dalam Laporan Tahunan dan Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian Perseroan untuk tahun buku 2023

# Pelaksanaan

Execution

# Keputusan sudah dilaksanakan.

1. To approve and ratify the Company's Annual Report, including to approve and ratify the Board of Commissioners' Supervisory Report and the Company's Consolidated Financial Statements for the financial year 2023 which had been audited by AP Maria Leckzinska from KAP Mirawati Sensi Idris  
2. To grant full release and discharge of authority (acquit et decharge) to the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors of the Company for the supervisory and management actions performed by each member of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors during the financial year 2023 to the extent that their actions were reflected in the Company's Annual Report and Consolidated Financial Statements for the financial year 2023

# Resolution had been executed.

In the AGM 2024, the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors submitted the Company's Annual Report 2023, including the Board of Commissioners' Supervisory Report and the Company's Consolidated Financial Statements for financial year 2023, to the shareholders, and the shareholders had granted full release and discharge of authority (acquit et decharge) to the Company's Board of Commissioners and Board of Directors for their respective supervisory and management actions conducted in the financial year 2023.

The Company had issued and submitted the Annual Consolidated Financial Statements and Annual Report to OJK and IDX on March 30, 2024, and April 30, 2024.

Pada RUPST 2024, Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi telah mencampaikan Laporan Tahunan 2023 Perseroan, termasuk Laporan Tugas dan Pengawasan Dewan Komisaris dan Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian Perseroan untuk tahun buku 2023, kepada pemegang saham dan pemegang saham telah memberikan pelunasan dan pembebasan tanggung jawab sepenuhnya (acquit et decharge) kepada anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi atas tindakan pengawasan dan pengurusan yang telah dilakukan oleh masing-masing anggota Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Selama tahun buku 2023.

Perseroan telah menerbitkan dan mencyampaikan Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian Tahunan dan Laporan Tahunan Perseroan ke OJK dan BEI pada tanggal 30 Maret 2024 dan 30 April 2024.

# Keputusan Resolution

1. Menyetujui penjaminan kekayaan Perseroan dengan nilai lebih dari  $50\%$  jumlah kekayaan bersih Perseroan, baik dalam 1 transaksi atau lebih, baik yang Berkaitan sutu sama lain maupun tidak  
2. # Keputusan

Resolution

1. Menunjuk AP Maria Leckzinska dari KAP Mirawati Sensi Idris untuk melakukan audit terhadap Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian Perseroan untuk tahun buku 2023, dengan catatan AP Maria Leckzinska dapat memenuhi kriteria yang ditetapkan oleh Perseroan  
2. Memberikan wewenang kepada Direksi Perseroan untuk menujuk AP pengganti dan/atau KAP pengganti dalam hal AP Maria Leckzinska dan/atau KAP Mirawati Sensi Idris tidak dapat menjalankan tugasnya, dengan meminta rekomendasi dari Komite Audit  
3. Memberikan wewenang kepada Direksi Perseroan untuk menetapkan honorarium untuk jasa audit tersebut di atas

1. To appoint AP Maria Leckzinska from KAP Mirawati Sensi Idris to perform the audit on the Company's Consolidated Financial Statements for the financial year 2023, provided that AP Maria Leckzinska can fulfill the criteria set by the Company  
2. To grant authority to the Board of Directors to appoint the replacement of AP and/or the replacement of KAP in the event that AP Maria Leckzinska and/or KAP Mirawati Sensi Idris cannot perform their duties, by requesting the recommendation from the Audit Committee  
3. To grant authority to the Board of Directors to determine honorarium for the above-mentioned audit services

# Pelaksanaan

Execution

# Keputusan sudah dilaksanakan.

Perseroan telah menunjuk AP Maria Leckzinska dari KAP Mirawati Sensi Indris untuk melakukan audit terhadap Laporan Keuangan Konsolidasian Perseroan untuk tahun buku 2023 berdasarkan Surat Penunjukan No. 750/V/2023/LSK/MSId tanggal 25 Mei 2023. Laporan penunjukan AP dan/atau KAP, beserta dengan dokumen pendukungteringkit, telah disampaikan ke OJK dan BEI pada tanggal 30 Mei 2023.

# Resolution had been executed.

The Company had appointed AP Maria Leckzinska from KAP Mirawati Sensi Idris to audit the Company's Financial Statements for the financial year 2023 based on Engagement Letter No. 750/V/2023/LSK/MSId dated May 25, 2023. Report on the appointment of AP and/or KAP, along with related supporting documents, had been submitted to OJK and IDX on May 30, 2023.

# Dewan Komisaris

Board of Commissioners

Dewan Komisaris adalah organ Perseroan yang ditunjuk oleh dan bertanggung jawab kepada RUPS untuk menjalankan fungsi pengawasan dan memberikan arahan terkait efektivitas;penerapan kebijakan, strategi, serta tata kelola perusahaan yang dilaksanan oleh Direksi.

Setiap anggota Dewan Komisaris, termasuk Presiden Komisaris, memiliki gedudukan yang setara. Presiden Komisaris memiliki tugas dan tanggung jawab yang sama dengan anggota Dewan Komisaris lainnya, namun dengan tersebut peran khusus, yaitu mengkoordinasikan kegiatan Dewan Komisaris, memberikan tugas khusus kepada anggota Dewan Komisaris berdasarkan keputusan rapat Dewan Komisaris, memanggil rapat Dewan Komisaris dan rapat gabungan Dewan Komisaris dengan Direksi, seda memimpin rapat-rapat tersebut. Apabila Presiden Komisaris berhalangan, tugasnya dapat dilaksanan oleh anggota Dewan Komisaris lainnya. [ACGS.E.4.4.]

# Piagam Dewan Komisaris ACGS.E.1.1

Dalam melaksanakan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya, Dewan Komisaris berpedoman kepada Piagam Dewan Komisaris.

Piagam Dewan Komisaris Perseroan pertama kali diterbitkan pada tanggal 1 Desember 2015 dan telah disempurnakan pada tanggal 12 Desember 2019.

Piagam Dewan Komisaris memuat hal-hal sebagai berikut:

- Landasan Hukum  
- Nilai dan Etika  
- Komposisi dan Kriteria  
- Pengangkatan, Pemberhentian, dan Masa Jabatan  
Program Orientasi dan Pelatihan  
Waktu Kerja  
Rangkap Jabatan  
Tugas, Wewenang, dan Tanggung Jawab  
Rapat  
Penilaian Kinerja  
- Pelaporan  
Transparansi  
- Larangan  
Sanksi

Dengan berpedoman pada Piagam Dewan Komisaris, Dewan Komisaris diharapkan dapat menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawab pengawasan dan pengarahannya secara baik dan efektif.

The Board of Commissioners is an organ of the Company appointed by and responsible to the GMS to conduct supervisory and advisory functions on the effectiveness of the implementation of policies, strategies, and corporate governance performed by the Board of Directors.

Each member of the Board of Commissioners, including the President Commissioner, has an equal position. The President Commissioner has the same duties and responsibilities as other members of the Board of Commissioners, with several special roles, which include coordinating the activities of the Board of Commissioners, assigning special tasks to Board of Commissioners members based on the decisions of the Board of Commissioners meetings, calling Board of Commissioners meetings and joint meetings of the Board of Commissioners with the Board of Directors, and leading those meetings. If the President Commissioner is unable to perform their duties, his/ her duties may be carried out by other members of the Board of Commissioners. ACGS E.4.4.

# Charter of the Board of Commissioners AC6S E.1.1

In performing its duties and responsibilities, the Board of Commissioners is guided by the Charter of the Board of Commissioners.

The Company's Charter of the Board of Commissioners was first issued on December 1, 2015, and was refined on December 12, 2019.

The Charter of the Board of Commissioners covers the following items:

Legal Basis  
- Values and Ethics  
Composition and Criteria  
- Appointment, Dismissal, and Term of Office  
Orientation and Training Programs  
Working Hours  
- Concurrent Positions  
Duties, Authorities, and Responsibilities  
- Meetings  
Performance Evaluation  
Reporting  
- Transparency  
Prohibitions  
Sanction

With guidance from the Charter of the Board of Commissioners, it is expected that the Board of Commissioners can carry out its supervisory and advisory duties and responsibilities properly and effectively.

Piagam Dewan Komisaris telah dipublikasikan di situs web Perseroan dan akan ditinja secara Berkala sebagaimana diperlukan.

The Charter of the Board of Commissioners is available on the Company's website and will be reviewed periodically as necessary.

Duties, authorities, and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners are stipulated in the Company's Articles of Association and Charter of the Board of Commissioners.

# Duties

The Board of Commissioners is collectively responsible in carrying out their duties to:  
- review and approve the Company's vision and mission together with the Board of Directors at least once every 5 (five years)  
- guide, supervise, and evaluate the execution of strategic policies, business plan, and annual budget of the Company as well as perform supervision on the implementation of duties and responsibilities of the Board of Directors and provide advice to the Board of Directors  
- supervise the implementation of GCG in the Company  
- monitor potential conflicts of interest for management, members of the Board of Directors, members of the Board of Commissioners, and shareholders (G-09)  
- establish at least an Audit Committee and may establish a Nomination Committee, Remuneration Committee, and other committees to support the implementation of duties and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners  
- perform the nomination and remuneration functions, in the absence of Nomination Committee and Remuneration Committee  
- ensure that audit findings and recommendations from the Audit Committee, Internal Audit Unit, external auditor, and/or supervisory notice from capital market authority have been followed up by the Board of Directors  
- foster good, open, constructive, and professional working relationships with other members of the Board of Commissioners, Board of Directors, Committees, and employees in the best interests of the Company  
- evaluate the performance of Committees that assist in the implementation of the duties and responsibilities of the Board of Commissioners  
- carry out other duties in accordance with the Company's Articles of Association, GMS resolutions, and applicable laws and regulations

# Authorities

The Board of Commissioners has, among others, the authorities to:  
- approve the Company's annual business plan and budget [ACGS E.1.2.]
- approve the Company's corporate action plans, as follows: [ACGS E.1.2.]

- borrow or lend money on behalf of the Company  
- establish businesses or participate in other domestic or foreign companies  
- purchase fixed assets other than that of daily business activities with a value of more than Rp5,000,000,000 (five billion Rupiah)  
- rent and/or lease out the Company's assets other than those of daily business activities with a value of more than Rp5,000,000,000 (five billion Rupiah)  
- sell or release the rights of fixed assets and companies or encumber fixed assets of the Company with the value of up to  $50\%$  (fifty percent) of the Company's net worth  
- bind the Company as a guarantor with the value of up to  $50\%$  (fifty percent) of the Company's net worth

acquire a company

- enter buildings and land or other places used by or under the authority of the Company and examine all books, documents, cash, and other evidence at any time during the Company's office hours  
- review management actions and hold meetings with the Board of Directors to discuss various issues of the Company  
- conduct visits to various locations of subsidiaries and/or branches of the Company  
- propose the replacement and/or appointment of one or more members of the Board of Directors to the GMS by considering recommendations from the Nomination Committee

# Tanggung Jawab

Setiap anggota Dewan Komisaris bertindak berdasarkan keputusan Dewan Komisaris dan bertanggung jawab secara tanggung renteng atas kerugian Perseroan yang disebabkan karena kalalian anggota Dewan Komisaris dalam menjalankan tugasnya.

Anggota Dewan Komisaris tidak dapat dimintakan pertanggungjawaban atas kerugian Perseroan apabila dapat membuktikan bahwa:  
- kerugian tersebut bukan karena kesalahan atau kelalaiannya  
- anggota Dewan Komisaris telah melakukan pengawasan dengan itikad baik, tanggung jawab, dan kehat-hatian untuk kelentingan Perseroan dan sesuai dengan maksud dan tujuan Perseroan  
- anggota Dewan Komisaris tidak mempunyai kepada pribadi, baik langsung maupun tidak langsung, atas tindakan pengurusan yang dilakukan Direksi yang mengakibatkan kerugian  
- orangota Dewan Komisaris telah memberikan nasihat kepada Direksi untuk mencegah timbulnya atau berlanjutnya kerugian tersebut

Perseroan mensyaratan anggota Dewan Komisaris tertentu untuk tidak terlibat dalam pembahasan rapat pada agenda tertentu dalam hal anggota Dewan Komisaris yang bersangkutan memiliki benturan kepada dengan dapat mengasideea yang akan dibahas. [ACGS A.8.2.] [G-09]

- temporarily dismiss one or more members of the Board of Directors should they act contrary to the Articles of Association of the Company, harm the Company, neglect their obligations, and/or violate the prevailing laws and regulations. The procedure for such temporary dismissal should refer to the Articles of Association of the Company  
perform other actions relevant to its duties and responsibilities based on the Articles of Association of the Company as well as the prevailing laws and regulations

# Responsibilities

Each member of the Board of Commissioners shall act based on the resolution of the Board of Commissioners and is jointly and severally liable for the losses sustained by the Company caused by the negligence of the members of the Board of Commissioners in carrying out their duties.

The member of the Board of Commissioners shall not be held liable for any loss sustained by the Company if he/she can prove that:

the loss is not due to his/her fault or negligence  
- he/she has conducted supervision in good faith, responsibility, and prudence for the interest of the Company and by the aims and objectives of the Company  
- he/she has no personal interest, either directly or indirectly, in the management actions taken by the Board of Directors which result in losses  
- he/she has given advice to the Board of Directors to prevent the occurrence or continuation of such losses

The Company requires certain members of the Board of Commissioners not to be involved in meeting discussions on certain agendas in the event that the member of the Board of Commissioners concerned has a conflict of interest with the agenda to be discussed. [ACGS A.8.2.] [G-09]

# Komposisi dan Keberagaman Dewan

# Komisaris [GRI2-10-b] [ACGS(B)E.1.2.]

Sesuai dengan Anggaran Dasar dan Piagam Dewan Komisaris Perseroan, Dewan Komisaris Perseroan terdiri dari sekurang-kurangnya 3 (tiga) orang anggota yang dipimpin oleh seorang Presiden Komisaris dan dibantu oleh 1 (satu) untuk menjadi Wakil Presiden Komisaris dan/atau Komisaris dan Komisaris Independen.

Peraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014ARPentang Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten atau Perusahaan Publik menetapkan kepada jumlah anggota Dewan Komisaris adalah paling kurang 2 (dua) anggota, dengan jumah Komisaris Independen paling kurang  $30\%$  dari jumah anggota Dewan Komisaris.

Sehubungan dengan berakhirnya masa jabatan Dewan Komisarisperiode tahun 2019-2024, pada RUPST tanggal 25 Juni 2024,Perseroan telah secara resmi menetapkan susunan anggota Dewan Komisaris untukperiode 2024-2029. Informasi terkaitpengangkatan anggota Dewan Komisaris ini telah diumumkandalam keterbukaan informasi Perseroan tanggal 26 Juni 2024.

Per 31 Desember 2024, Dewan Komisaris Perseroan terdiri dari 6 (enam)orang anggota, dimana4(empat)orang atau  $67\%$  dari seluruh anggota Dewan Komisaris merupakan Komisaris Independen.

ACGS.E.2.4.]

# Composition and Diversity of the Board of Commissioners [GRI 2-10-b] [ACGS(B)E.1.2.]

By the Company's Articles of Association and the Charter of the Board of Commissioners, the Board of Commissioners shall consist of at least 3 (three) members, chaired by a President Commissioner and assisted by 1 (one) or more Vice President Commissioners and/or Commissioners and Independent Commissioners.

OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014 on the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies stipulates that the Board of Commissioners shall consist of at least 2 (two) members, of which Independent Commissioners constitute at least  $30\%$  of the total members of the Board of Commissioners.

In relation to the end of the term of the Board of Commissioners for the period 2019-2024, at the AGM on June 25, 2024, the Company officially appointed the composition of the Board of Commissioners for the period 2024-2029. Information regarding the appointment of the Board of Commissioners members was announced in the Company's disclosure on June 26, 2024.

As of December 31, 2024, the Company's Board of Commissioners consisted of 6 (six) members, 4 (four) or  $67\%$  of all members of the Board of Commissioners were Independent Commissioners.

Perseroan suchenahara behwa keberagaman dalam anggota Dewan Komisaris memainkan peran yang sangat penting dalam memastikan efektivitas pengawasan dan penasihatan yang Berkualitas, mendukung daya saing perusahaan, dan menc Gatkan kinerja keberlanjutan Perseroan secara terukur. Oleh karena itu, Perseroan menetapkan jumlah dan komposisi anggota Dewan Komisaris dengan memperhatikan berbagai faktor, antara lain kondisi internal Perseroan serta efektivitas pengawasan yang dapat diberikan oleh masing-masing anggota.

Perseroan memastikan keberagaman dalam hal latar belakang, kompetensi, usia, dan pengalaman kerja anggota Dewan Komisaris, tanpa membedakan suku, agama,jenis kelamin, dan ras, di mana setidaknya situ anggota Dewan Komisaris memiliki pengalaman yang relevant di sektor kegiatan usaha utama yang dijalankan oleh Perseroan, Seeingga dapat memberikan wawasan yang lebih mendalam dalam pengambilan keputusan strategis.

Jumlah, komposisi, serta keberagaman anggota Dewan Komisaris akan ditinjau secara Berkala oleh Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi, guna memastikan telah struktur ini tetap relevant dan mendukung tercapainya tujuan perusahaan{serta kepadathan terhadap regulasi yang berlaku. [ACGS(B)E.1.2.]

The Company recognizes that diversity among the members of the Board of Commissioners plays a very important role in ensuring the effectiveness of supervision and quality advisory, supporting the Company's competitiveness, and improving the Company's sustainability performance measurably. Therefore, the Company determines the number and composition of the Board of Commissioners by considering various factors, including the internal conditions of the Company and the effectiveness of supervision that can be provided by each member.

The Company ensures diversity in terms of background, competence, age, and work experience of the Board of Commissioners members, without distinguishing between ethnicity, religion, gender, and race, where at least one member of the Board of Commissioners having relevant experience in the main business sector run by the Company, thereby providing deeper insights in strategic decision-making.

The number, composition, and diversity of the members of the Board of Commissioners will be reviewed periodically by the Nomination and Remuneration Committee to ensure that this structure remains relevant and supports the achievement of the company's goals as well as compliance with prevailing regulations. - tidyak pernah menjadi anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris yang selama menjadi:

- perché:tidakmenyelenggaramakanRUPST  
pertanggungjawabanny sebagai anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris pernah tidak diterima oleh RUPS atau pernah tidak memberikan pertanggungjawaban sebagai anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris kepada RUPS  
- pernah说我debabkan perusaan yang memperoleh izin, persetujuan, atas pendaftaran dari OJK tidak memenuhi kewajiban说我mpaikan laporan tahunan dan/atau laporan keuangan kepada OJK

- memiliki komitmen untuk mematuhi peraturan perundang-undangan

Persyaratan umum ini tercantum dalam Anggaran Dasar Perseroan.

Perseroan tidak memiliki anggota Dewan Komisaris yang sebelumnya merupakan kanyakawan atas mitra dari auditor eksternal Perseroan dalam 2 (dua) tahun terakhir. [ACGS(P)E.3.1.]

The Company has established general requirements for individuals to be appointed as members of the Company's Board of Commissioners, as follows:

having good character, morals, and integrity  
- being capable of conducting any legal act  
- within 5(five)years prior to his/her appointment and during his/her term of office: – having never been declared bankrupt

- having never been a member of a Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners who was found guilty of causing a company to go bankrupt  
- having never been sentenced for a criminal action that was detrimental to the state finances and/or related to the financial sector  
- having never been a member of a Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners of which during his/her term of office:

he/she did not hold the required AGM

- his/her accountability as a member of the Board of Directors and/or member of the Board of Commissioners was rejected by the GMS, or he/she failed to provide his/her accountability as a member of the Board of Directors and/or member of the Board of Commissioners to the GMS  
- he/she had caused a company that had obtained licenses, approvals, or registration statements from OJK to fail to comply with its obligation to submit its annual report and/or financial statements to OJK

- committing to complying with laws and regulations  
- having the knowledge and/or expertise in the required field

These general requirements are stated in the Articles of Association of the Company.

The Company does not have any members of the Board of Commissioners who were previously employees or partners of the Company's external auditors in the last 2 (two) years. [ACGS(P)E.3.1.]

# Pengangkatan, Pemberhentian, dan Masa Jabatan

# Dewan Komisaris [GRI 2-9-c]

# Appointment, Dismissal, and Term of Office of

# the Board of Commissioners [GRI 2-9-c]

Anggota Dewan Komisaris diangkat dan diberhentikan oleh RUPS, umumnya untukasajabatan5(lima)tahun.Pengangkatan anggota Dewan Komisaris berlaku efektif sejak tanggal ditetapkan dalam RUPS. ACGSE.3.11.

Dengan persetujuan RUPS, anggota Dewan Komisaris yang命名为 jabatannya telah berakhir dapat diangkat kembali. RUPS juga berhak untuk memberhentikan anggota Dewan Komisaris pada setiap waktu sebelum命名为 jabatannya berakhir.

Usulan erkait pengangkatan, pemberhentian dan/atau penggantian anggota Dewan Komisaris kepada RUPS dilakukan dengan memperhatikan rekomendasi dari Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi.

Jabatan anggota Dewan Komisaris dengan sendirinya berakhir, dalam hal:

- masa jabatan anggota Dewan Komisaris berakhir  
- orangota Dewan Komisaris mengajukan pengunduran diri sesuai dengan ketentuan yang tercantum dalam Anggaran Dasar Perseroan  
- anggota Dewan Komisariserratedunia  
- anggota Dewan Komisaris diberhentikan berdasarkan keputusan RUPS  
- anggota Dewan Komisaris dinyatakan pailit atas asetnya ditaruh di bawah pengampuan berdasarkan suatu keputusan pengadilan  
- anggota Dewan Komisaris tidak lagi memenuhi persyaratan perundangan yang berlaku, termasuk apabila anggota Dewan Komisaris yang bersangkutan terlibat dalam kejahatan keuangan dan terbukti melakukan kesalahan

Tata cara pengangkatan, penggantian, pemberhentian, ata pengunduran diri anggota Dewan Komisaris Perseroan dilakukan tersebut dengan Anggaran Dasar dan Piagam Dewan Komisaris Perseroan.

Perseroan tidak pernah mengalami kejadian dimana anggota Dewan Komisaris non-eksekutif mengundurkan diri dan menggangkat suatu isu sehubungan dengan tata kelola. [ACGS(P)E.1.2.]

Each member of the Board of Commissioners is appointed and dismissed by the GMS, generally for a term of 5 (five) years. Appointment of a member of the Board of Commissioners is effective as of the date of the GMS resolution.

# ACGS.E.3.11

With the approval of the GMS, members of the Board of Commissioners whose term of office has expired may be reappointed. The GMS also holds the authority to dismiss a member of the Board of Commissioners at any time before his/her term of office expires.

Proposals related to the appointment, dismissal, and/or replacement of member(s) of the Board of Commissioners that are submitted to the GMS, are made by taking into account the recommendations from the Nomination and Remuneration Committee.

The term of office of a member of the Board of Commissioners shall terminate in the event that:

- his/her term of office expires  
- he/she submits his/her resignation by the provisions stated in the Articles of Association of the Company  
he/she passes away  
he/she is dismissed by the GMS.  
- he/she is declared bankrupt, or his/her assets are placed under custody based on a court decision  
- he/she no longer qualifies based on the prevailing laws and regulations, including if the member of the Board of Commissioners concerned is involved in financial crimes and is found guilty

Procedures for the appointment, replacement, dismissal, or resignation of members of the Company's Board of Commissioners are performed by the Articles of Association and the Charter of the Board of Commissioners of the Company.

The Company has never experienced any instances where a non-executive member of the Board of Commissioners resigned and raised governance-related issues. [AC6S(P) E.1.2.]

# Induction Program for New Members of the Board of

# Commissioners [ACGSE.5.1]

The Company has a policy on the implementation of an induction program to deepen the understanding of new member of the Board of Commissioners regarding the Company.

The induction program covers the following materials:

Vision, missions, and strategies of the Company  
Charter of the Board of Commissioners

dalam melaksanakan fungsi pemantauan efektivitas kebijakan manajemen risiko, pengendalian internal, dan tinkadan mitigasi yang diambil oleh Perseroan, Dewan Komisaris dibantu oleh Komite Manajemen Risiko. # Implementation of Duties of the Board of Commissioners in 2024

The Company conducts an integrated corporate governance process. The Company realizes that the businesses conducted by the Company and its subsidiaries are varied. The Company places management representatives with competencies relevant to the business being conducted in each subsidiary. The Company provides direction and control over the business activities of its subsidiaries and holds regular meetings with the management of the subsidiaries to create opportunities for information sharing, discuss updates related to policy formulation, performance progress, issues/challenges faced, alternative solutions, corporate action plans, as well as measurable plans and strategies related to the Company's efforts to improve economic(financial performance)-social- -environmental aspects both within the Company and in the surrounding operational areas. Restrictions on certain actions and/or corporate actions of subsidiaries are implemented with the approval of the Board of Commissioners and/or shareholders by applicable laws and regulations before being carried out.

The Board of Commissioners carried out its duties and responsibilities by the Charter of the Board of Commissioners.

The Board of Commissioners is assisted by the Committees to carry out its duties and responsibilities, as follows:

- in performing its supervisory function, the Board of Commissioners is assisted by the Audit Committee. Information regarding the Audit Committee can be seen in the Corporate Governance section, Audit Committee subsection.  
- in performing its nomination and remuneration functions, the Board of Commissioners is assisted by the Nomination and Remuneration Committee. Information regarding the Nomination and Remuneration Committee can be seen in the Corporate Governance section, Nomination and Remuneration Committee subsection.  
- in performing its monitoring function on the effectiveness of risk management policies, internal controls, and mitigation measures taken by the Company, the Board of Commissioners is assisted by the Risk Management Committee. Information regarding the Risk Management Committee can be seen in the Corporate Governance section, Risk Management Committee subsection.

# Rapat Dewan Komisaris

Rapat Dewan Komisaris merupakan wadah komunikasi antar anggota Dewan Komisaris dan/atau antara Dewan Komisaris dengan Direksi dan/atau Komite untuk memebas pelaporan kegiatan perusahaan, pelaksanaan TJSL, rincian masalah yang timbul, dan pelaksanaan tugas pengawasan. Dalam rapat, Dewan Komisaris juga dapat memebhas hal-hal lain yang relevant dengan keberadaan dan keberlanjutan Perseroan.

Sesuai Peraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014, rapat Dewan Komisaris diselenggakaran secara Berkala sekurang-kurangnya 1 (satu) kali dalam 2 (dua) bulan, dengan tingkat kehadiran masingmasing anggota Dewan Komisaris minimal  $75\%$  dari jumlah rapat yang dilaksanan dalam 1 (satu) tahun buku. Pemanggilan rapat dilakukan oleh Presiden Komisaris atas anggota Dewan Komisaris lainnya. [GRI 2-12-a]

Setiap anggota Dewan Komisaris memiliki kesempatan dan hakupa yang sama dalam mengemukakan pendapat. KeputusanRapat Dewan Komisaris diambil atas dasar musyawarah untukmencapai mufakat. Dalam hal musyawarah untuk mufakat tidak

# Meetings of the Board of Commissioners

Meetings of the Board of Commissioners are a forum for communication between members of the Board of Commissioners and/or between the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors and/or Committees to discuss company activity reports, implementation of CSER, details of existing problems, and implementation of supervisory duties. In these meetings, the Board of Commissioners can also discuss other matters relevant to the existence and sustainability of the Company.

Based on OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014, the Board of Commissioners shall convene a meeting on a regular basis at least once every 2(two) months, with an attendance rate for each member of the Board of Commissioners at least  $75\%$  of the total number of meetings held in 1(one) financial year. Notice of the meetings shall be made by the President Commissioner or other member of the Board of Commissioners. [GR] 2-12-a

Each member of the Board of Commissioners has equal opportunity and voting rights in expressing his/her opinions. The resolution of the Board of Commissioners meeting shall be taken based on deliberation to reach consensus. In the event deliberation for

tercapai, make pengambilan keputusan dilakukan berdasarkan pemungutan suara dengan suara saherus disetuji oleh minimal 2/3 anggota Dewan Komisaris yang hadir dalam rapat. [ACGS E.3.4.]

Perseroan menetakapan rencana penyelenggaraan RUPST, rapat Dewan Komisaris, rapat Direksi, rapat gabungan Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi, rapat komite, dan rapat pembahasan pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawab Sekretaris Perusahaan pada awal tahun buku ataupada akhir tahun buku sebelumnya. Untuk tahun 2024, rencana penyelenggaraan rapat ditetakapan pada rapat Dewan Komisaris tanggal 19 Januari 2024. [ACGS E.3.1.]

Untuk mencatkan efektivitas dan kelancaran rapat, Perseroan senantiasa berupaya menyediakan akses informasi atopu materi rapat setidaknya 5 (lima) hari kerja sebelum rapat berlangsung. Hal ini dimaksudkan agar setup anggota Dewan Komisaris dapat mempersiapkan diri dengan baik, Seeingga diskusi dan pengambilan keputusan dalam rapat dapat berjalan lebih efektif dan efisien. [ACGS.E.3.6.]

Selama tahun 2024, Dewan Komisaris telah melaksananakan 12 (dua belas) kali rapat, termasuk di antaranya 5 (lima) kali rapat gabungan dengan Direksi dan 1 (satu) kali rapat tanpa kehadiran pejabat eksekutif. Tingkat kehadiran Dewan Komisaris dalam rapat secara rata-rata sudah hadalam  $100\%$ . [GRI 2-12-c] [ACGS E.3.2.] [ACGS E.3.5.] [G-02]

Keputusan pada setiap rapat Dewan Komisaris dituangkandalam risalah rapat yang ditandatangani oleh seluruh anggota Dewan Komsaris yang hadir dalam rapat. Risalah rapat menjidokumentasi resmi yang akan dijadikan referensi untuk tindak lanjut dan evaluasi atas keputusan yang telah diambil di dalam rapat.

The Company scheduled the AGM, meetings of the Board of Commissioners, meetings of the Board of Directors, joint meetings of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors, meetings of the committee, and meetings on the implementation of duties of the Corporate Secretary at the beginning of the financial year or at the end of the previous financial year. For 2024, schedules of meetings were determined in the meetings of the Board of Commissioners held on January 19, 2024. [ACGS E.3.1.]

To improve the effectiveness and smoothness of meetings, the Company consistently strives to provide access to information or meeting materials at least 5 (five) working days before the meeting takes place. This is intended so that each member of the Board of Commissioners can prepare themselves well, thus making discussions and decision-making in the meeting more effective and efficient. [ACGS E.3.6.]

In 2024, the Board of Commissioners held 12 (twelve) meetings, including 5 (five) joint meetings with the Board of Directors and 1 (one) meeting without the presence of the executives. The average attendance rate of the Board of Commissioners at the meetings was  $100\%$ . [GRI 2-12-c] [ACGS E.3.2.] [ACGS E.3.5.] [G-02]

The resolutions of each Board of Commissioners meeting were stated in a minute of the meeting, which should be signed by all members of the Board of Commissioners who were present at the meeting. The minutes of the meetings serve as official documentation that will be used as a reference for follow-up and evaluation of the decisions made during the meeting.

# Penilaian Kinerja, Remunerasi, dan Prosedur Penetapan Remunerasi Dewan Komisaris

ACGS.E.5.5.[ACGS.E.5.6]G-04

Informasi mengenai penilaian kinerja, remunerasi, dan prosedur penetapan remunerasi Dewan Komisaris dapat dilihat pada bagian Governansi Corporat, sub-bagian Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi.

# Penilaian Dewan Komisaris之作 Kinerja Direksi, Komite Audit, Komite Manajemen Risiko, serta Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi Tahun 2024

Dewan Komisarispekukan penilaian individual dan kolektifatas kinerja Direksi, Komite Audit, Komite Manajemen Risiko,erta Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi sebanyak 1 (satu) kali dalam setahun. Penilaian ini dilakukan sesuai dengan prosedur dan kriteria penilaian kinerja Direksi, Komite Audit, Komite Manajemen Risiko, serta Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi dengan mempertimbangkan kinerja Perseroan, pencapaian target, kualitas analysis, pengambilan keputusan, dan rekomendasi Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi. Informasi mengenai kriteria yang dipertimbangkan dalam evaluasi kinerja Direksi, Komite Audit, Komite Manajemen Risiko, serta Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi dan prosedur penilaian dan penetapan remunerasi Direksi, Komite Audit, Komite Manajemen Risiko, serta Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi dapat dilihat pada bagian Governansi Corporat, subbagian Direksi - Penilaian Kinerja dan Remunerasi Direksi, subbagian Komite Audit, Komite Manajemen Risiko, serta Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi.

Penilaian Dewan Komisaris atas kinerja Direksi dilakukan secara Berkala setiap tahun, dengan evaluasi untuk tahun 2024 dilaksanan pada bulan Februari 2025. Berdasarkan telah penilaian tersebut, Dewan Komisaris menilai oleh pada tahun 2024, Direksi telah melaksanan tugas pengelolaan dan tanggung jawabnya dengan baik. Direksi berhasil mengelola perusahaan secara efisien, mencapai target-target yang ditetapkan, seda menjadi kinerja yang stabil dan berkelanjutan di tengah tantangan yang ada.

[GR12-12-c]

# Performance Evaluation, Remuneration, and Procedure for Determining Remuneration of the Board of Commissioners ACGS E.5.5

ACGSE.5.6 [G-04]

Information regarding performance evaluation, remuneration, and procedure for determining the remuneration of the Board of Commissioners can be seen in the Corporate Governance section, Nomination and Remuneration Committee subsection.

# Board of Commissioners' Evaluation on the Performance of the Board of Directors, Audit Committee, Risk Management Committee, as well as Nomination and Remuneration Committee in 2024

The Board of Commissioners conducts individual and collective evaluations on the performance of the Board of Directors, Audit Committee, Risk Management Committee, as well as Nomination and Remuneration Committee once a year. These evaluations are carried out in accordance with the procedure and criteria of the performance evaluation for the Board of Directors, Audit Committee, Risk Management Committee, as well as Nomination and Remuneration Committee by considering the Company's performance, target realization, quality of analysis, decision-making, and recommendation from the Nomination and Remuneration Committee. Information regarding the criteria considered in evaluating the performance of the Board of Directors, Audit Committee, Risk Management Committee may be seen in the Corporate Governance section, Board of Directors - Performance Evaluation and Remuneration of the Board of Directors subsection, Audit Committee, Risk Management Committee, as well as Nomination and Remuneration Committee.

The Board of Commissioners' assessment of the Board of Directors' performance is conducted periodically every year, with the evaluation for 2024 carried out in February 2025. Based on the evaluation results, the Board of Commissioners assesses that in 2024, the Board of Directors has performed its management and responsibilities well. The Board of Directors successfully managed the company efficiently, achieved the set targets, and maintained stable and sustainable performance amidst the existing challenges.

[GR2-12-c]

Dewan Komisarispekukan penilaian individual dan kolektif ataskinerja Komite Audit dan Komite Manajemen Risiko sekurangkurangnya 1(satu)kali dalam setahun. Penilaian ini dilakukan sesuai dengan prosedur dan kriteria penilaian kinerja Komite Audit danKomite Manajemen Risiko. [GRI2-12-c]

The Board of Commissioners conducts individual and collective evaluations on the performance of the Audit Committee and the Risk Management Committee at least once a year. This evaluation is carried out by the procedure and performance evaluation criteria for the Audit Committee and Risk Management Committee.
