Penilaian Dewan Komisaris atas kinerja Komite Audit dan Komite Manajemen Risiko untuk tahun 2024 dilakukan pada bulan Februari 2025. Dalam proses evaluasi ini, Dewan Komisaris menilai efektivitassystempengendalianinternal,tindak lanjut terhadap pelaporan pelanggaran,serta manajemen risiko yang diterapkan Perseroan.

Berdasarkan evaluasi tersebut, Dewan Komisaris menjadi oleh ketiga aspek tersebut telah difilakan secara memadai, sesuai dengan standar yang ditetapkan, dan memberikan kontribusi positif terhadap manajemen risiko dan kepadauhan perusahaan. Meskipun demikian, Dewan Komisaris terus mendorong perbaikan berkelanjutan untuk memastikan proses-proses tersebut dapat dilakukan dengan lebih optimal. Perbaikan yang disarankan antara lain mencakup upaya mencakatkan ketepatan dalam identifikasi risiko, kecepatan dalam penganganan pelanggaran,serta penganganistem pengendalian internal yang lebih adaptif terhadap perubahan lingkungan bisnis yang cepat.

Dewan Komisaris berkomitmen untuk terus mendorong peningkatan efektivitas pengawasan, guna menghadapi tantangan yang semakin kompleks dan dinamika industri yang terus berkembang diASA depan. [GRI 2-12-c] [AC6S E.3.2.0.]

Dewan Komisaris turut melakukan evaluasi terhadap kinerja Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi, baik secara individu maupun kolektif, paling sedikit 1 (satu) kali dalam setahun. Penilaian tersebut dilaksanan berdasarkan prosedurserta kriteria yang telah ditetapkan untuk mengukur kinerja Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi. [GRI 2-12-c]

The Board of Commissioners' assessment of the performance of the Audit Committee and the Risk Management Committee for the year 2024 is conducted in February 2025. In this evaluation process, the Board of Commissioners assesses the effectiveness of the internal control system, the follow-up on reporting violations, and the risk management implemented by the Company.

Based on the evaluation, the Board of Commissioners assesses that these three aspects have been implemented adequately, in accordance with the established standards, and have made a positive contribution to risk management and the company's compliance. Nevertheless, the Board of Commissioners continues to encourage ongoing improvements to ensure these processes can be carried out more optimally. The suggested improvements include efforts to enhance the accuracy in risk identification, speed in handling violations, and strengthening the internal control system to be more adaptive to rapid changes in the business environment.

The Board of Commissioners is committed to continuously promoting the enhancement of supervisory effectiveness, in order to face increasingly complex challenges and the ever-evolving dynamics of the industry in the future. [GRI 2-12-c] [ACGS E.3.2.0.]

The Board of Commissioners also conducts evaluation on the performance of the Nomination and Remuneration Committee, whether individual or collective, at least once a year. This evaluation is carried out based on the procedures and performance evaluation criteria applied to the Nomination and Remuneration Committee.

Penilaian Dewan Komisaris atas kinerja Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi untuk tahun 2024 dilakukan pada bulan Februari 2025. Berdasarkan telah penilaian tersebut, Dewan Komisaris menjadi Bahwa fungsi nominasi dan remunerasi telah dilaksananakan dengancekup baik pada tahun 2024. [GRI 2-12-c]

Informasi mengenai penilaian kinerja Komite dapat dilihat pada bagian Governansi Corporat, sub-bagian Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi.

# Peningkatan Kompetensi bagi Anggota Dewan Komisaris

Perseroan mendorong setiap anggota Dewan Komisaris untuk berpartisipasi secara aktif dalam pelatihan sekurang-kurangnya 1 (satu) kali dalam setahun, dengan durasi pelatihan minimal selama 12 (dua belas) jam. Pelatihan ini dimaksudkan agar anggota Dewan Komisaris tetap memahami perkembangan terkini dalam praktik pengelolaan perusahaan, peraturan yang berlaku, serta tren industri yang relevant, agar anggota Dewan Komisaris dapat menjalankan tugas pengawasan dan penasihatan dengan lebih efektif. [GRI 2-17-a]

The Board of Commissioners' evaluation of the performance of the Nomination and Remuneration Committee in 2024 was conducted in February 2025. Based on the evaluation, the Board of Commissioners considered that the nomination and remuneration functions had been well implemented in 2024. [GRI 2-12-c]

Information regarding the performance evaluation of the Committees can be seen in the Corporate Governance section, Nomination and Remuneration Committee subsection.

# Competency Development for Members of the Board of Commissioners

The Company encourages each member of the Board of Commissioners to actively participate in training at least once a year, with a minimum training duration of 12 (twelve) hours. This training is intended to ensure that members of the Board of Commissioners remain updated on the latest developments in corporate management practices, prevailing regulations, and relevant industry trends, so that the Board of Commissioners can perform their supervisory and advisory duties more effectively. # Hubungan Keluarga, Keuangan, dan Kepengurusan antara Anggota Dewan Komisaris, Direksi, Pengendali, dan Pemegang Saham Utama

Untuk mencatkan transparansi dan memfasilitasi pemangku kepentingan dalam memahami potensi konflik kepentingan yang dapat mempengaruhi pengambilan keputusan, terutama dalam hal investasi, Perseroan mengungkapkan secara jelas informasi mengenai adanya ataukidaknya hubungan keluarga, hubungan keuangan, dan/atau kepengurusan antara anggota Dewan Komisaris dengan anggota Dewan Komisaris lainnya, antara anggota Dewan Komisaris dengan anggota Direksi, serta antara anggota Direksi dengan Pengendali dan Pemegang Saham Utama. Pengungkapan ini dimaksudkan untuk memberikan gambaran tersebut struktur hubungan internal di dalam Perseroan, seesingga pemangku kepentingan dalam menilai potensi dampak konflik kepentingan terhadap objektivitas dan integritas keputusan yang diambil.

Selain Bapak Franky Oesman Widjaja, yang merupakan Pengendali Perseroan, anggota Dewan Komisaris lainnya tidak memiliki hubungan affiliasi baik dengan sesama anggota Dewan Komisaris, anggota Direksi, Pengendali, maupun Pemegang Saham Utama.

[GRI2-15-b]

Hubungan afiliasi antara anggota Dewan Komisaris dengan anggota Dewan Komisaris lainnya, antara anggota Dewan Komisaris dengan anggota Direksi, serta antara anggota Dewan Komisaris dengan Pengendali dan Pemegang Saham Utama dapat dilihat pada bagian Profil Perusahaan, sub-bagian Matriks Hubungan Afiliasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi.

# Family, Financial, and Management Relationship Between Members of the Board of Commissioners, Members of the Board of Directors, Controllers, and Main Shareholders

To enhance transparency and facilitate stakeholders in understanding potential conflicts of interest that may affect decision-making, especially in terms of investment, the Company clearly discloses information regarding the existence or absence of family relationships, financial relationships, and/or management relationships between members of the Board of Commissioners and other members of the Board of Commissioners, between members of the Board of Commissioners and members of the Board of Directors, as well as between members of the Board of Directors and Controllers and Major Shareholders. This disclosure is intended to provide an overview of the internal relationship structure within the Company, so that stakeholders can assess the potential impact of conflicts of interest on the objectivity and integrity of the decisions made.

Other than Mr. Franky Oesman Widjaja, who is the Controller of the Company, other members of the Board of Commissioners have no affiliation either with fellow members of the Board of Commissioners, members of the Board of Directors, the Controllers, or the Main Shareholders. [GRI 2-15-b]

Affiliate relationships between members of the Board of Commissioners, between members of the Board of Commissioners and members of the Board of Directors, as well as between members of the Board of Commissioners and the Controllers and Main Shareholders can be seen in the Company Profile section, Matrix of Affiliated Relationships between the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors sub-section.

# Kepemilikan Saham Perseroan oleh Dewan Komisaris [AC6S D.1.3.] [AC6S D.1.4.]

# Share Ownership of the Board of Commissioners in the Company [ACGS D.1.3.]

[ACGS.D.1.4.]

Perseroan melarang anggota Dewan Komisaris untuk mencambil keuntungan dari informasi non-public dengan makukanan perdagangan orang dalam dan/ atau penyahalgunaan transaksi pribadi.

Piagam Dewan Komisaris Perseroan menetapkan kewajiban bagi setiap anggota Dewan Komisaris sebagai berikut:

- Setiap anggota Dewan Komisaris wajibantu mengkapkan kepemilikan saham yang mencapai  $5\%$  kepada lebih dari modal disetor, yang meliputi ini dan rumah lebar saham di dalam Perserao.  
- Setiap anggota Dewan Komisaris wajib melaporkan setup perubahan atas kepermilikan saham Perseroan kepada Sekretaris Perusahaan selambat-lambatnya 1 (satu) hari sebelummelon makukan transaksi saham Perseroan (jika ada), untuk dilaporkan oleh Sekretaris Perusahaan ke OJK dan BEI selambat-lambatnya 2 (dua) hari kerja seks agar terjadinya perubahan kepermilikan tersebut. [ACGS A.7.1.]

Bapak Franky Oesman Widjaja (Presiden Komisaris Perseroan) memiliki saham dalam Perseroan secara tidak langsung melalui PT Sinar Mas Tunggal. Informasi mengenai ke pemilikan saham Perseroan oleh Bapak Franky Oesman Widjaja dapat dilihat pada bagian Profil Perusahaan, sub-bagian Komposisi Pemegang Saham dan sub-bagian Struktur Perusahaan. Selain Bapak Franky Oesman Widjaja, anggota Dewan Komisaris lainnya tidak memiliki saham di Perseroan, baik secara langsung maupun tidak langsung. [GRI 2-15-b]

The Company forbids members of the Board of Commissioners from taking advantage of non-public information by conducting insider trading and/or abusive self-dealing.

The Company's Charter of the Board of Commissioners stipulates the obligations of each member of the Board of Commissioners as follows:

Each member of the Board of Commissioners must report any share ownership of  $5\%$  or more of the paid-up capital, which includes types and number of shares in the Company.  
Each member of the Board of Commissioners must report to the Corporate Secretary any changes of share ownership in the Company no later than 1 (one) day before entering into the transaction of the Company's share (if any), to be reported by the Corporate Secretary to OJK and IDX no later than 2 (two) working days since such changes happen. [ACGS A.7.1.]

Mr. Franky Oesman Widjaja (the President Commissioner of the Company) indirectly owns the Company's shares through PT Sinar Mas Tunggal. Information regarding the ownership of the Company's shares by Mr. Franky Oesman Widjaja can be seen in the Company Profile section, Shareholding Composition and Corporate Structure subsections. Apart from Mr. Franky Oesman Widjaja, other members of the Board of Commissioners do not own shares in the Company, either directly or indirectly. [GRI 2-15-b]

# Komisaris Independen

Komisaris Independen adalah anggota Dewan Komisaris yang tidak memiliki hubungan affiliasi dan kepentinganapanapun dengan Direksi, anggota Dewan Komisaris lainnya, Pengendali, maupun Pemegang Saham Utama Perseroan, Seeinga tidak mencpengaruhi kemampuanya dalam bertindak untuk kepentingan perusahaan secara independen.

Throughout 2024, there were no transactions on the Company's shares made by the members of the Board of Commissioners, hence as of December 31, 2024, there were no changes in ownership of the Company's shares by the members of the Board of Commissioners.

[ACGS.D.5.1.]

# Independent Commissioners

Independent Commissioners are members of the Board of Commissioners who do not have any affiliation or interest with any of the members of the Board of Directors, other members of the Board of Commissioners, Controllers, or Main Shareholders of the Company, hence that his/her ability to act independently for the Company's interest is not affected.

# Tugas Komisaris Independen

Selain seksukan tugas umum anggota Dewan Komisaris, Komisaris Independen menjalankan tersebut tugas tambahan, antara lain:

- tatsächional translation of the English translation of the Arabic translation.  
[G-08]  
- memberikan saran untuk menjaga kepentingan masyarakat di sekitar wilayah Perseroan dan entitas anak serta kepentingan para pemangku kepentingan lainnya  
- seksualisi pengobatan
- mengawasi kepadahan pada peraturan dan perundangan yang berlaku  
-了不少的女性，比如女性、男性、女性和男性。  
- meninja transaksi dengan pihak berelasi yang material untuk memastikan Bahwa transaksi tersebut dilakukan secara wajar dengan mempertimbangkan kepada Perseroan  
-(OP)

# Duties of the Independent Commissioners

In addition to carrying out their general duties as members of the Board of Commissioners, Independent Commissioners also carry out several additional duties, such as:

- support fair treatment towards minority shareholders [G-08]  
provide advice to safeguard the interests of local communities surrounding the premises of the Company and its subsidiaries as well as the interests of other stakeholders  
- oversee the compliance with prevailing laws and regulations  
- increase the accountability of the organs within the Company  
- review material transactions with related parties to ensure that such transactions are carried out on an arm's length basis in the best interest of the Company  
- hold a separate meeting at least once a year without the presence of executive officers

Untuk menjaga independensi pengawasan atas pengelolaan perusahaan dan hak pemegang saham, sejak tahun 2009 Perseroan telah menggangkat Komisaris Independen. Pada akhir tahun 2024, jumlah Komisaris Independen mewakili  $67\%$  dari total anggota Dewan Komisaris dimana hal ini telah memenuhi ketentuan OJK. Untuk mencaskan komitmen Komisaris Independen Perseroan untuk bertindak secara objektif dan tanpa adanya benturan kepentingan dalam menjalankan fungsi pengawasannya, Komisaris Independen Perseroan telah memberikan pernyataan independensi kembali pada tanggal 29 Mei 2024. [GRI 2-9-c]

Seluruh Komisaris Independen Perseroan telah memenuhkitentuan rangkap jabatan sebagai dipersyaratkan dalamPeraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 tersebut Direksi dan DewanKomisaris Emiten atas Perusahaan Publik.

To maintain the independency of supervision over the management of the company and shareholder rights, since 2009, the Company has appointed Independent Commissioners. As of the end of 2024, Independent Commissioners represent  $67\%$  of the Board of Commissioners, which complied with OJK's provisions. To affirm the commitment of the Company's Independent Commissioners to act objectively and without any conflict of interest in carrying out their supervisory functions, the Company's Independent Commissioners provided a renewed independency statement on May 29, 2024.[GRI 2-9-6]

All Independent Commissioners of the Company fulfilled the concurrent positions requirements as stipulated in OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014 on the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies.

# Direksi

Board of Directors

Direksi adalah organ Perseroan yang ditunjuk oleh dan bertanggung jawab kepada RUPS untuk menjalankan seluruh tindakan kepengurusan, mewakili Perseroan baik di dalam maupun di luar pengan, seda bertanggung jawab atas keberlanjutan jangka panjang perusahaan.

Setiap anggota Direksi memiliki kedudukan yang setara, namun memiliki tugas, tanggung jawab, dan wewenang yang berbeda, sesuai dengan bidang dan fungsi yang dipercayakan. Meskipun memiliki tanggung jawab individual di bidang masing-masing, setup anggota Direksi bergolaborasi dan bertindak selaras dengan keputusan dan kebikan strategis yang telah disepakati bersama, untuk menjaga konsistensi dan integritas dalam pengambilan keputusan yang mendukung keberlanjutan dan pertumbuhan jangka panjang perusahaan secara keseluruhan.

# Piagam Direksi ACGSE.1.1

Dalam melaksanakan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya, Direksi berpedoman kepada Piagam Direksi.

Piagam Direksi Perseroan diterbitkan pada tanggal 4 Desember 2015 dan memuat hal-hal sebagai berikut:

- Landasan Hukum  
Nilai dan Etika  
Komposisi dan Kriteria  
Pengangkatan, Pemberhentian, dan Masa Jabatan  
Program Orientasi dan Pelatihan  
Waktu Kerja  
Rangkap Jabatan  
Tanggung Jawab dan Wewenang  
Rapat  
Pelaporan  
Transparansi  
Larangan  
Sanksi

Dengan berlandaskan pada Piagam Direksi, Direksi diharapkan mampu melaksanakan tugas dan tanggung jawab dalam mengelola perusahaan secara profesional, efektif, transparan, kompeten, independen,serta bertanggungjawab.

Piagam Direksi telah dipublikasikan di situs web Perseroan dan akan dievaluasi serta diperbarui secara Berkala seksuai kebutuhan.

The Board of Directors is an organ of the Company appointed by and responsible to the GMS to carry out all management actions, represent the Company both inside and outside the court, and be responsible for the company's long-term sustainability.

Each member of the Board of Directors holds an equal position, but has different tasks, responsibilities, and authorities, according to the fields and functions entrusted. Although each member of the Board of Directors has individual responsibilities in their respective fields, they collaborate and act in harmony with the jointly agreed-upon decisions and strategic policies, to maintain consistency and integrity in decision-making that supports the sustainability and long-term growth of the company as a whole.

# Charter of the Board of Directors AC6S E.1.1

In performing its duties and responsibilities, the Board of Directors is guided by the Charter of the Board of Directors.

The Company's Charter of the Board of Directors was issued on December 4, 2015, and contains the following matters:

Legal Basis  
Values and Ethics  
Composition and Criteria  
Appointment, Dismissal, and Term of Office  
Orientation and Training Programs  
Working Hours  
- Concurrent Positions  
- Responsibilities and Authorities  
Meetings

# Tugas, Wewenang, dan Tanggung Jawab Direksi

# [ACGS.E.1.3.]

Tugas, wewenang, dan tanggung jawab Direksi diatur dalam Anggaran Dasar dan Piagam Direksi Perseroan.

# Tugas

Direksi memiliki tugas sebagai berikut:

- merumusan rencana jangka panjang Perseroan dan mengkaji ada menyetujui visi dan misi Perseroan minimal 1(satu) kali dalam 5(lima) tahun  
- memimpin dan mengurus Perseroan seksuai dengan maksud dan tujuan Perseroan, dengan itikad baik dan kehat-hatian, untuk kelenting Perseorano, tanpa adanya benturan kelentingan [ACGS A.8.2.1. G-09]  
- menjalankan GCG, menciptakan struktur pengendalian internal, menjamin terselenggaranya fungsi audit internal Perseroan dalam setiap kegiatan流失a Perseroan sesuai dengan kebujakan kepada arahan yang diberikan oleh Dewan Komisaris  
- menyiapkan rencana pengembangan, rencana kerja, dan anggaran tahunan Perseroan, termasuk rencana lainnya yang berhubungan dengan pelaksanaan usaha dari Perseroan dan mencapaikanya kepada Dewan Komisaris untuk dimintakan persetujuan, sebelum dimulainya tahun buku yang akan datang, dengan memberperatifikan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku di pasar modal  
- merancang dan menelaah struktur organisi Perseroan secara Berkala  
- memelihara dan mencurus kekayaan Perseroan untuk kepentingan Perseroan  
- seksual
- mengadakan dan memelihara pembukuan dan administrasi Perseroan sesuai dengan kelaziman yang berlaku bagi suatu perusahaan  
- menyusun system akuntansi bergasarkan prinsip pengendalian internal, terutama pemisahan fungsi pengurusan, pencatatan, penyimpanan, dan pengawasan  
- memberikan pertangungjawaban dan segala keterangan tersebut keadaan dan jalinya Perseroan, berupa laporan kegiatan Perseroan, termasuk Laporan Keuangan,基本原则 mengenapin dan的前提下 mengenapin.  
- menususun dan menyerahkan Laporan Keuangan Perseroan kepada AP untuk diperiksa  
- menyediakan data dan informasi yang akurat, relevant, dan tepat waktu kepada Dewan Komisaris  
- membrutuk Unit Audit Internal yang dipimpin oleh Kepala Unit Audit Internal dan dapat membrutuk komite ataunit lainnya (jika diperlukan)  
- menindaklanjuti temuan audit dan rekomendasi dari Komite Audit, Unit Audit Internal, auditor eksternal, dan/atau telah pengawasan otoritas yang berwenang  
- menyampaikan laporan pertanggungjawaban atas pengurusan Perseroan Selama 1 (satu) tahun kepada RUPS selambat-lambatnya 6 (enam) bulan setelah tahun buku Perseroan ditutup  
- menyampaikan laporan dan keterbukaan informasi kepada OJK, BEI, dan instansi berwenang lainnya seksual peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku  
- makukanan Paparan Publik minimal 1 (satu) kali dalam setahun, sesuai prosedur dan persyaratan yang ditetapkan oleh peraturan perundangundangan pasar modal yang berlaku  
- membrina hubunan kerja yang baik, terbuka, konstruktif, dan profesional dengan anggota Direksi lainnya, Dewan Komisaris, Komite, dan karyawan untuk kepentingan terbaik Perseroan  
- melakukan evaluasi atas kinerja unit yang membantu pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawab Direksi  
- menjalankan tugas-tugas lainnya sesuai dengan Anggaran Dasar Perseroan, keputusan RUPS, dan peraturan perdang-undangan yang berlaku

# Wewenang

Kewenangan 2 (dua) orang Direktur secara bersama-sama sebagaimana diatur dalam Anggaran Dasar Perseroan, antara lain sebagai berikut:

- mewakili Perseroan, baik di dalam maupun di luar pengadilan tersebut segala hal dan dalam segala kejadian  
- tatsächional Persecaoan
- mengikut Perseroan dengan pihak lain dan pihak lain dengan Perseroan  
-情况进行分析，确定各组的平均值。

# Duties, Authorities, and Responsibilities of the Board of Directors

# [ACGS E.1.3.]

Duties, authorities, and responsibilities of the Board of Directors are stipulated in the Company's Articles of Association and Charter of the Board of Directors.

# Duties

The Board of Directors has the following duties:  
- formulate the Company's long-term plan and review and approve the Company's vision and mission, for at least once every 5(five)years  
- lead and manage the Company in accordance with the Company's purpose and objective, in good faith and prudence, for the Company's interests, without any conflict of interest [AC6S A-8.2.1G-09]  
- implement GCG, create an internal control structure, ensure the implementation of the Company's internal audit function in every business activity of the Company in accordance with the policies or guidance from the Board of Commissioners  
- prepare development plans, business plans, and annual budget of the Company, including any other plans related to the Company's business and convey them to the Board of Commissioners to obtain its approval, before the beginning of the next financial year, by taking into account the prevailing laws and regulations in the capital market  
- design and review the organizational structure of the Company periodically  
- maintain and manage the Company's assets for the Company's interest  
- administer and maintain the Company's accounts and administration in accordance with the ordinary course of business  
- develop an accounting system based on the principles of internal control, particularly on the separation of the management, recording, filing, and supervision functions  
- deliver accountability and all information on the condition and the course of the Company, in the form of Company's activity reports, including Financial Statements, either in the form of Annual Reports or any other forms of periodic reports, in accordance with the procedure and schedule stipulated in the Articles of Association of the Company and/or anytime requested by the Board of Commissioners  
prepare and deliver the Company's Financial Statement to AP to be audited  
provide accurate, relevant, and timely data and information to the Board of Commissioners  
- establish an Internal Audit Unit chaired by a Head of Internal Audit Unit and may form other committees or units (if necessary)  
- follow up audit findings and recommendations from the Audit Committee, Internal Audit Unit, external auditor, and/or supervisory notice from competent authorities  
- file accountability reports on the management of the Company for 1 (one) year to the GMS at the latest 6 (six) months after the closing of the financial year of the Company  
- submit reports and information disclosures to OJK, IDX, and any other authorities in accordance with the prevailing laws and regulations  
- hold a Public Expose at least once a year, in accordance with the procedure and requirements stipulated in the prevailing capital market laws and regulations  
- maintain good, open, constructive, and professional working relationships with other members of the Board of Directors, Board of Commissioners, Committees, and employees in the best interests of the Company  
- evaluate the performance of units that assist in the implementation of the duties and responsibilities of the Board of Directors  
- carry out other duties in accordance with the Company's Articles of Association, GMS' resolutions, and applicable laws and regulations

# Authorities

The collective authority of 2 (two) Directors according to the Company's Articles of Association, include the followings:

- represent the Company, either inside or outside the court regarding all matters and in all events  
- bind the Company with other parties and to bind other parties with the Company  
with approval of the Board of Commissioners:

Perseroan mensyaratkan anggota Direksi tertentu untuk tidak terlibat dalam pembahasan rapat pada agenda tertentu dalam hal anggota Direksi yang bersangkutan memiliki benturan kepentingan dengan agenda yang akan dibahas. # Tanggung Jawab

Berdasarkan Anggaran Dasar Perseroan, setup anggota Direksi bertanggung jawab secara tanggung renteng atas kerugian Perseroan yang disebabkan oleh kalasan untuk kelalaian anggota Direksi dalam menjalanan tugasnya.

Anggota Direksi tidak dapat dimintakan pertanggungjawaban atas kerugian Perseroan apabila dapat membuktikan bahwa:

- kerugian tersebut bukan karena kesalahan atas kalalaiannya  
- anggota Direksi telah makukanan pengurusan dengan itikad baik, tanggung jawab, dan kepada-hatian, untuk kepentingan Perseroan, dan sesuai dengan makud dan tujuan Perseroan  
- anggota Direksi tidak mempunyai kepentingan pribadi, baik langsung maupun tidak langsung, atas tindakan pengurusan yang inginibatkan kerugian  
- orangota Direksi telah mengambil tindakan untuk mencegah timbulnya ata berlanjutnya kerugian tersebut

# Duties, Authorities, and Responsibilities of the Board of Directors

# [ACGS E.1.3.]

- borrow or lend money on behalf of the Company  
- establish businesses or participate in other domestic or foreign companies  
- purchase fixed assets other than that of daily business activities with a value of more than Rp5,000,000,000 (five billion Rupiah)  
- rent and/or lease out the Company's assets other than that of daily business activities with a value of more than Rp5,000,000,000 (five billion Rupiah)  
- sell or release the rights of fixed assets and companies or encumber fixed assets of the Company with value of up to  $50\%$  (fifty percent) of the Company's net worth  
- bind the Company as a guarantor with the value of up to  $50\%$  (fifty percent) of the Company's net worth

acquire a company

with the approval of the GMS:  
- carry out legal actions related to conflict-of-interest transactions

- transfer or collateralize the assets of the Company, which is more than  $50\%$  (fifty percent) of the total net worth of the Company in 1 (one) financial year, in 1 (one) transaction or more, related to one another or not, by the provisions of Article 102 of UUPT  
- file for bankruptcy of the Company

The Company requires certain members of the Board of Directors not to be involved in meeting discussions on certain agendas in the event that the member of the Board of Directors concerned has a conflict of interest with the agenda to be discussed. The Company also prohibits members of the Board of Directors from representing the Company in the event that a particular member of the Board of Directors has an ongoing case in court against the Company, or he/she has conflicts of interest with the Company, or he/she is being temporarily dismissed. [GRI 2-15-a] [ACGS A.8.2.] [G-09]

# Responsibilities

By the Company's Articles of Association, each member of the Board of Directors is jointly and severally liable for the losses sustained by the Company caused by fault or negligence of the members of the Board of Directors in carrying out their duties.

The member of the Board of Directors shall not be held liable for any loss sustained by the Company if he/she can prove that:

- the loss is not due to his/her fault or negligence  
- he/she has conducted management in good faith, responsibility, and prudence, for the interest of the Company and by the objectives of the Company  
- he/she has no personal interest, either directly or indirectly, for the management actions which result in losses  
- he/she has taken the necessary measures to prevent the occurrence or continuation of such losses

# Komposisi dan Keberagaman Direksi [GRI-2-9-c]

Sesuai dengan Anggaran Dasar dan Piagam Direksi Perseroan, Direksi Perseroan terdiri dari sekurang-kurangnya 3 (tiga) orang anggota yang dipimpin oleh seorang Presiden Direktur di mana sudah situ Direktur lainnya dapat diangkat sebagai Wakil Presiden Direktur.

Peraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014tentang Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten ata Perusahan Publik menetapkan kepada jumlah anggota Direksi telah paling kurang 2 (dua) anggota, di mana 1 (satu) di antara anggota Direksi diangkat menjadi direktur utama ata presiden direktur.

# Composition and Diversity of the Board of Directors [GRI-2-9-c]

By the Company's Articles of Association and the Charter of the Board of Directors, the Board of Directors shall consist of at least 3 (three) members, chaired by a President Director of which one of the other Directors can be appointed as Vice President Director.

OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014 concerning the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies stipulates that the number of Board of Directors members must be at least 2 (two) members, with 1 (one) of the Board of Directors members appointed as the managing director or president director.

Sehubungan dengan berakhirnyaasa jabatan Direksiperiode tahun2019-2024, padaRUPST tanggal 25 Juni 2024,Perseroanlah secara resmi menetapkan susunan anggota Direksi untukperiode 2024-2029.Informasi terkait pengangkatan anggota Direksi ini tetah diumumkan dalam keterbukaan informasi Perseroan tanggal 26 Juni 2024.

Per 31 Desember 2024, Direksi Perseroan terdiri dari 7 (tujuh) orang anggota, termasuk di antaranya 1 (satu) orang Presiden Direktur dan 1 (satu) orang Wakil Presiden Direktur.

In relation to the end of the Board of Directors' term for the 2019-2024 period, at the AGM on June 25, 2024, the Company has officially established the composition of the Board of Directors for the 2024-2029 period. Information regarding the appointment of the members of the Board of Directors has been announced in the Company's information disclosure on June 26, 2024.

As of December 31, 2024, the Company's Board of Directors consisted of 7 (seven) members, including 1 (one) President Director and 1 (one) Vice President Director.

# Kriteria Pengangkatan Direksi

# [GR12-10-b] [ACGS E.3.10.] [G-06]

# Appointment Criteria for the Board of Directors

# [GRI 2-10-b] [ACGS E.3.10.] [G-06]

Perseroan menetapkan persyaratan umum bagi orang perorangan untuk dapat diangkat sebagai anggota Direksi Perseroan, sebagai berikut:  
- mempunyai akhlak, moral, dan integritas yang baik  
- cakap melakukan perbuatan hukum  
dalam 5 (lima)ahun sebelum pengangkatan dan selama menjabat:

- tidyah ninyatakpan pailit  
- tidyak pernah menjadi anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris yang dinyatakan bersalah menyebabkan suatu perusahaan dinyatakan pailit  
- tidyak pernah dihukum karena makukan tindak pidana yang merugikan keuangan negara dan/atau yang Berkaitan dengan sektor keuangan  
- tidyak pernah menjadi anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris yang selama menjabat:

-ERNAH
- PERNAH Tidak menyelenggaraman RUPST  
pertanggungjawabanya sebagai anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris pernah tidak diterima oleh RUPS untuk pernah tidak memberikan pertanggungjawaban sebagai anggota Direksi dan/atau anggota Dewan Komisaris kepada RUPS

- pernah menyebabkan perusaan yang memperoleh izin, persetujuan, ataupendaftaran dari OJK tidak memenuhi kewajiban menyampaikan laporan tahunan dan/atau laporan keuangan kepada OJK  
■ memiliki komitmen untuk mematuhi peraturan perundang-undangan  
■ memiliki pengetahun dan/atau keahlian di bidang yang dibutuhkan

Persyaratan umum ini tercantum dalam Anggaran Dasar Perseroan.

Perseroan tidak memiliki anggota Direksi yang sebelumnya merupakan kanyakan ata mitra dari auditor eksternal Perseroan dalam 2 (dua) tahun terakhir. [ACGS(P)E.3.1.]

The Company has established general requirements for individuals to be appointed as members of the Company's Board of Directors, as follows:

having good character, morals, and integrity  
- being capable of conducting any legal act  
- within 5 (five) years prior to his/her appointment and during his/her term of office:

- having never been declared bankrupt  
- having never been a member of a Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners who was found guilty of causing a company to go bankrupt  
- having never been sentenced for a criminal action that was detrimental to the state's finances and/or related to the financial sector  
- having never been a member of a Board of Directors and/or Board of Commissioners of which during his/her term of office:

he/she did not hold the AGM  
■ his/her accountability as a member of the Board of Directors and/or member of the Board of Commissioners was rejected by the GMS, or he/she failed to provide his/her accountability as a member of the Board of Directors and/or member of the Board of Commissioners to the GMS  
he/she had caused a company that had obtained licenses, approvals, or registration statements from OJK to fail to comply with its obligation to submit its annual report and/or financial statements to OJK  
■ being committed to complying with laws and regulations  
having the knowledge and/or expertise in the required field

These general requirements are stated in the Articles of Association of the Company.

The Company does not have any members of the Board of Directors who were previously employees or partners of the Company's external auditors in the last 2 (two) years. [ACGS(P)E.3.1.]

# Pengangkatan, Pemberhentian, dan Masa Jabatan Direksi

# [GRI 2-9-c]

# Appointment, Dismissal, and Term of Office of the Board of

# Directors [GRI 2-9-c]

Usulan kerkait pengangkatan, pemberhientian, dan/atau penggantian anggota Direksi diajukan oleh Dewan Komisaris dengan memperhatikan rekomendasi Komite Nominasi.

Keputusan pengangkatan, pemberhentian, dan/atau penggantian anggota Direksi dipereleh melalui persekituuan pemegang saham Perseroan dalam RUPS. Pengangkatan anggota Direksi berlaku efektif sejak tanggal ditetapkan oleh RUPS.

Anggota Direksi diangkat dan diberhentikan oleh RUPS, umumnya untuk jangka waktu 5 (lima) tahun. RUPS berhadakan memberhentikan anggota Direksi setiap waktu sebelum masa jabatannya berakhir. [ACGS E.3.11]

Jabatan anggota Direksi dengan sendirinya berakhir, dalam hal:

- masa jabatan anggota Direksi berakhir  
- orangota Direksi mengajukan pengunduran diri sesuai dengan ketentuan yang tercantum dalam Anggaran Dasar Perseroan  
- anggota Direksi meninggal dunia  
- anggota Direksi diberhentikan berdasarkan keputusan RUPS  
- angigota Direksi dinyatakan pailit atop asetnya ditaruh di bawah pengampuan berdasarkan suatu keputusan pengadilan  
- anggota Direksi tidak lagi memenuhi persyaratan perundang-undangan yang berlaku, termasuk apabila anggota Direksi yang bersangkutan terlibat dalam kejahatan keuanganan dan terbukti melakukan kesalahan

Tata cara pengangkatan, penggantian, pemberhentian, ata pengunduran diri anggota Direksi Perseroan dilakukan tersebut dengan Anggaran Dasar dan Piagam Direksi Perseroan.

Perseroan tidak pernah mengalami kejadian di mana anggota Direksi mengundurkan diri dan menggangkat suatu isu sebelumangan dengan tata kelola. [ACCS(P)E.1.2]

Proposals related to the appointment, dismissal, and/or replacement of members of the Board of Directors are made by the Board of Commissioners by considering the recommendations of the Nomination Committee.

Decisions on the appointment, dismissal, and/or replacement of members of the Board of Directors are obtained through the approval of the Company's shareholders at the GMS. The appointment of members of the Board of Directors is effective as of the date determined by the GMS.

Each member of the Board of Directors is appointed and dismissed by the GMS, generally for a term of 5(five)years. The GMS also holds the authority to dismiss members of the Board of Directors at any time before his/her term of office expires. ACGS E-3.11

The office of a member of the Board of Directors shall terminate if:

- his/her term of office expires  
- he/she submits his/her resignation by the provisions stated in the Articles of Association of the Company  
he/she passes away  
- he/she is dismissed by the GMS  
- he/she is declared bankrupt, or his/her assets are placed under custody based on a court decision  
- he/she no longer qualifies to comply with the prevailing laws and regulations, including if the member of the Board of Directors concerned is involved in financial crimes and is found guilty

Procedures for the appointment, replacement, dismissal, or resignation of members of the Company's Board of Directors are performed by the Articles of Association and the Charter of the Board of Directors of the Company.

The Company has never experienced any instances where a member of the Board of Directors resigned and raised governance-related issues.

[ACGS(P)E.1.2.]

# Program Pengenalan Perusahaan bagi Anggota Direksi Baru [ACGS E.5.1]

Perseroan memiliki kebijakan untuk melaksanakan program pengenalan perusahaan untuk memperdalam pengetahunan anggota Direksibaru terkait Perseroan.

Materi programpengenalanperusahaanyangdiberikanantara lain mencakup:

- gambaran(OP) mengenaiPerseroan, khususnya mengenai visi, misi, nilai-nilai, Kode Etik, Piagam Direksi, lini usaha, strategi perusahan, kinerja keuangan dan operasi, risiko usaha, dan masalah-masalah strategis  
tugas, wewenang, dan tanggung jawab Direksi, auditor internal dan eksternal, Komite Audit, dan Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi  
prinsip-prinsip GCG

Untuk tahun 2024, seabubungan dengan penambahan anggota Direksi BARU, Perseroan telah mengangkat anggota Direksi BARU, sehingga, Perseroan telah melakukan program pengenalan perusahaan kepada anggota Direksi BARU pada tanggal 9 Agustus 2024.

# Pelaksanaan Tugas Direksi pada Tahun 2024

Direksi telah melaksanan tugasnya sesuai dengan Piagam Direksi.

Direksi bekerja secara kolektif dengan memanfaatkan keahlian dan pengalaman masing-masing anggota,{serta menjaga transparansi dan akuntabilitas dalam setiap langkah yang diambil.KeberHASILAN perusahaan tidakanya bergantung pada keputusan yang diambil, tetapi juga pada integritas dan sinergi yang terjalin di antara anggota Direksi dan seluruh elemen perusahaan.

Direksi memimpin dan melaksanakan kepengurusan Perseroan dengan itikad baik dan kehat-hatian, sesuai dengan Anggaran Dasar dan Piagam Direksi Perseroan. Dalam pelaksanaannya, Perseroan menerapkan pembagian tugas dan tanggung jawab yang jelas untuk setiap anggota Direksi untuk menjamin keseimbangan kekuasaan, wewenang, akuntabilitas, serta pengambilan keputusan yang tepat.

# Induction Program for New Member(s) of the Board of Directors [ACGS E.5.1]

The Company has a policy on the implementation of an induction program to deepen the knowledge of new members of the Board of Directors regarding the Company.

The induction program covers, among others, the following materials:

- overview of the Company, particularly regarding its vision, mission, values, Code of Conduct, Charter of the Board of Directors, business lines, corporate strategy, financial and operating performance, business risks, and strategic issues  
- duties, authorities, and responsibilities of the Board of Directors, internal and external auditors, the Audit Committee, and the Nomination and Remuneration Committee  
GCG principles

For the year 2024, in connection with the addition of new members of the Board of Directors, the Company has appointed new members of the Board of Directors, therefore the Company conducted the induction program for new members of the Board of Directors on August 9, 2024.

# Implementation of Duties of the Board of Directors in 2024

The Board of Directors has carried out its duties by the Charter of the Board of Directors.

The Board of Directors works collectively by leveraging the expertise and experience of each member, while maintaining transparency and accountability in every step taken. The success of the company does not only depend on the decisions made, but also on the integrity and synergy developed among the Board members and all elements of the company.

The Board of Directors led and carried out the management of the Company in good faith and prudence, by the Articles of Association and the Charter of the Board of Directors of the Company. The Company implements a clear segregation of duties and responsibilities for each member of the Board of Directors to ensure a balance of power, authority, accountability, as well as proper decision-making.

# Rapat Direksi

Rapat Direksi berfungsi sebagai forum bagi para anggota Direksi untuk berdiskusi, menetapkan keputusan, serta merumusan berbagai hal terkait operasional perusahaan, pengambilan keputusan strategis, serta pelaporan keuangan-proyek-risikorencana bisnis.

Mengacu pada Peraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014, Rapat Direksi diadakan secara rutin setidaknya 1 (satu) kali setup bulan, dengan tingkat kehadiran setiap anggota Direksi minimal  $75\%$  dari total rapat yang diselenggaramakan dalam 1 (satu) tahun buku. Undangan rapat disampaikan oleh Presiden Direktur ataung anggota Direksi lainnya.

Setiap anggota Direksi memiliki hak yang tersebut untuk mengemukakan pendapat dan memberikan suara dalamRAPAT. Keputusan dalamRapat Direksi diutamakanDICapai melalui

# Meetings of the Board of Directors

Meeting of the Board of Directors is a forum where members of the Board of Directors meet to discuss, decide, and formulate various matters related to company operations, strategic decision making, as well as financial reporting- projects-risks-business plans.

In accordance with OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014, the meeting of Board of Directors shall be convened on a regular basis at least once a month, with an attendance rate for each member of the Board of Directors of at least  $75\%$  of the total number of meetings held in 1(one) financial year. Notice of the meetings shall be made by the President Director or other member of the Board of Directors.

Each member of the Board of Directors has equal opportunity and voting rights to express his/her opinions. The resolution of the Board of Directors meeting shall be taken based on deliberation

muyawarah untuk mufakat. Apabila kesepakatan tidak tercapai, keputusan ditetapkan melalui pemungutan suara, dengan ketentuan bahwa keputusan dianggap sah jika disetujui oleh sekurang-kurangnya 2/3 dari anggota Direksi yang hadir. [ACSG.E.3.4.]

Perseroan menetapkan rencana penyelenggaraan RUPST, rapat Dewan Komisaris, rapat Direksi, rapat gabungan Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi, rapat Komite Audit, dan rapat pembahasan pelaksanaan tugas dan tanggung jawab Sekretaris Perusahaan pada awal tahun buku ataupada akhir tahun buku sebelumnya. Untuk tahun 2024, rencana penyelenggaraan rapat ditetapkan pada Rapat Dewan Komisaris tanggal 19 Januari 2024. ACGS E.3.1

Selama tahun 2024, Direksi telah melaksanan 17 (tujuan belas) kaliRAPAT, termasuk di antaranya 5 (lima) kali rapat gabungan dengan Dewan Komisaris. Tingkat kepada Direksi dalam rapat secara rata-rata sudah hadalah 96%. [GRI 2-12-c] [GRI 2-13-b] [ACGS E.3.2.] [G-02]

Keputusan pada setiap rapat Direksi dituangkan dalam risalah rapat yang ditandatangani oleh seluruh anggota Direksi yang hadir dalam rapat. Risalah rapat menjadi dokumentasi resmi yang akan dijadikan referensi untuk tindak lanjut dan evaluasi atas keputusan yang telah diambil dalam rapat.

The Company scheduled the AGM, meetings of the Board of Commissioners, meetings of the Board of Directors, joint meetings of the Board of Commissioners and the Board of Directors, meetings of the Audit Committee, and meetings on the implementation of duties of the Corporate Secretary at the beginning of the financial year or the end of the previous financial year. For 2024, the schedules of meetings were determined in the meetings of the Board of Commissioners held on January 19, 2024. [ACGS E.3.1.]

In 2024, the Board of Directors held 17 (seventeen) meetings, including 5 (five) joint meetings with the Board of Commissioners. The average attendance rate of the Board of Directors at the meetings was  $96\%$ . [GRI 2-12-c] [GRI 2-13-b] [ACGS E.3.2] [G-02]

The resolutions of each Board of Directors meeting were stated in a minute of the meeting, which should be signed by all members of the Board of Directors who were present at the meeting. The minutes of the meeting serve as official documentation that will be used as a reference for follow-up and evaluation of the decisions made during the meeting.

# Board of Directors Succession

Board of Directors succession is the process of identifying employees who excel and have the potential to become leaders in the future. This process is to prepare employees to fill vacancies in important

mampu mengisi posisi strategis yang kosong, meminimalkan risiko hilangnya kompetensi kepermimpinan di dalam perusahaan,{serta menjaga kelangsungan operasional dan mendukung pertumbuhan perusahaan secara berkelanjutan.

Perseroan telah menetapkan Kebijakan Suksesi Direksi sebagai bagian dari Kebijakan Tata Kelola Perusahaan. Melalui kebijakan ini, Perseroan diharapkan mampu kepada dinamika perubahan dengan lebih tanggap seda menjaga stabilitas dan keberlanjutan pengelolaan perusahaan, meskipun terjadi pergantian pada posisi-posisi strategis. Program suksesi Direksi ini mencakup proses evaluasi potensi dan kesiapan individu yang berpeluang mengisi peran penting dalam proses pengambilan keputusan di tingkat Direksi.

Informasi mengenai suksesi Direksi dapat dilihat pada bagian Governansi Corporat, sub-bagian Komite Nominasi dan Remunerasi.

Berdasarkan Keputusan Direksi BEI No. Kep-00101/BEI/12-2021 tanggal 21 Desember 2021 perihal perubahan Peraturan BEI No. I-A tersebut Pencatatan Saham dan Efek bersifat Ekuitas selain Saham yang Diterbitkan oleh Perusahaan Tercatat, perusahaan tercatat tidak lagi diwajibkan untuk memiliki Direktur Independen. Keputusan diterbitkan oleh BEI pada tanggal 21 Desember 2021 dan sudah diberlakukan pada tanggal yang sama.

Meski demikian, dengan memahami pentingnya independensi dalam perusahaan publik, Perseroan tetap Berkomitmen untuk menjaga independensinya dan memastikan bahwa setiap transaksi

# Family, Financial, and Management Relationship Between Members of the Board of Directors, Members of the Board of Commissioners, Controllers, and Main Shareholders

Based on Decision of Board of Directors of IDX No. Kep-00101/ BEI/12-2021 dated December 21, 2021, concerning the changes of BEI Regulation No. I-A concerning the Listing of Shares (Stock) and Equity-Type Securities Other than Stock Issued by the Listed Company, listed companies are not required to have an Independent Director. The decision was issued by the IDX on December 21, 2021, and has been enacted starting on the same date.

However, by having an understanding of the importance of independence in public companies, the Company seeks to maintain independence and ensure that all transactions and corporate

sertaaksi korporasi dilaksanan sesuai dengan prinsip GCG serta peraturan dan perundang-undangan yang berlaku.

Untuk membantu para pemangku kepentingan memahami hubungan serta potensi konflik kepentingan yang dapat memengaruhi keputusan investasi, Perseroan mengungkapkan informasi mengenai ada atasnya hubungan keluarga dan/atau keuanganan antara anggota Direksi dengan sesama anggota Direksi, anggota Dewan Komisaris, serta dengan Pengendali dan Pemegang Saham Utama.

Bapak Lay Krisnan Cahya memiliki hubungan keluarga dengan Bapak Daniel Cahya, namun tidak memiliki hubungan affiliasi dengan Pengendali dan Pemegang Saham Utama Perseroan. Selain Bapak Lay Krisnan Cahya dan Bapak Daniel Cahya yang memiliki hubungan keluarga, anggota Direksi lainnya tidak memiliki hubungan affiliasi baik dengan sesama anggota Direksi, anggota Dewan Komisaris, Pengendali, maupun Pemegang Saham Utama. [GRI 2-15-b] [ACGS E.4.5]

Hubungan affiliasi antara anggota Direksi dengan anggota Direksi lainnya, antara anggota Direksi dengan anggota Dewan Komisaris, seda antara anggota Direksi dengan Pengendali dan Pemegang Saham Utama dapat dilihat pada bagian Profil Perusahaan, subbagian Matriks Hubungan Affiliasi Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi.

# Ketentuan Rangkap Jabatan Direksi

# Provisions on the Concurrent Positions of the Board of Directors

Anggota Direksi dapat merangkap jabatan, dengan memerhatikan ketentuan dalam Peraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 dan Anggaran Dasar Perseroan, sebagai berikut:

- anggota Direksi paling banyak pada 1(satu) emiten kepada perusahaan publik  
- anggota Dewan Komisaris paling banyak pada 3 (tiga) emiten atauperusahaan publik  
- anggota Komite paling banyaq pada 5(lima) emiten kepada perusahaan publik, dimana anggota Direksi yang bersangkutannya menjadi sebagai anggota Direksi untuk anggota Dewan Komisaris

Ketentuan rangkap jabatan di atas berlaku sepanjang tidak bertentangan dengan peraturan perundang-undangan lainnya. Dalam hal terdapat peraturan perundang-undangan lain yang mengetur ketentuan mencenai rangkap jabatan yang berbeda dengan ketentuan sebagaimana diatur dalam Peraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014, berlaku ketentuan yang mengetur lebih ketat.

A member of the Board of Directors may hold concurrent positions, by considering the provisions stipulated in OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014 and the Company's Articles of Association, as follows:

- a member of a Board of Directors at most in 1(one) issuer or public company
- a member of a Board of Commissioners at most in 3(three) issuers or public companies  
- a member of a committee at most in 5 (five) issuers or public companies, in which the relevant member of the Board of Directors also serves as a member of the Board of Directors or the Board of Commissioners

The provision of concurrent positions above applies as long as they do not conflict with other laws and regulations. If there are other laws and regulations governing the provisions regarding concurrent positions that differ from those stipulated in OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014, provisions that regulate more strictly apply.

Seluruh anggota Direksi Perseroan telah memenuhi ketentuan rangkap jabatan sebagai memapaina dipersyaratkan dalam Peraturan OJK No. 33/POJK.04/2014 tersebut Direksi dan Dewan Komisaris Emiten atas Perusahaan Publik. ACGS(P)E.2.3.

All members of the Company's Board of Directors comply with the concurrent position provisions stipulated in OJK Regulation No. 33/POJK.04/2014 concerning the Board of Directors and Board of Commissioners of Issuers or Public Companies. [ACGS(P)E.2.3.]

# Kepemilikan Saham Perseroan oleh Direksi

ACGS D.1.3; ACGS D.1.4.

Perseroan melarang anggota Direksi untuk mencambil keuntungan dari informasi non-public dengan aktivakan perdagangan informasi orang dalam dan/atau penyalahgunaan untuk transaksi pribadi.

Piagam Direksi juga menetapkan kewajiban bagi setiap anggota Direksi untuk melaporkan setiap transaksi saham yang dimilikinya di Perseroan pada hari yang sama saat terjadinya transaksi tersebut (jika ada), untuk kemudian dilaporkan oleh Sekretaris Perusahaan kepada OJK dan BEI. [ACGS A.7.1.]

# Share Ownership of the Board of Directors in the Company [ACGS D.1.3] [ACGS D.1.4.]

The Company forbids members of the Board of Directors from taking advantage of non-public information by conducting insider trading information and/or abusive self-dealing.

The Charter of the Board of Directors also stipulates the obligation for each member of the Board of Directors to report any changes of share ownership in the Company on the same day as the share transaction (if any), to be reported by the Corporate Secretary to OJK and IDX. [ACGS A.7.1.]

# Komite Audit

TACGS E.2.18.

Audit Committee ACGS E.218.J

Komite Audit adalah organ pendukung perusahaan yang dibentuk oleh dan bertanggung jawab kepada Dewan Komisaris, yang berfungsi sebagai perpanjangan tangan Dewan Komisaris. Komite Audit berfungsi menjadi perpanjangan tangan Dewan Komisaris dalam melaksanan fungsi pengawasan atas proses pelaporan keuangan, pengendalian internal, dan audit internal Perseroan. Tugas utama Komite Audit adalah untuk memastikan Bahwa seluruh systemd pengendalian dan laporan keuangan perusahaan berjalan sesuai dengan prinsip-prinsip tata kelola yang baik,{serta memastikan transparansi dan akuntabilitas dalam setup proses yangteringdengan kegiatan keuangan dan audit.

Komite Audit bekerja secara kolektif dan independen dalam melaksanan tugasnya. Untuk memastikan bahwa=tugas pengawasan dan evaluasi berjalan dengan optimal, sesuai dengan standar terbaik,serta dapat memberikan kontribusi yang signifikan terhadap kualitas tata kelola Perseroan, Komite Audit dapat bekerja sama dengan unit-unit lain di dalam Perseroan. Dengan persetujuan

During the year 2024, there were share transactions conducted by a member of the Board of Directors as explained in the table above. Shares were obtained before the relevant person was appointed as a member of the Board of Directors of the Company and the transaction is intended to maintain the independence of the company's management. [AC6S D.5.1]

The Audit Committee is a supporting organ of the company established by and responsible to the Board of Commissioners, which functions as an extension of the Board of Commissioners. The Audit Committee functions as an extension of the Board of Commissioners in carrying out oversight functions over the financial reporting process, internal control, and internal audit of the Company. The main task of the Audit Committee is to ensure that the entire system of controls and the company's financial reports operate by good governance principles, as well as to ensure transparency and accountability in every process related to financial and audit activities.

The Audit Committee works collectively and independently in carrying out its duties. To ensure that the tasks of supervision and evaluation run optimally, by the best standards, and can make a significant contribution to the quality of the Company's governance, the Audit Committee may cooperate with other units within the Company. With the approval of the Board of Commissioners and at

Dewan Komisaris dan atas biaya Perseroan, Komite Audit juga dapat mempekerjakan tenaga ahli dan/atau konsultan untuk bidang di mana Unit Audit Internal belum memiliki keahlian untuk membantu Komite Audit.

# Charter of the Audit Committee ACGS E.2.21

The Charter of the Audit Committee acts a guideline for the Audit Committee to carry out its duties and responsibilities to support the Board of Commissioners in carrying out its supervisory function.

The Company's Charter of the Audit Committee was first issued in 2011 which has been reviewed from time to time to align with the prevailing laws and regulations. It was then updated in 2013 and 2019.

The Charter of the Audit Committee covers the following items:

Legal Basis  
Values and Ethics  
Composition and Criteria  
Appointment, Dismissal, and Term of Office  
Orientation and Training Programs  
Duties, Authorities, and Responsibilities  
Meetings  
Performance Appraisal  
Reporting  
Confidentiality  
Prohibitions  
Sanctions

With guidance from the Charter of the Audit Committee, the Audit Committee is expected to carry out its duties and responsibilities properly and effectively.

The Charter of the Audit Committee is available on the Company's website and will be reviewed periodically as necessary.

# Susunan Komite Audit

Komite Audit terdiri dari minimal 3 (tiga) anggota yang juga menjabat sebagai Komisaris Independen kepada pihak eksternal di luar Perseroan, dengan 1 (satu) Komisaris Independen bertindak sebagai ketua.

Seluruh anggota Komite Audit Perseroan merupakan individu yang bersifat independen dan non-eksekutif, yang berasal dari jajaran Komisaris Independen. Komposisi yang sepenuhnya independen ini bertujuan memastikan Komite Audit dapat menjalankan tugasnya secara objektif, bebas dari konflik kepentingan,{serta mampu memberikan pengawasan yang efektif terhadap aspek-aspek utama tata kelola perusahaan, termasuk pelaporan keuangan, pengendalian internal, dan proses audit internal. [ACGS E.2.19.] ACGS

E.2.20.]

Sehubungan dengan berakhirnyaasa jabatan anggota Komite Auditperiode tahun 2019-2024, pada tanggal 25 Juni 2024, Perseroan telah secara resmi menggangkat kembali anggota Komite Audit untukperiode 2024-2029.Informasi terkait pengangkatan anggota Komite Audit ini tetah diumumkan dalam keterbukaan informasi Perseroan tanggal 26 Juni 2024.

Dengan pengangkatan kembali tersebut, susunan Komite Audit Perseroan telah sebagai berikut:

# Composition of the Audit Committee

The Audit Committee shall consist of at least 3 (three) persons who also serve as Independent Commissioners or an external party of the Company, of which 1 (one) Independent Commissioner acts as the chairperson.

All members of the Company's Audit Committee are independent and non-executive individuals drawn from the ranks of the Company's Independent Commissioners. This entirely independent composition aims to ensure that the Audit Committee can perform its functions objectively and without any conflicts of interest, as well as able to provide effective oversight of important aspects of corporate governance, including financial reporting, internal control, and internal audit. [ACGS E.2.19.] [ACGS E.2.20.]

In relation to the end of the term of the members of the Audit Committee for the 2019-2024 period, on June 25, 2024, the Company has officially reappointed the members of the Audit Committee for the period of 2024-2029. # Kriteria Pengangkatan

# Komite Audit

# Appointment Criteria for

# the Audit Committee

Persyaratan umum keanggotaan Komite Audit Perseroan, antara lain sebagai berikut:

- memiliki integritas tinggi, kemampuan, pengetahunan, dan pengalaman sesuai dengan bidang pekerjaannya,serta mampu Berkumunikasi dengan baik  
- memahami laporan keuang, bisnis perusahaan, proses audit, manajemen risiko, dan peraturan perdang-undangan di bidangasar modal serta peraturan perdang-undangan terkait lainnya  
- mematuhi Kode Etik Perseroan  
- bersediayzingkatkan kompetensi seca terus menerus melalui pendidikan dan pelatifian  
- memiliki paling sedikit 1 (satu) anggota yang berlatar pendidikan dan keahlian di bidang akuntansi dan/atau keuangan  
- bukan merupakan orang dalam KAP, kantor konsultan hukum, kantor jasa penilai publik, untuk pihak lain yang memberi jasa asurans, jasa non-asurans, jasa penilai, dan/atajasa konsultasi lain kepada Perseroan dan entitas anak dalam waktu 6 (enam) bulan terakhir  
- bukan merupakan orang yang bekerja oleh mempunyai wewenang dan tanggung jawab untuk merencanakan, memimpin, mengendalikan, oleh mengawasi kegiatan Perseroan dan dengan dalam waktu 6 (enam) bulan terakhir, kecuali sebagai Komisaris Independen  
- tidyak mempunyai saham langsung maupun tidak langsung pada Perseroan dan entitas anak  
- tidyak mempunyai hubungan affiliasi dengan anggota Dewan Komisaris, anggota Direksi, Pengendali, ataupun Pemegang Saham Utama Perseroan  
- tidyak mempunyai hubungan usaha, baik langsung maupun tidyak langsung, yang berkaitan dengan kegiatan usaha Perseroan dan entitas anak  
- memiliki kemampuan komunikasi, kerja sama, serta komitmen untuk menyediakan waktu yangcekup untuk melaksanan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya  
- memiliki komitmen untuk menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya secara efektif dan independen

Perseroan tidak memiliki anggota Komite Audit yang sebelumnya merupakan kanyakan ata mitra dari auditor eksternal Perseroan dalam 2 (dua) tahun terakhir. [ACGS(P)E.3.1.]

General requirements for each members of the Audit Committee, among others, as follows:

- having high integrity and possesses the ability, knowledge, and experience related to his/her field of work, and is able to communicate properly  
- having good understanding of the financial statements, businesses of the company, auditing process, risk management, and relevant laws and regulations of capital market as well as other related laws and regulations  
- complying with the Company's Code of Conduct  
- willing to improve his/her competence continuously through education and training  
- having at least 1 (one) member whose educational background and expertise is in accounting and/or finance  
- having not worked for any KAP, law firm, public appraisal firm, or other parties who provide assurance services, non-assurance services, appraisal services, and/or other consulting services to the Company and its subsidiaries within the last 6 (six) months  
not a person who is working for or having the authority and responsibility for planning, directing, controlling, or supervising the activities of the Company and its subsidiaries within the last 6 (six) months, except as an Independent Commissioner  
not owning shares either directly or indirectly in the Company and its subsidiaries  
not having any affiliation with any of the Company's members of the Board of Commissioners, Board of Directors, Controlling, or Main Shareholders  
not having a business relationship, either directly or indirectly, related to the business activities of the Company and its subsidiaries  
- having the ability to communicate, cooperate, and be committed to providing sufficient time to carry out his/her duties and responsibilities  
- having the commitment to carrying out his/her duties and responsibilities effectively and independently

The Company does not have any members of the Audit Committee who were previously employees or partners of the Company's external auditors in the last 2 (two) years. [ACGS(P)E.3.1.]

# Pengangkatan, Pemberhentian, dan Masa Jabatan

# Komite Audit

# Appointment, Dismissal, and Term of Office of

# the Audit Committee

Anggota Komite Audit diangkat dan diberhentikan oleh Dewan Komisaris.

Masajabatan Komite Audit adalah sesuai denganASA jabatan Dewan Komisaris danapat diangkat kembali olehukup1(satu)periode berikutnya.

Keanggotaan Komite Audit berakhir dalam hal masa jabatan anggota Komite Audit berakhir, anggota Komite Audit didiskualifikasi berdasarkan ketentuan peraturan perdang-undangan yang berlaku, mengundurkan diri, pensiun, atasidak diangkat kembali sebagai anggota Komite Audit.

Tata cara pengangkatan, penggantian, pemberhentian, athu pengunduran diri anggota Komite Audit Perseroan dilakukan tersebut dengan Piagam Komite Audit Perseroan.

Members of the Audit Committee are appointed and dismissed by the Board of Commissioners.

The term of office of the Audit Committee is in accordance with the term of office of the Board of Commissioners and can only be reappointed for 1(one) consecutive period.

The term of office of a member of the Audit Committee shall terminate in the event that his/her term of office expires, he/she no longer qualifies based on the prevailing laws and regulations, submits his/her resignation, retires, or is not reappointed as a member of the Audit Committee.

Procedures for the appointment, replacement, dismissal, or resignation of members of the Company's Audit Committee are performed by the Charter of the Audit Committee of the Company.

# Independensi Komite Audit

Seluruh anggota Komite Audit Perseroan telah pihak independen yang telah memenuhi persyaratan umum untuk diangkat sebagai anggota Komite Audit.

Untuk mencaskan komitmen anggota Komite Audit Perseroan untuk bertindak secara objektif dan tanpa adanya benturan kepentingan dalam menjalankan fungsi pengawasannya, setiap anggota Komite Audit Perseroan telah memberikan pernyataan independensi kembali pada tanggal 29 Mei 2024.

# Independency of the Audit Committee

All members of the Audit Committee of the Company are independent parties who meet the general requirements to be appointed as members of the Audit Committee.

To affirm the commitment of the members of the Audit Committee of the Company to act objectively and without any conflict of interest in carrying out their supervisory functions, each member of the Company's Audit Committee has provided a renewed independence statement on May 29, 2024.

# Rapat Komite Audit

Rapat Komite Audit diselenggaramakan secara Berkala sekurangkurangnya 1 (satu) kali dalam 3 (tiga) bulan. Rapat dapat diselenggaramakan apabila dihadiri oleh lebih dari  $1/2$  (satu per dua) jumlah anggota Komite Audit.

Keputusan rapat Komite Audit diambil atas dasar musyawarah untuk mencapai mufakat. Dalam hal musyawarah untuk mufakat tidak tercapai, make pengambilan keputusan dilakukan berdasarkan suara terbanyak.

Keputusan setup rapat Komite Audit dituangkan dalam risalah rapat yang ditandatangani seluruh anggota Komite Audit yang hadir dalam rapat, dan disampaikan secara tertulis kepada Dewan Komisaris.

Selama tahun 2024, Komite Audit telah melaksanakan 8 (delapan) kaliRAPAT,termasukRAPATdenganDewanKomisaris,AP,dan tepala Unit Audit Internal.TingkatkehadiranRAPATKomite Audit pada tahun 2024 secara rata-rataiahallow  $100\%$  [ACGS.E.2.23.]

Ringkasan rapat Komite Audit pada tahun 2024 telah menjadi berikut:

# Meetings of the Audit Committee

The Audit Committee shall convene a meeting on a periodical basis at least once every 3 (three) months. Meetings will be held if attended by more than  $1/2$  (one-half) of the total members of the Audit Committee.

The resolutions of the Audit Committee meeting shall be taken based on deliberation to reach a consensus. In the event deliberation for consensus is not achieved, the resolution shall be made based on the majority vote.

The resolutions of each Audit Committee meeting were stated in the minutes of the meeting which were signed by all members of the Audit Committee present at the meeting, and are submitted in writing to the Board of Commissioners.

In 2024, the Audit Committee held 8 (eight) meetings, including meetings with the Board of Commissioners, AP, and the head of the Internal Audit Unit. The average attendance rate of the Audit Committee meetings held in 2024 was  $100\%$ . [AC6S E.2.23]

# Peningkatan Kompetensi bagi Anggota Komite Audit

Perseroan mendorong setiap anggota Komite Audit untuk berpartisipasi secara aktif dalam pelatihan sekurang-kurangnya 1 (satu) kali dalam setahun, dengan durasi pelatihan minimal selama 12 (dua belas) jam. Pelatihan ini dimaksudkan agar anggota Komite Audit tetap memahami perkembangan terkini dalam hal-hal yang Berkaitan dengan pengawasan keuangan, audit internal, pengendalian risiko, prinsip-prinsip tata kelola perusahaan yang baik, perkembangan regulasi, standar audit, dan praktik terbaik yang berlaku di industri, sehingga dapat menjalankan tugasnya dengan lebih efektif.

# Competency Development for Members of the Audit Committee

The Company encourages each member of the Audit Committee to actively participate in training at least once a year, with a minimum training duration of 12 (twelve) hours. This training is intended to ensure that Audit Committee members remain updated on the latest developments related to financial oversight, internal audits, risk control, principles of good corporate governance, regulatory developments, audit standards, and best practices prevailing in the industry, so they can perform their duties more effectively.

# Komite Manajemen Risiko

[ACGS(B)E.6.1.]

Risk Management Committee ACGS(B)E.6.1

Komite Manajemen Risiko adalah organ pendukung Perseroan yang dibentuk oleh dan bertanggung jawab kepada Dewan Komisaris. Komite ini berperan sebagai perpanjangan tangan Dewan Komisaris dalam memantau serta memberikan penasihatan efektivitas kebujakan danSYSTEM manajemen risiko, pengendalian internal, serta langkah-langkah mitigasi yang diterapkan oleh Perseroan.

Dalam menjadikan tugasnya, Komite Manajemen Risiko bekerja secara kolektif dan independen. Komite ini dapat berkoordinasi dengan Komite Audit{serta berbagai unit di dalam Perseroan{serta, dengan persetujuan Dewan Komisaris dan didanai oleh Perseroan, dapat menc gunakan tenaga ahli kepada konsultan di bidang tertentu yangbelum sepenuhnya dikuasai oleh Unit Manajemen Risiko guna mendukung pelaksanaan tugasnya.

Komite Manajemen Risiko dibentuk pada tanggal 6 Oktober 2022. Keberadaan komite merupakan telah tahun langkah strategis Perseroan untuk mencatkan kemampuan mitigasi risiko bisnis, mengoptimalkan pemanfaatan sumber daya, mencatkan efisiensi operasional, seda mendukung perumusan strategi dan kebikan yang lebih efektif untuk mencapai tujuan bisnis yang berkelanjutan dan memastikan keberlangsungan usaha jangka panjang perusahaan.

# Piagam Komite Manajemen Risiko

Dalam melaksanakan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya, Komite Manajemen Risiko berpedoman kepada Piagam Komite Manajemen Risiko Perseroan yang telah diterbitkan pada tanggal 27 Oktober 2022.

Piagam Komite Manajemen Risiko memuat hal-hal tersebut berikut:

- Landasan Hukum  
Nilai dan Etika  
Komposisi dan Kriteria  
- Pengangkatan, Pemberhentian, dan Masa Jabatan  
Program Orientasi dan Pelatihan  
Tugas dan Tanggung Jawab  
Rapat  
Penilaian Kinerja  
Pelaporan  
Kerahasiaan  
Larangan  
Sanksi

Berlandaskan Piagam Komite Manajemen Risiko, Komite Manajemen Risiko diharapkan dapat menjalankan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya dengan baik dan efektif.

The Risk Management Committee is the supporting organ of the Company established by and responsible to the Board of Commissioners. This committee acts as an extension of the Board of Commissioners in supervising and providing advice on the effectiveness of risk management policies and systems, internal control, and mitigation actions taken by the Company.

In carrying out its duties, the Risk Management Committee works collectively and independently. The Risk Management Committee may coordinate with the Audit Committee and other units within the Company, and with approval of the Board of Commissioners and at the Company's expense, may employ experts and/or consultants, in areas where the Risk Management Unit has no expertise to assist the Risk Management Committee.

The Risk Management Committee was established on October 6, 2022. The existence of this committee is one of the Company's strategic steps to enhance business risk mitigation capabilities, optimize resource utilization, improve operational efficiency, and support the formulation of more effective strategies and policies to achieve sustainable business goals and ensure the long-term continuity of the company's operation.

# Charter of the Risk Management Committee

In performing its duties and responsibilities, the Risk Management Committee is guided by the Charter of the Risk Management Committee which was issued on October 27, 2022.

The Charter of the Risk Management Committee covers the following items:

Legal Basis  
Values and Ethics  
Composition and Criteria  
Appointment, Dismissal, and Term of Office  
Orientation and Training Programs  
Duties and Responsibilities  
Meetings  
Performance Appraisal  
Reporting  
Confidentiality  
Prohibitions  
Sanctions

In accordance with the Charter of the Risk Management Committee, the Risk Management Committee is expected to carry out its duties and responsibilities properly and effectively.

Piagam Komite Manajemen Risiko telah dipublikasikan di situs web Perseroan dan akan ditinjau secaraBERkala sesuai kebutuhan.

The Charter of the Risk Management Committee has been published on the Company's website and will be reviewed periodically as necessary.

# Tugas, Wewenang, dan Tanggung Jawab Komite Manajemen Risiko

Tugas, wewenang, dan tanggung jawab Komite Manajemen Risiko diatur di dalam Piagam Komite Manajemen Risiko.

menelaah Piagam Komite Manajemen Risiko sesuai dengan kebutuhan dan mengusulkan perubahanya untuk persetujuan Dewan Komisaris  
menelaah kebijakan danystem manajemen risiko Perseroan  
- memantau dan memberikan pensihatan atas kesesuaian antara prinsip/prinsip/kebijakan serta pelaksanaan manajemen risiko Perseroan  
- menelaah aktivitas, struktur organisasi, dan kualifikasi personnel Unit Manajemen Risiko untuk memastikan bahwa Unit Manajemen Risiko dapat bekerja secara independen, efektif, objektif, dan memiliki sumber daya yang memadai - dengan mempertimbangkan risiko dan peluang keberlanjutan usaha yang material - untuk melaksanakan fungsi sesuai dengan standar yang berlaku  
- menelaah dan memberikan saran/masukan atas program kerja manajemen risiko tahunan yang disusun oleh Unit Manajemen Risiko  
- seksuariang kiputan tercemar, dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/atau dan/ata  
- melakukan konordinasi dengan Komite Audit untuk memastikan kepadasystem manajemen risiko telah mencaku risiko utama yang telah menjadiperhatian Komite Audit  
- memastikan bahwa Perseroan beroperasi dalam tingkat toleransi risiko yang wajar  
- memberikan rekomendasi perbaikan atas proses identifikasi dan penanganan risiko{serta mitigasi risiko Perseroan  
- melaksanan tugas-tugas pengawasan lain sesuai dengan permintaan Dewan Komisaris dan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku

Komite Manajemen Risiko bertanggung jawab befinda Dewan Komisaris dan wajib bertindak secara independen dalam melaksanan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya.

# Duties, Authorities, and Responsibilities of the Risk Management Committee

Duties, authorities, and responsibilities of the Risk Management Committee are stipulated in the Charter of the Risk Management Committee.

# Duties

The Risk Management Committee has, among others, the duty to:

- review the Charter of the Risk Management Committee as necessary and propose updates to the Board of Commissioners for approval  
- review the Company's risk management policies and system  
- monitor and provide advice on the conformity between the principles/policies and the implementation of the Company's risk management  
- review the activities, organizational structure, and qualifications of the Risk Management Unit personnel to ensure that the Risk Management Unit may work independently, effectively, objectively, and has adequate resources - by considering material business continuity risks and opportunities - to carry out its functions in accordance with applicable standards  
- review and provide advice/input on the annual risk management work program prepared by the Risk Management Unit  
- hold regular meetings with the Risk Management Unit to discuss the findings of risk management and/or follow-up actions taken by the Board of Directors on these findings  
- coordinate with the Audit Committee to ensure that the risk management system has covered the main risks that have been a concern of the Audit Committee  
- ensure that the Company operates within a reasonable level of risk tolerance  
- provide recommendations for improvement of the risk identification and handling process as well as the Company's risk mitigation  
- carry out other supervisory duties as requested by the Board of Commissioners and the prevailing laws and regulations

# Authorities

Authorities of the Risk Management Committee, include the following:

- access the Company's documents, data, and information regarding the employees, funds, assets, and other resources relating to the execution of its duties  
- communicate directly with the employees, including the Board of Directors and those who perform the functions of internal control and risk management regarding matters related to duties and responsibilities of the Risk Management Committee  
- provide recommendations for the improvement of performance and supervision to management, based on reports from the Risk Management Unit  
- if necessary, may involve an independent party outside the Risk Management Committee which is required to assist in the execution of the required duties with the written approval from the Board of Commissioners and at the expense of the Company  
- perform other authorities given by the Board of Commissioners and the prevailing laws and regulations

# Responsibilities

The Risk Management Committee is responsible to the Board of Commissioners and shall act independently in carrying out its duties and responsibilities.

# Susunan Komite Manajemen Risiko

Komite Manajemen Risiko terdiri dari sekurang-kurangnya 2 (dua) orang anggota yang bersal dari Komisaris Independen ata pihak luar Perseroan, di mana 1 (satu) orang Komisaris Independen bertindak sebagai ketua.

# Composition of the Risk Management Committee

The members of the Risk Management Committee shall consist of at least 2 (two) members who are either an Independent Commissioner or an external party of the Company, of which 1 (one) Independent Commissioner acts as the chairperson.

Seluruh anggota Komite Manajemen Risiko Perseroan tersebut pihak independen non eksekutif, yang juga menjadi sebagai Komisaris Independen Perseroan. Dengan komposisi ini, Perseroan mengharapkanagar anggota Komite Manajemen Risiko dapat menjalankan fungsinya dengan objektif dan tanpa adanya benturan kepentingan.

Sehubungan dengan berakhirnyaasa jabatan anggota Komite Manajemen Risiko, pada tanggal 25 Juni 2024, Perseroan telah secara resmi menggangkat kembali anggota Komite Manajemen Risiko untukperiode 2024-2029.Informasi terkait pengangkatan susunan Komite Manajemen Risiko ini tetlah diumumkan dalam keterbukaan informasi Perseroan tanggal 26 Juni 2024.

Dengan pengangkatan kembali tersebut, susunan Komite Manajemen Risiko Perseroan telah menjadi berikut:

All members of the Risk Management Committee of the Company are independent non-executive parties, who also serve as the Independent Commissioners of the Company. With this composition, the Company expects that the members of the Risk Management Committee can perform their functions objectively and without any conflict of interest.
