The second line involves risk supervisors, consisting of governance owners and experts in different risk areas. These governance owners and experts develop policies and procedures for managing risk and coordinate an annual risk assessment. More broadly, they also support and monitor the first line.

The third line involves the Internal Audit Unit. The Internal Audit Unit independently evaluates whether the Company's risk management, control, and governance processes are adequate and contribute to the achievement of the Company's objective.

All risks that have the potential to have an undesirable impact on target achievement are managed and monitored by the board of directors of each business line as the first line/risk owner. The board of directors of each business line actively participates in the entire risk management process to manage the management lines under their supervision and discuss the risk profiles in the management meetings of each business line concerned as well as meetings with the Board of Directors of the Company.

Through the three-line model approach, key risks are analyzed and managed according to the Company's risk appetite through the annual strategy process, with a status update provided in the business planning process, while monitoring mitigation progress on an ongoing basis.

Implementing ISO 31000:2018 standard and the three-line model approach is expected to reduce the impact of risk on the Company and support the business sustainability of the Company.

# Risk Management in 2024

In 2024, have been held held 6 (six) meetings with the Risk Management Committee with agenda discussed at the meetings included among others work plan, progress of the work plan, and risk assessment of the Company.

The Company realizes that the businesses it conducts are varied so that the risks faced by one business can be different from the other. The Company's risk profile, therefore, is determined for each business line and the source of its risks. All key risks (assessed to be at high and critical levels) will be taken into account on the Company's risk profile.

The Company engages all employees to play an active role in identifying risks that may be faced by the Company.

The Company analyzes the risk population for aggregation and consolidation to build the risk profile for review and assessment by the Board of Directors. The risk assessment, including the formulation of the response action/mitigation strategy for each key risk, is discussed with the Board of Directors every year.

Risiko utama menunjukan area atau masalah yang perlu menjadi fokus. Dalam hal ini, prioritas diberikan pada strategi aksi/ tanggapan mitigasi yang telah disepadaki. Tim danjadwal diatur untuk memantau kemajuan dan efektivitas masing-masing program mitigasi dalam rapat manajemen tahunan.

Binis Energi  
Energy Business

# 1. Transisi global menuju EBT

Transisi ini membraca dampak yang signifikan terhadap bisnis energia, terutama pertambangan dalam mengurangi jejak emisi karon. Dalam hal ini, Perseroan dan entitas anak telah telah memitigasi dengan melakukan eksplorasi dan pengembangan proyek EBT, speerti tenaga surya dan panas bumi, penyusunan peta jalan menuju carbon netral, dan mencapkan tekologi rendah emisi di operasi utama.

# 2. Dinamika geopolitik dan kondisi makroekonomi global

Perubahan dan ketidakstabilan ini menciptakan ketidakpastian yang berpotensi mencubah arah strategis bisnis entitas anak.

Adaptasi yang cepadan strategis menui daku ini untuk menua dava saing dan keberlianiutan bisnis di tengah intensitas

Adaptive yang sepat dan strategis mengkar nantu in persaingan pasar internasian yang terus meningkat.

# 1. Global transition to NRE

This transition has a significant impact on the energy business, especially mining in reducing the carbon emission footprint. In

this regard, the Company and its subsidiaries have mitigated this by exploring and developing NRE projects, such as solar and

geothermal power , creating a roadmap towards carbon neutrality , and implementing low-emission technologies in the main

goothermal power, creating a record map towards carbon stock operations.

business. Rapid and strategic adaptation becomes the key to maintaining competitiveness and business sustainability amid

sensitivity to customer needs , differentiating and innovating services and products , improving operational cost efficiency

adjusting strategies and market segmentation, and increasing market penetration.

The speed of adopting technological advancements poses a challenge for subsidiaries in the technology business, leading

to financial impacts as well as the creation of improved and faster internet connectivity quality. The subsidiaries have taken

mitigation steps by investing in cutting-edge technology, both in the main network paths, supporting networks, and customer-

Entitas anak dalam hal ini merespon dengan makukanan diferensiasi dan peningkatan mutu Produk, menckatkan efisiensi biaya operasional, memperlus cakupan penjuan.

# 1. Business Competition

Intense business competition also occurs in the fertilizer and chemical trading business, where price wars are one of the common risk factors that can lead to a loss of market share. The subsidiary, in this case, responds by implementing product differentiation and quality enhancement, improving operational cost efficiency, and expanding sales coverage.

# 2. Fluctuations in Commodity Price

The volatility of raw material prices and reliance on imports has become one of the main challenges faced by the subsidiaries that can hinder operational continuity and profitability. To manage these risks, the subsidiary adopts hedging strategies, diversifies raw material sources and suppliers, and optimizes the supply chain to mitigate the impact of price volatility on production costs.

# Deskripsi

Perseroan dan entitas anak mencayaranggulangan dampak pemanasan global yang disebabkan oleh emisi karbon sebagai bagian dari efek rumah kaca. Sebagai pentuk dukungan terhadap komitmen pemerintah dalam menurunkan emisi gas rumah kaca sebesar  $29\%$  pada tahun 2030, sebagaimana tercantum dalam Nationally Determined Contribution (NDC) Indonesia, Perseroan dan entitas tidak mengintegrasikan prinsip keberlanjutan ke dalam strategi bisnis yang lebih ramah lingkungan dengan makukan langkah - langkah transformasi sebagai berikut:

1. Eksplorasi dan pengembangan projek EBT,seperti tenaga surya dan panas bumi, guna mendukung target bauran EBT nasional sebesar  $23\%$  pada tahun 2025  
2. Penyusunan peta jalan menuju karbon netral (carbon neutrality roadmap) dengan dukungan tenaga ahli dan konsultan independen  
3. Penerapan tekologi rendah emisi di operasi utama, optimalisi efisiensi energi, dan program pemanfaatan kembali limbah industri

# Mitigasi

1. Penggunaan Energi Ramah Lingkungan

a. Memanfaatkan energia alternatif, speerti biodiesel B35, untuk mengurangi konsumsi bahan bakar fosil  
b. Mengintegrasikan tekologi fotovoltaik surya dalam operasional untuk menc Gatkan efisiensi energi sekaliqus mencekan emisi karbon

2. Pengelolaan Limbah Padat

a. Mengolah sampah organik menjadi kompos  
b. Memanfaatkan sampah anorganik sebagai bahan baku untuk Produksi pellet yang dapat digunakan sebagai sumber energia alternatif

3. Pengelolaan Kualitas Udara

Mengadopsi tekologi untuk mengurangi emisi pescemar udara dan menjaga kualitas udara di sekitar area operasional

4. Pengelolaan Sumber Daya Air dan Limbah Cair

a. Menerapkan kebikan dan program pengelolaan air untuk memastikan efisiensi sumber daya air  
b. Mengolah limbah cair agar memenuhi standar lingkungan sebelum dibuang atau digunakan kembali

5. Pengelolaan dan Rehabilitasi Lahan

Berkomitmen untuk melaksanakan rehabilitasi dan reklamasi lahana guna mencegah pencemeran, erosi, dan risiko tanah longsor, sehingga mendukung keberlanjutan ekosistem lokal

6. Pengembangan Bisnis EBT

a. Membuka peluangbaru di bisnis EBT dengan membranungfasilitas sabrik serta menjajaki bisnis perdagangan fotovoltaik surya  
b. Melakukan pengembangan bisnis energia panas bumi pada area-area strategis

# Description

The Company and its subsidiaries recognize the importance of addressing the impact of global warming caused by carbon emissions as part of the greenhouse effect. As a form of support for the government's commitment to reducing greenhouse gas emissions by  $29\%$  by 2030, as outlined in Indonesia's Nationally Determined Contribution (NDC), the Company and its subsidiaries have integrated sustainability principles into a more environmentally friendly business strategy by taking the following transformative steps:

1. Exploring and developing NRE projects, such as solar and geothermal energy, to support the national NRE mix target of  $23\%$  by 2025  
2. developing a carbon neutrality roadmap with the assistance of experts and independent consultants  
3. implementing low-emission technologies in the main operations, optimizing energy efficiency, and launching programs for reusing industrial waste

# Mitigation

1. Use of Environmentally Friendly Energy

a. Utilizing alternative energy, such as B35 biodiesel, to reduce fossil fuel consumption  
b. Integrating solar photovoltaic technology into operations to enhance energy efficiency and reduce carbon emissions

2. Solid Waste Management:

a. Processing organic waste into compost  
b. Utilizing inorganic waste as raw material for pellet production that can be used as an alternative energy source

3. Air Quality Management

Adopting technology to reduce air pollutant emissions and maintain air quality around operational areas

4. Water Resources and Liquid Waste Management:

a. Implementing policies and programs for water management to ensure water resource efficiency  
b. Treating liquid waste to meet environmental standards before disposal or reuse

5. Land Management and Rehabilitation

Committed to implementing land rehabilitation and reclamation to prevent pollution, erosion, and landslide risks, thereby supporting the sustainability of local ecosystems

6. Development of NRE Business

a. Exploring new opportunities in the NRE business by building plant facilities and exploring the solar photovoltaic trading business  
b. Developing geothermal energy businesses in strategic areas

# Risiko Ekonomi Makro / Macro Economic Risk

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/a30f18382d17588746b81eb816f4fb3fc1235f07df04c3927436bf51055bcbe0.jpg)  
Bisnis Energi Energy Business

# Penurunan hora komoditas batubara

Harga batu bara mengalami penurunan sepanjang tahun 2024 yang disebabkan oleh turunnya permintaan dan adanya perubahan arah kebikan lingkungan di menjadi negara tujuan ekspor. Dalam konteks tersebut, entitas anak makukutan pemantuan aktif terhadap dinamika ekonomi global, termasuk harga komoditas, nilai tutar mata uang, dan tren siku bunga, untuk memastikan respon yang cepat dan tepat dalam strategi bisnis.

# The decline in coal commodity prices

Coal prices have been declining throughout 2024 due to reduced demand and changes in environmental policy direction in several export destination countries. In this context, the subsidiary actively monitors global economic dynamics, including commodity prices, exchange rates, and interest rate trends, to ensure a quick and accurate response in its business strategy.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/475d2a13d7ddce53da472fcb7b563a4075e681bc932094d0cdef61b7c74fe636.jpg)  
Bisnis Teknologi Technology Business

# Peningkatan kurs mata uang asing dan suku bunga

Seiring dengan ekspansi bisinis yang ditargetkan, makatentasanak memiliki posisi pinjaman untuk mendukung rencana strategis perusahaan maupun kegiatan operasionalya. Peningkatan kurs mata ang asing maupun tingkat siku bunga merupakan beschaperapa faktor yang berpengaruh signifikan terhadap operasionl entitas anak. Untuk utu entitas anak telah menuyusun strategi mitigasi yang efektif dengan menerapkan lindung nilai tukar mata ang asing, selain utu entitas anaknya melakukan tinjauan atas struktur pinjaman dan melakukan negosiasi/restrukturisi pinjaman jika terjadi tren kaikan siku bunga agar biaya pendanaan dapat terkendali.

# Increase in foreign exchange rates and interest rates

In line with the targeted business expansion, the subsidiary has loan positions to support the company's strategic plans and operational activities. The increase in foreign exchange rates and interest rates are some of the factors that significantly impact the subsidiary's operations. Therefore, the subsidiary has developed an effective mitigation strategy by implementing foreign exchange hedging. Additionally, the subsidiary reviews its loan structure and engages in loan negotiations/restructuring in the event of rising interest rates to keep funding costs under control.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/799ce330808110c2caf092bb9fb9857003dfb285d71ca238bb77d54eda13cfde.jpg)  
Binis Bahan Kimia Chemicals Business

# Ketidakstabilanongakomoditasdankondisi ekonomi

Volatilitas hora komoditas global, keterguntan pada impor bahan baku, serta dampak fluktuasi nilai tukar mata uang menjadi tantangan utama bagi entitas anak dalam menghadapi kompetisi di相对较 sebagai mitigasi, entitas anak telah melakukan lindung nilai tukar mata uang asing untuk meminimalkan risiko fluktuasi terhadap biaya impor bahan baku dan transaksi dalam mata uang asinganya mengembangkan strategi diversifikasi相对较 mengurangi keterguntan terhadap kondisi ekonomi di相对较 tendentu.

# The instability of commodity prices and economic conditions

The volatility of global commodity prices, dependence on raw material imports, and the impact of currency exchange rate fluctuations have become major challenges for the subsidiaries in facing competition in the market. As a mitigation measure, the subsidiary has implemented foreign exchange hedging to minimize the risk of fluctuations in raw material import costs and transactions in foreign currencies, as well as developed market and product diversification strategies to reduce dependence on economic conditions in specific markets.

# Bisnis Teknologi

Technology Business

Ancaman keamanan merupakan tantangan besides dalam menjagak keamanan dan integritas asset digital yang dapat mengakibatkan kebocoran data, kerugianancialsial, kerusakan reputasi, serta gangguan terhadap kelancaran operational. Perseroan dan entitasapan potensi gangguan yang dapat memengaruhi keberlangsungan operational, melalui beschapa cara berikut:

1. Menjaga dan mengelola kualitas keamanan informasi, systemd, jaringan dan perlinungan data secara komprehensif, yang salah setunya dibuktikan dengan telah dilakukanya desertifikasi systemd manajemen keamanan informasi seksu termutakhir (ISO 27001: 2022)  
2. Menerapkan systemd pengelolaan hak akses untuk meminimalkan risiko akses tidak sah dan kebocoran data  
3. Melakukan sosialisasi dan pelatihan berkala bagi karyawan untuk mencatingkatan kesadaran dan kesiapan menghadapi ancaman siber

Security threats pose significant challenges in safeguarding the integrity of digital assets, potentially resulting in data breaches, financial losses, reputational damage, and operational disruptions. The Company and its subsidiaries are committed to continuously maintaining and enhancing digital resilience while protecting strategic assets from potential disruptions that could impact operational continuity through the following measures:

1. Maintaining and comprehensively managing the quality of information security, systems, networks, and data protection, demonstrated by the re-certification of the information security management system using the latest version (ISO 27001: 2022)  
2. Implementing an access rights management system to minimize risks of unauthorized access and data breaches  
3. Conducting regular campaigns and training sessions for employees to enhance readiness and awareness in addressing cyber threats

Ketidakpatuhan terhadap UU PDP dapat Memberebabkan sanksi hukum dan administrasi, kehilangan kepercayaan pelanggan, dan penurunan reputasi. Perseroan dan entitas akan secara aktif melakukan komunikasi dengan konsultan dan grup usaha lainnya, menuusun kebikan terkait dengan pemenuhan kewajiban yang dipersyaratkan dalam UU PDP,serta melakukan kajian atas tersebut kebujanan tersebut pada masing-masing entitasannya. Selainitu entitas tidak juga telah melakukan pembaharuan ISO27001:2022 sebagai pentuk penguatan atas pelindinguan data pribadi.

The enactment of the Personal Data Protection Law (PDP Law) adds complexity to compliance requirements related to personal data protection. Non-compliance with the PDP Law may result in legal and administrative sanctions, loss of customer trust, and reputational damage. The Company and its subsidiaries actively engage with consultants and other business groups to develop policies that meet the requirements mandated by the PDP Law and conduct reviews on the implementation of these policies across each subsidiary. Additionally, the subsidiaries have updated their ISO 27001:2022 certification as a measure to strengthen personal data protection.

The unsatisfactory performance of contractors and/or suppliers remains a key challenge across all businesses of the Company and its subsidiaries. This risk arises from the potential discrepancies in delivery timelines, the quality of goods and/or services, and non-compliance with established standards, which can lead to increased costs, a high churn rate, and damage to the company's reputation. 2. Menerapkan transformasi digital untuk memantau dan menganalisis profil pelanggan, termasuk identifikasi pelanggan yang berhenti menc gunakan layanan,serta mencambil langkah strategis untuk menarik kembali pelanggan tersebut

Langkah-langkah tersebut diharapkan dapat mencatkan penetrasi相对较 dar memastikan keberlanjutan bisnis.

The inability to maintain product and service quality can hinder the business growth of the subsidiary. To address this risk, the subsidiary takes the following measures:

1. Ensuring customer satisfaction by improving product and service quality and responding proactively to customer complaints in accordance with the applicable service level agreement (SLA)  
2. Implementing digital transformation to monitor and analyze customer profiles, including identifying customers who have discontinued services, and taking strategic steps to win them back  
These measures are expected to enhance market penetration and ensure business sustainability.

Chemicals Business

Kegalan dalam menghasilkan Produk atau layanan inovatif yang sesuai dengan kebutuhanasar dan ketergantungan penjalan kepada piah kerabesi menimbulkan risiko yang dapat memengaruhi stabilitas pendapatan. Entitas anak makukan strategi mitigasi dengan langkah-langkah sebagai berikut:

1. Melakukan riset pasar secara mendalam dan menghadiri seminar kerait inovasi Produk dan layanan untuk memastikan pemenuhan kebutuhan pelanggan  
2. Meningkatkan diversifikasi pelanggan untuk mengurangi ketergantungan pada pihak berelasi  
3. Melakukan analisis tidak terdapatkan strategi penetapan dengan yang kompetitif

Entitas anak terus berkomitmen untuk mencatingkatkan efektivitas penjalan dan mempertahankan pertumbuhan yang berkelanjutan.

Failure to produce innovative products or services that meet market demands, and dependence on sales to related parties, poses risks that can affect revenue stability. The subsidiaries implement mitigation strategies through the following measures:

1. Conducting in-depth market research and attending seminars on product and service innovation to ensure customer needs are met

2. Increasing customer diversification to reduce dependency on related parties  
3. Performing regular price analysis to establish competitive pricing strategies  
The subsidiaries are committed to enhancing sales effectiveness and maintaining sustainable growth.

# Umum

Risiko biaya Produksi memiliki pengaruh signifikan terhadap profabilitas di seluruh bisnis Perseroan. Risiko ini terutama dipengaruhi oleh faktor-faktor makroekonomi, yang memberikan dampak berbeda pada masing-masing bisnis.

# General

Production cost risk has a significant impact on profitability across all of the Company's business. This risk is primarily influenced by macroeconomic factors, which have different impacts on each business.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/db631c29d4041ed498780b179f573771098d399466841c61f782277ce9727005.jpg)  
Bisnis Teknologi  
Technology Business

Risiko biaya Produksi dalam bisnis technologi berhasil diturunkan dari tingkatan tinggi ke tingkat menengah pada tahun 2024, berkat langkah-langkah mitigasi yang efektifseperti pemetaan dan evaluasi biaya untuk pemasok roll-out, maklukan negosiasi strategis dengan pemasok utama untuk mendapatkan pengurangan biaya bandwidth, dan mengoptimalisi kasitas kabel serat optik.

The production cost risk in the technology business was successfully reduced from a high to a medium level in 2024, resulting from effective mitigation measures such as mapping and evaluation costs for roll-out suppliers, conducting strategic negotiations with key suppliers to achieve bandwidth cost reduction, and optimizing fiber optic cable capacity.

Chemicals Business

Fluktuasi hora komoditas global为主线 memberikan tekanan pada margin keuntungan dan mengganggu perencanaan keuangan serta operational entities anak pada tahun 2024. Untuk menghadapi tantangan ini, entities anak fokus untuk melakukan optimalisi rantai pasokan untuk mencapatkan efisiensi logistik, memantau hora komoditas global secara aktif sebagai dasar pengambilan keputusan strategis, serta makelakan diversifikasi pemasok untuk mengurangi kepada gantangan pada tahun sumber utama. Semua langkah ini diharapkan dapat mencapatkan ketahanan bisnis terhadap fluktuai biaya yang tinggi.

Fluctuations in global commodity prices are still felt to put pressure on profit margins and disrupt financial and operational planning for subsidiaries in 2024. To address these challenges, the subsidiaries are focusing on optimizing the supply chain to improve logistics efficiency, actively monitoring global commodity prices as a basis for strategic decision-making, and diversifying suppliers to reduce reliance on a single primary source. These steps are expected to enhance the business' resilience against high- cost fluctuations.

# Sekretaris Perusahaan

Corporate Secretary

Sekretaris Perusahaan merupakan individu atau pihak yang ditunjuk untuk menjalankan fungsi kesekretariatan perusahaan, baik sebagai pejabat perseorangan maupun menjadi penanggung jawab unit kerja yang memiliki fungsi tersebut. Sekretaris Perusahaan memiliki peran strategis dalam memastikan kelancaran koordinasi internal antar organ Perseroan, berfungsi sebagai penghubung antara Perseroan dengan pemangku kepentingan eksternal,{serta berperan aktif dalam memastikan kepadahan Perseroan terhadap ketentuan peraturan perdang-undangan yang berlaku dan;penerapan prinsip-prinsip GCG di Perseroan.

Pengangkatan dan pemberhentian Sekretaris Perusahaan dilakukan berdasarkan keputusan Direksi, di mana Sekretaris Perusahaan bertanggung jawab langsung kepada Direksi dalam pelaksanaan tugas dan fungsinya.

# Piagam Sekretaris Perusahaan

Dalam melaksanakan tugas dan tanggung jawabnya, Sekretaris Perusahaan berpedoman kepada Piagam Sekretaris Perusahaan yang telah disahkan oleh Direksi pada tanggal 14 Agustus 2017. Piagam Sekretaris Perusahaan ini dibuat dengan berlandaskan pada Peraturan OJK No. 35/POJK.04/2014 tersebut Sekretaris Perusahaan Emiten atas Perusahaan Publik.

Piagam Sekretaris Perusaan memuat hal-hal sebagai berikut:

Landasan Hukum  
Nilai dan Etika  
Kriteria  
Pengangkatan dan Pemberhentian  
Fungsi, Tugas, dan Tanggung Jawab  
- Pengembangan  
Pelaporan  
Larangan

Dengan berpedoman pada Piagam Sekretaris Perusahaan, Sekretaris Perusahaan diharapkan menjalankan seluruh tugas dan tanggung jawabnya secara efisien, transparan, akuntabel, ada independen, sesuai dengan ketentuan peraturan perundangan yang berlaku serta prinsip-prinsip GCG.

Piagam Sekretaris Perusahaan telah dipublikasikan melalui situs web resmi Perseroan dan akan ditinjau seda disempurnakan secara Berkala seksuai kebutuhan dan perkembangan peraturan yang berlaku.

The Corporate Secretary is an individual or party appointed to conduct the company's secretarial functions, either as an individual officer or as the work unit with that function. The Corporate Secretary plays a strategic role in ensuring smooth internal coordination among the Company's organs, serves as a liaison between the Company and external stakeholders, as well as actively ensures the Company's compliance with prevailing laws and regulations as well as the implementation of GCG principles within the Company.

The appointment and dismissal of the Corporate Secretary are based on the decision of the Board of Directors. The Corporate Secretary is directly responsible to the Board of Directors for implementing their duties and functions.

# Charter of Corporate Secretary

In performing its duties and responsibilities, the Corporate Secretary is guided by the Charter of Corporate Secretary, which was approved by the Board of Directors on August 14, 2017. This Charter of Corporate Secretary was prepared based on OJK Regulation No. 35/POJK.04/2014 on Corporate Secretary of Issuers or Public Companies.

The Charter of Corporate Secretary covers the following items:

Legal Basis  
Values and Ethics  
Criteria  
Appointment and Dismissal  
Duties, Authorities, and Responsibilities  
Development  
Reporting  
Prohibitions

According to the Charter of Corporate Secretary, the Corporate Secretary is expected to carry out all duties and responsibilities in an efficient, transparent, accountable, and independent manner, in accordance with prevailing laws and regulations as well as the principles of GCG.

The Charter of Corporate Secretary has been published on the Company's official website and will be periodically reviewed and updated as necessary in line with regulatory developments and the Company's needs.

The duties and responsibilities of the Corporate Secretary are stipulated in the Charter of the Corporate Secretary.

a. managing the duties and roles as a liaison between the Company and stakeholders, especially shareholders, capital market authorities, and the community, by prevailing laws and regulations to enhance the Company's services to stakeholders in relation to the Company.  
b. ensuring that actions taken by the Company, including all members of the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners, are consistent with the Company's Articles of Association, Company's Values, relevant rules and regulations, and good corporate governance guidelines. [ACGS E.3.7.]  
c. maintaining the balance of rights and obligations between shareholders, the Board of Directors, the Board of Commissioners, and other stakeholders to achieve the Company's objectives. [ACGS E.3.7.]  
d. monitoring the development of the capital market, particularly in relation to capital market laws and regulations and advising such developments to the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners. [ACGS E.3.7.]  
e. managing the register of shareholders, in collaboration with the Company's Share Registrar.  
f. assisting the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners in implementing good corporate governance, which includes: [ACGS E.3.7.]

i. disclosure of the relevant information regarding the Company's business, corporate actions, material transactions, or affiliated transactions to the public and capital market authority, including the availability of information on the Company's website.  
ii. submission of financial statements and annual report to Indonesia Financial Services Authority and Indonesia Stock Exchange in timely manner.  
iii. organizing and documenting the GMS and the Public Expose in accordance with applicable regulations in the capital market.  
iv. organizing and documenting the meetings of the Board of Directors and the Board of Commissioners.  
v. organizing corporate orientation programs for the new members of the Board of Directors and/or the Board of Commissioners.

# Peningkatan Kompetensi bagi Sekretaris Perusahaan

Sekretaris Perusahaan ditunjut untuk memiliki pengetahuan dan pemahaman dalam bidang hukum, keuangan, dan tata kelola perusahaan. Untuk membantu penguatan pemahaman dan kompetensi Sekretaris Perusahaan, Perseroan mendukung Sekretaris Perusahaan untuk aktif dalam mengikuti lokakarya/ pelatihan/seminar yang relevant dan bermanfaat untuk mengembangkan kompetensinya, terutama dalam hal;penerapan GCG di dalam Perseroan, dengan memerhatikan praktik terbaik yang berlaku pada asosiasi profesi baik di tingkat nasional maupun internasional. The Company understands that the Corporate Secretary is required to have knowledge and understanding in the fields of law, finance, and corporate governance. # Keterbukaan Informasi

Information Disclosure

Perseroan senantiasa berupaya seksutu, dan mudah diakses oleh seluruh pemangku kepentingan.

Merujuk kepada peraturan di bidang pagar modal, kepatuhan, kewajiban pelaporan, dan/atau keterbukaan informasi untuk entitas tidak yang bukan merupakan perusahaan terbuka dan laporan keuangannya dikonsolidasikan dengan Perseroan, dilakukan oleh Perseroan. Sementara itu, pelaporan dan/atau keterbukaan informasi untuk entitas tidak yang merupakan perusahaan terbuka dan laporan keuangannya dikonsolidasikan dengan Perseroan, dilakukan oleh entitas tidak yang merupakan perusahaan terbuka yang bersangkutan. Fungsi kepadahan Perseroan secara Berkala berkoordinasi dengan fungsi-fungsi yang relevant di entitas tidak untuk memastikan pemenuhan kewajiban kepadahan Perseroan dan/atau entitas tidak yang terintegrasi.

The Company always seeks to disclose information that is accurate, timely, and easily accessible to all stakeholders.

Referring to regulations in the capital market sector, compliance, reporting obligations, and/or information disclosure for subsidiaries that are not public companies and whose financial statements are consolidated with the Company, are carried out by the Company. Meanwhile, the reporting and/or disclosure of information for the subsidiary that is a public company and whose financial statements are consolidated with the Company, are carried out by the relevant public company subsidiary. The compliance function of the Company periodically coordinates with relevant functions in the subsidiaries to ensure the fulfillment of compliance obligations of the Company and/or the integrated subsidiaries.

# Compliance and Administrative Sanction

[GRI-2-27-a] [ACGS D.2.6.]

Adhering to the Company's Code of Conduct and Sustainability Values, the Company's management always seeks to ensure that

Perseroan menjalankan GCG dengan beretika, akuntabel, transparan,serta dengan memperhatikan kewajaran untuk menjaga keberlanjutan usaha.

Perseroan dan entitas anak Perseroan<serta Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Perseroan dan entitas tersebut menerima laporan atas pelanggaran dan/atau ketidakpatuhan lain yang dilakukan oleh Perseroan dan entitas tersebut Dewan Komisaris dan Direksi Perseroan dan entitas tersebut terhadap peraturanasar modal dan/ atau kalalian untuk hal-hal material yang mempengaruhiarga saham dan kelangsungan usaha Perseroan dan entitas anak. Perseroan dan entitas tersebut tidak melakukan pelanggaran dan/ atau ketidakpatuhan terhadap peraturan yang erkait dengan isuketenagakerjaan, konsumen, perselisihan, komersial, kompetisi, dan lingkungan hidup. Perseroan tidak terlibat dalam aktivitas pemasaran dan komunikasi yang memberikan citra palsu tersebut keberlanjutan lingkungan pada Produk untuk perusahaan. [ACGS(P)C.2.2.]

# Tantangan di Tahun 2024 dan Komitmen Keberlanjutan

Challenges In 2024 and Sustainability Commitments

Perseroan memahami telah Perseroan memiliki peran yang penting dalam meraih keunggulan ekonomi dan mendukung keberlanjutan sosial dan lingkungan. Oleh karena itu, Perseroan Berkomitmen untuk menjalankan kegiatan bisnisnya secara bertanggung jawab, berhari-hati, dan terbuka.

Perseroan berpegang pada konsep Double Materialityagar dampak kegiatan internal Perseroan dan entitas akan terhadap lingkungan, masyarakat, dan ekonomi (dampak inside-out) sejalan dengan dampak yang ditimbulkan oleh faktor eksternal terhadap kinerja keuangan Perseroan (dampak outside-in). Konsep ini memberikan pemahaman kepada dampak dari aktivitas Perseroan dan entitas anak terhadap iklim, bumi, dan masyarakat tidakanya dilihat pada dampak dari sisi internal kegiatan di seluruh rantai pasok, tetapi juga dari bagaimana isu-isu terkait keberlanjutan termasuk perubahan lingkungan (seperti iklim dan kondisi bumi) dapat memengaruhi kinerja keuangan Perseroan dan entitas anak.

Perseroan berharapagar dengankonsepini dampak.   
kerangka kerja yang holistik bagi Perseroan dan entitasanak untuk   
separa proaktif mengidentifikasi dan mengelola keduajenis dampak   
tersebut,guna memastikan pertumbuhan yang berkelanjutan dan   
keberlanjutan nilai perusahaan dalam jangka panjang.

The Company realizes its important role in achieving economic excellence and supporting social and environmental sustainability. Therefore, the Company is committed to carrying out its business activities responsibly, carefully, and honestly.

The Company adheres to the Double Materiality concept so that the impact of the Company's and its subsidiaries' internal activities on the environment, society, and economy (inside-out impact) aligns with the effects caused by external factors on the Company's financial performance (outside-in impact). This concept provides an understanding that the effect of the Company's and its subsidiaries' activities on the climate, earth, and society is not only viewed from the internal activities' impact across the entire supply chain but also from how sustainability-related issues, including environmental changes (such as climate and earth condition), can affect the financial performance of the Company and its subsidiaries.

The Company expects that this concept can provide a holistic framework for the Company and its subsidiaries to proactively identify and manage both types of impacts, ensuring sustainable growth and the long-term sustainability of the company's value.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/11d4c5f742b41240408c1e00105b8de9fb04f5a84378f6a5e8d470ac62b99f51.jpg)

Berupaya untuk senantiasa menghormati hak dan membina hubungan baik dengan para pemangku kepentingan ada menerapkan praktik-praktik terbaik untuk mewujudkan komitmen TJSL Perseroan, Perseroan juga berpedoman pada pendekatan Triple Bottom Line (people, planet, dan profit), 7 (tujuh) subjek ini ISO 26000, seda kebjikan dan peraturan perundang-undangan yang berlaku.

Perseroan memahami telah dengan bisnis yang beragam dan tersebut di berbagai wilayah di Indonesia, program-program TJSL dan pengerapan prinsip keberlanjutan Perseroan perlu disesuaikan dan dikembangkan dengan harapan dan kebutuhan dari setiap wilayah. Untuk mendukung komitmen tersebut, Perseroan senantiasa berupaya mencatkan kompetensi SDM di berbagai lini bisnis dan tingkat organisasi melalui program-program pengembangan kompetensi keberlanjutan dengan tujuan untuk memberikan kontribusi nyata dalam mengembangkan program-program TJSL jangka panjang menuju kemandirian. [GRI-3-3-a]

Seeking to always respect rights and foster good relationships with stakeholders, as well as implementing best practices to realize the Company's CSER commitment, the Company also adheres to the Triple Bottom Line approach (people, planet, and profit), the 7 (seven) core subjects of ISO 26000, as well as the applicable policies and regulations.

The Company understands that with its diverse businesses spread across various regions in Indonesia, CSER programs and the implementation of the Company's sustainability principles need to be developed and adjusted to the expectations and needs of each region. To support such commitment, the Company consistently seeks to enhance HR competencies across various business lines and organizational levels through sustainable competency development programs aimed at making a real contribution to the development of long-term CSER programs toward self-sufficiency.

# Strategi Keberlanjutan

# Sustainability Strategy

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/d3e6b2d079d09ba3572be90898e59343c57e8ec02ac0894a5daa2d5b1a161e91.jpg)

Untuk menciptakan kerangka kerja yang kokoh yang dapat mendukung pertumbuhan jangka panjang yang berkelanjutan dan bertanggung jawab, Perseroan merumuskan strategi keberlanjutan yang terintegrasi dengan visi, misi, dan nilai-nilai keberlanjutan dengan menjad pendaikatan Triple Bottom Line, Double Materiality, dan 8 (delapan) prinsip keuangan berkelanjutan.

To create a robust framework that can support sustainable and responsible long-term growth, the Company formulates its sustainability strategy aligned with its vision, mission, and sustainability values, referring to the Triple Bottom Line, Double Materility, and the 8 (eight) principles of sustainable finance.

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/3f0d0551c087ec42e70e18218d6a78fe6cb75b3056c8f183830466fdfe96cb60.jpg)  
8 Prinsip Keuangan Berkelanjutan  
8 Principles of Sustainable Finance

# 1. Prinsip Investasi Bertanggung Jawab

Perseroan senantiasa berupaya memperhatikan pendekatan investasi keuangana pada projek daninisiatif pembangunan kelikanjutan, produk pelestarian Alam, dan kebikan yang mendukung pembangunan ekonomi berkelanjutan serta meyakini kepada keuntungan investasi jangka panjang tergantung pada system ekonomi, sosial, lingkungan hidup, dan tata kelola.

# 2. Princip Strategi dan Praktik Bisnis Berkelanjutan

Perseroan berüpagaya menetapkan dan menerapkan strategi dan praktik bisnis berkelanjutan pada setiap pengambilan keputusan. Perseroan menekankan pencapaian tujuan jangka panjang dengan strategi dan praktik bisnis dengan memperhatikan visi, misi, struktur organisasi, rencana strategis, SOP, program kerja, dan penggunaan Dana dalam kegiatan beroperasi.

# 3. Prinsip Pengelolaan Risiko Sosial dan Lingkungan Hidup

Perseroan berupaya mengintegrasikan aspek tanggung jawab sosialenta perlindungan dan pengelolaan lingkungan hidup dalam manajemen risiko gunshotardini, mencegah, dan miminimalkam dampak negatif yang timbul akibat eksposur risiko yang kerkit dengan aspek sosial dan lingkungan hidup.

# 4. Prinsip Tata Kelola

Perseroan berupaya menerapkan GCG yang konsisten dan menyeluruh untuk menciptakan system dan struktur perusahaan yang tangguh dan berkelanjutan, yang dapat mendukung Perseroan dalam mencapai visi dan misinya.

# 5. Principip Komunikasi yang Informatif

Perseroan berupaya mencunganan model komunikasi yang tersebut strategi organisasi, tata kelola, kinerja, dan prospek usaha kepada seluruh pemangku kepada orang dans melalui Laporan Tahunan yang di keluarkan oleh Perseroan setiap tahunnya.

# 6. Prinsip Inklusivitas

Perseroan berupaya untuk menjamin ketersediaan dan jangkaan Produk dan/atau jasa dari bisnis Perseroan bagi konsumen dan masyarakat luas dengan menerapan strategi bisnis berkelanjutan.

# 7. Prinsip Pengembangan Sektor Unggulan Prioritas

Perseroan berupaya untuk memperhatikan sektor-sektor Ungulan prioritas yang ditetapkan oleh pemerintah melalui rencana pembangunan jangka mengah dan rencana pembangunan jangka panjang nasional, untuk mendukung pencapaian SDGs.

# 8. Princip Koordinasi dan Kolaborasi

Perseroan berupaya untuk terus menc Gatkan koordinasi dan kolaborasi dengan semua pemangku kepentingan termasuk pemerintah, asosiasi, lembaga, dan lini bisnis yang memiliki program kerja Berkaitan erat dengan implementasi pembangunan berkelanjutan untuk memercepat peningkatan kesejahteraan ekonomi, sosial, dan kualitas lingkungan hidup bagi seluruh pihak.

# 1. Principles of Responsible Investment

The Company seeks to observe the financial investment approach to sustainable development projects and initiatives, nature conservation products, and policies that support sustainable economic development as well as believing that the long-term investment returns depend on the economic, social, environmental, and governance systems.

# 2. Principles of Sustainable Business Strategy and Practices

The Company seeks to establish and implement sustainable business strategies and practices in every decision-making. The Company emphasizes achieving long-term goals with business strategies and practices by considering the vision, mission, organizational structure, strategic plans, SOPs, work programs, and the use of funds in operating activities.

# 3. Principles of Social and Environmental Risk Management

The Company seeks to integrate social responsibility and environmental protection and management aspects in risk management to avoid, prevent, and minimize negative impacts arising from risk exposures related to social and environmental aspects.

# 4. Principles of Governance

The Company seeks to implement consistent and comprehensive GCG to create a strong and sustainable corporate system and structure that can support the Company in achieving its vision and mission.

# 5. Principles of Informative Communication

The Company seeks to use the appropriate communication models related to organizational strategy, governance, performance, and business prospects to all stakeholders, one of which is through the Annual Report issued by the Company annually.

# 6. Principles of Inclusivity

The Company seeks to ensure the availability and range of the Company's business products and/or services for consumers and the wider community by implementing a sustainable business strategy.

# 7. Principles of Priority Sector Development

The Company seeks to take into account the priority leading sectors determined by the government through the medium-term development plan and national long-term development plan, to support the achievement of SDGs.

# 8. Principles of Coordination and Collaboration

The Company seeks to continuously improve coordination and collaboration with all stakeholders including the government, associations, institutions, and work programs of the business units that relate closely to the implementation of sustainable development to accelerate the improvement of economic, social, and environmental quality for all parties.

# Pelibatan Pemangku Kepentingan

# Stakeholders Engagement [GRI 2-25-d] [GRI 2-29-a] [ACGS C.2.1] [ACGS C.2.2].

[GRI 2-25-d] [GRI 2-29-a] [ACGS C.2.1.] [ACGS C.2.2.]

Untuk mengidentifikasi kebutuhan dan harapan dari masing-masing kelompok pemangku kepentingan, Perseroan makukanan proses identifikasi pemangku kepentingan dan pemetaan sosial di sekitar wilayah operasional Perseroan dan entitas tidak secara Berkala. Proses identifikasi dan pemetaan sosial ini dilakukan dengan berpedoman kepada AA1000 Stakeholder Engagement Standard (SES) 2015, tersebut standar global penetapan tolok ukur keterlibatan pemangku kepentingan yang Berkualitas. Perseroan melibatkan para pemangku kepentingan dalam berbagai kegiatan, speerti pertemuan berkala, lokakarya, seminar, serta kegiatan lainnya yang diadakan seksuai kebutuhan.

Perseroan juga aktif memantau perkembangan informasi yang disebarluaskan melalui media cetak atau online dan menindaklanjuti setiap keluhan kepada masukan yang diterima dari para pemangku kepentingan dengan serius. Hasil dari proses identifikasi dan pemetaansosialinimenjadidasarbagiPerseroanuntukmenampung harapan, isu, dan masukan untuk merumuskan program-program TJSL yang lebih tersebut sasan dan sesuai dengan harapan, isu,{serta masukan yang diterima dari para pemangku kepentingan.

[GR3-3-f]

Melalui pelibatan yang intensif ini, Perseroan berharap dapat memperlalam pemahaman tersebut kebutuhan serta harapan para pemangku kepentingan, sekalis mengidentifikasi dan memitigasi potensi risiko dan peluang keberlanjutan yang mungklin timbul, baik bagi Perseroan maupun entitas anak. Perseroan berharap program-program yang dijalankan tidak oleh memberikan manfaat yang dapat mendukung keberlanjutan jangka panjang.

To identify the needs and expectations of each stakeholder group, the Company conducts a stakeholder identification and social mapping process around the operational areas of the Company and its subsidiaries regularly. This social identification and mapping process is carried out in accordance with the AA1000 Stakeholder Engagement Standard (SES) 2015, a global standard for establishing benchmarks for quality stakeholder engagement. The Company involves stakeholders in various activities, such as regular meetings, workshops, seminars, and other activities held as needed.

The Company also actively monitors the dissemination of information through print or online media and seriously follows up on any complaints or feedback received from stakeholders. The results of this social identification and mapping process serve as the basis for the Company to accommodate expectations, issues, and inputs to formulate more targeted and appropriate CSER programs in line with the expectations, issues, and inputs received from stakeholders. [GRI3-3-1]

Through this intensive engagement, the Company expects to deepen its understanding of the needs and expectations of stakeholders, while also identifying and mitigating sustainability risks and opportunities that may arise, both for the Company and its subsidiaries. The Company hopes that the programs implemented not only provide benefits that support long-term sustainability.

# Topik Material [ACGS C.1.1]  
Material Topics [ACGS C.1.1]

Penentuan dan penanganan topik material dapat secara langsung memengaruhi reputasi dan keberlanjutan perusahaan. Oleh karena itu, penentuan dan penanganan topik material yang tersebut sarat penting bagi Perseroan.

Dalam menentukan topik material, Perseroan berpegang pada pelibatan pemangku kepentingan, pemahaman konteks keberlanjutan, pengidentifikasian materialitas isu/topik aktual dan potential, kelengkapan data, dan penetapan prioritas mitigasi atas dampak yang paling signifikan.

The determination and handling of material topics can directly affect the Company's reputation and sustainability. Therefore the determination and handling of material topics are very important for the Company.

In deciding the material topics, the Company adheres to stakeholder engagement, understanding the sustainability context, identifying the materiality of actual and potential issues/topics, completing data, and determining mitigation priorities for the most significant impacts.

Tahapan Penetapan Topik Material

Stages of Determining Material Topics

![](https://cdn-mineru.openxlab.org.cn/result/2025-10-20/c539f125-c234-4332-a3e5-5557d106b0ca/0675ae6b910003b87edc85e2436abdcba16792a36f531c13e3c819054536c180.jpg)

Topik material yang telah ditetapkan pada tahun sebelumnya dievaluasi secara Berkala untuk memastikan kesesuaianya dengan dinamika aktivitas bisnis Perseroan serta perkembangan kondisi eksternal dan tren keberlanjutan yang relevant.

Berdasarkan penelaahan menyeluruh atas topik-topik material, Perseroan sebagai perusahaan induk menetapkan oleh wa topic material untuk tahun 2024 adalah tetap konsisten dengan yang telah ditetapkan pada tahun sebelumnya, karena adalah relevant untuk mencerminkan fokus utama dalam mendukung tujuan keberlanjutan dan pertumbuhan jangka panjang perusahaan. Adapun skala prioritas topik material tersebut adalah menjadi berikut: [GRI 2-14-a]

Material topics that had been determined in the previous year are evaluated periodically to ensure relevance to the dynamics of the Company's business activities as well as the developments in external conditions and relevant sustainability trends.

Based on a comprehensive review of material topics, the Company as the holding company has determined the material topics for 2024 to remain consistent with those determined in the previous years, as they still reflect the main focus in supporting the company's sustainability goals, and long-term growth. The scale of priority for these material topics is as follows: [GRI 2-14-a] [GRI 3-2-a] [GRI 3-2-b]

# Employment, Occupational Health and Safety, and Human Rights [GRI 2-23-a] [GRI 2-25-a] [GRI 403-3] [GRI 404-2] [GRI 405-1] [S-01]

# Policy

Human Rights [GRI 3-3-c] [S-08] [S-09] [S-10]

The Company adheres to the Company's Code of Conduct to implement human rights practices that respect and protect the rights of its stakeholders in all aspects of its operations. This commitment is reflected, among other things, in efforts to create a fair, inclusive work environment that respects the dignity of every individual. The Company seeks to ensure that all employees and business partners of the Company are treated fairly and respectfully, without discrimination based on ethnicity, religion, race, gender, age, and other personal characteristics. The Company also consistently seeks to ensure that there are no human rights

dalam rantai pasokannya, baik terkait dengan pemenuhan standar kerja yang layak, hak-hak buruh, maupun hak-hak masyarakat lokal di tempat operasionalnya.

Terkait pemenuhan hak-hak karyawan, Perseroan secara konsisten berkomitmen untuk menciptakan lingkungan kerja yang adil, inklusif, dan berorientasi pada pengembangan SDM. Perseroan senantiasa berupaya memberikan kesempatan yang setara kepada setupiap orang yang memiliki kompetensi,;karakter, dan etos kerja yang baik untuk mendapatkan pekerjaan, mengibangkan karirnya secara profesional, dan mendapatkan promosi ke jabatan yang lebih tinggi. Perseroan memberikan upah secara adil dan layak, dengan memastikan Bahwa upah yang diberikan kepada karyawan pemula tidak lebih rendah dari UMR yang ditapkan olehan hidup pemerintah. Perseroan juga secara tegas menolak segala;bentuk praktik kerja paksa, eksploitas anak, melarang pemanfaatan tenaga kerja di bawah umur, dan memberlakukan jam kerja seksuai dengan pedoman industri dan standar nasional. Perseroan memberikan kebebasan kepada karyawannya untuk beribadah,bermusyawarah, berserikat, dan Berkumpul seksuai ketentuan undang-undang yang berlaku di Indonesia.

Terkait pemenuhan hak-hak masyarakat di sekitar wilayah operacional Perseroan dan entitas anak, Perseroan senantiasa berupaya memastikan Bahwa kegiatan operationalnya tidak menyebabkan dampak negatif terhadap hak-hak masyarakat lokal di sekitarnya,seperti hak atas tanah,hak atas lingkungan yang sehat, dan hak untuk berpartisipasi dalam proses pengambilan keputusan yang berdampak langsung pada kehidupanmereka. Prinsip inklivitas dan participasi aktif menjadi landasan Perseroan dalam membrangun hubungan harmonis dan berkelanjutan dengan masyarakat sekitar.

Terkait pemenuhan hak-hak konsumen, Perseroan menjung tinggi prinsip integritas dan transparansi. Perseroan senantiasa berupaya memastikan bahwa penghormatan terhadap hak konsumen, termasuk hak untuk mendapatkan privasi, akses terhadap informasi yang akurat dan jelas, dan jaminan atas keamanan dan keselamatan Produk ata layanan yang diferikan.

# Penghargaan Aspek Sosial - Ketenagakerjaan Social - Employment Aspects Awards

Pada tahun 2024, Perseroan melalui entitas anak memperoleh penghargaan atas pencapaian aspek sosial - ketenagakerjaan, sebagai berikut:  
- PT Eka Mas Republik, entitas anak, dengan merk dagang MyRepublic, mendapatkan penghargaan Great Place to Work 2024 dari Great Place to Work Institute. Penghargaan ini mengukur pengalaman karyawan terhadap hubungannya dengan manajemen, koleja, dan pekerjaan; dan merupakan pengakuan global kepada perseuahan-peruahaan yang memiliki budaya tempat kerja dengan kepercayaan dan kinerja tinggi.

Informasi lainnya mengenai SDM Perseroan dapat dilihat pada bagian Profil Perusahaan, sub-bagian Sumber Daya Manusia.

In 2024, the Company through its subsidiaries received awards for achievements in social-employment aspects, as follows:  
- PT Eka Mas Republik, a subsidiary, with the MyRepublic trademark, received the Great Place to Work 2024 award from the Great Place to Work Institute. This award measures an employee's experience of their relationships with management, colleagues, and work; it is a global recognition of companies with a high trust and performance workplace culture.

Other information related to the Company's HR can be seen in the Company Profile section, Human Resources subsection.

The Company is committed to creating a work environment that is free from risks that could endanger the health and safety of its employees.

Untuk mendukung upaya Perseroan dalam menciptakan lingkungan kerja yang aman, nyaman, dan kondusif bagi karyawan, Perseroan menaruh perhatian yang serius terhadap aspek K3, termasuk namun tidak terbatas pada hal-hal sebagai berikut:

- menciptakan budaya kerja yang berfokus pada keselamatan dan pencegahan kecelakaan  
- proaktif dalam mengidentifikasi potensi risiko K3 dan/atau penyakit dan/atau kalalian yang dapat说我ybabkan demotivasi dan defisiensi produktivitas kerja karyawan  
- mengambil langkah-langkah preventif untuk pengurangi kemungkan terjadinya kecelakaan ata cedula, antara lain dengan menetapkan berbagai kebikan K3, tersebut Kebikan Keselamatan Umum Pertambangan dan Lingkungan Hidup (KPLH), Kebikan Kesiapan dan Respons Darurat, Kebikan Kecelakaan, Kebikan HIV/AIDS, dan Kebikan Larangan Penggunaan Obat-Obatan dan Alkohol

To support the Company's efforts in creating a safe, comfortable, and conducive work environment for its employees, the Company pays great attention to OHS, including but not limited to the following:

- create a work culture that focuses on safety and accident prevention  
- proactive in identifying potential OHS risks and/or illness and/ or negligence that can cause demotivation and deficiencies in employee work productivity  
- take preventive steps to reduce the possibility of accidents or injuries, among others by establishing various OHS policies, such as the General Mining Safety and Environment (KPLH) Policy, Emergency Preparedness and Response Policy, Accident Policy, HIV/AIDS Policy, as well as Prohibition of Use of Drugs and Alcohol Policy

system elements: policy, planning, organization and personnel, implementation, monitoring-evaluation-followup, documentation, and management review and performance improvement. - SMKPLH management approach was prepared based on the Plan-Do-Check-Act (PDCA) concept, which is a series of interactive processes implemented by the company to achieve goals and improve performance in a sustainable manner. The PDCA concept is fully implemented for all employees and business partners.  
- BIB implements an OHS system that covers all activities and work areas, from mining activities and areas to supporting activities and areas. All BIB employees are also included in the company's OHS Management System (SMK3). BIB periodically improves SMK3 through various approaches tailored to existing needs, including: management review process, internal audit and external audit process, mining health and safety committee meetings, leading and lagging indicator monitoring process, and work accident/incident evaluation.

- BIB has an emergency preparedness and response policy, which includes the following provisions:

establishment of an OHS Committee to conduct safety committee meetings, safety talks, and management reviews  
establishment of an emergency response team which consists of both BIB's and its contractors' employees [GR] 403-7

- establishment of deployment cards which contain work instructions and procedures for responding to emergency  
- implementation of OHS trainings which includes:

- general trainings such as filing and document control system, first aid, safety leadership, as well as trainings on specific work-related hazardous activities such as slope rescue techniques and case analysis  
- special trainings (certification courses) such as mine supervision, mine surveyors, electrical safety, and basic open pit mine rescue training [GRI 403-5]  
- implementation of routine drills or simulations to deal with emergencies, such as fire management,

kebakaran, serangan jantung, kecelakaan kendaranaan, dan cedera kerja yang serius [GRI 403-5]

- tenerapan metode analysis akar masalah untuk menyelidiki akar penyebab insiden dan menentukan tindakan korektif yang sesuai untuk mencegah terulangnya insiden yang sama [GRI403-2]  
- penyelenggaraan Program Sehari Tanpa Kecelakaan Kerja untuk mencatkan konsistensi antara identifikasi bahaya oleh supervisor dan pelaporan bahaya oleh operator lapangan  
- pelaksanaan manajemen perubahan budaya keselamatan untuk mencxingkatkan budaya keselamatan karyawan dan kontraktor,tera mengubah pola pikir dari "keselamatan telah 'kewajiban" menjadi "keselamatan adalah kebutuhan seluruh karyawan"  
pelaksanaan proyek perbaikan keselamatan untuk tujuan spesifik di pit, jalur pengangkutan, dan operasi pelabuhan  
- penggunaan aplikasi "iSAFE", yaitu systemd pelaporan bahaya daring yang memungkinkan karyawan dan pekerja untuk melaporkan kejadian bahaya terkait pekerjaan, termasuk lokasi, waktu setup laporan, bukti Foto, karyawan, fasilitas, dan peralatan melalui telepon seluler

Seiring pesatnya perkembangan tekologi digital yang semakin mengintegrasi menjadi aspek kehidupan melalui program aplikasi-aplikasi inovatif, BIB secara proaktif memanfaatkan tekologi tersebut but untuk mencxingkatan koordinasi, pengawasan proyek, dan pengambilan keputusan secara real-time. Langkah ini diambil untuk mencoptimalkan efisiensi dan produktivitas kerja di seluruh lini operasional. Untuk mendukung hal ini, BIB telah melengkapi sarana kerja karylawan dengan berbagai platform interaktif yang dapat diakses dengan mudah, antara lain program PETANG (Pemantauan Terperinci Pengawas Tambang), WINE (Work Area Intelligence), MOCA (Monitoring Closing iSAFE), PEGASUS (Pengelolaan Izin Kerja Khusus), SICANTIK (Sistem Camera Analitik), PILAR INDOBARA (Penilaian Kinerja Implementasi Keselamatan Pertambangan), dan INSTING (Indobara Safety Machine Learning).

cardiac arrest, vehicular accidents, and serious work injuries [GRI 403-5]

- implementation of regular safety talks on fatality prevention to increase employees' awareness and safety while in high-risk operational areas [GRI 403-4]  
- application of root cause analysis method to investigate root causes of incidents and to determine the suitable corrective actions to prevent the recurrence of similar incidents [6RI 403-2]  
- implementation of an Accident-Free Work Day Program to improve consistency between hazard identification by supervisors and hazard reporting by field operators  
- implementation of safety culture change management to improve the safety culture of employees and contractors, as well as change the mindset from "safety is an obligation" to "safety is a need for all employees"  
- implementation of safety improvement projects for specific purposes in pits, transportation lines, and port operations  
- use of the "iSAFE" application, which is an online hazard reporting system that allows employees and workers to report occurrences of work-related hazards, including the location, time of each report, photographic evidence, employees, facilities, and equipment via cell phones

With the rapid development of digital technology that increasingly integrates various aspects of life through innovative application programs, BIB proactively utilized this technology to enhance real-time coordination, project supervision, and decision-making. This step is taken to optimize efficiency and productivity across all operational lines. To support this, BIB has equipped employee work facilities with various interactive platforms that can be easily accessed, including the PETANG (Detailed Monitoring of Mine Supervisors), WINE (Work Area Intelligence), MOCA (Monitoring Closing SAFE), PEGASUS (Special Work Permit Management), SICANTIK (Analytical Camera System), PILAR INDOBARA (Mining Safety Implementation Performance Assessment), and INSTING (Indobara Safety Machine Learning) programs.

BIB has a Digital & Technology team to form and develop its mining application system. These applications connect various data spread across operational activities, such as employee data, heavy equipment vehicle unit data, hazard report data, licensing data, and so on. Through this data integration, BIB can improve the accuracy and quality of data, which is one of the foundations for creating and maintaining OHS.

Beberapa program lain yang telah dilaksanan oleh BIB untuk menc Gatkan K3 adalah sebagai berikut:

-peningkatan pengelolaan kinerja kontraktor melalui tenerapan system penilaian kontraktor berdasarkan aspek Good Mining Practices dan pengembangan aplikasi CMS (Contractor Management System)untuk mencatkan kualitas pemantuaan perizinan usaha, kompetensi, dan pelaporan mitra kerja  
- peningkatan budaya keselamatan melalui pelaksanaan program SEKATA (Safety Kita) yang berisiinisiatif-inisiatif project charter perbaikan perilaku karyawan  
- peninjauan prosedur keselamatan secara berkesinambungan untuk menemukan kekurangan dan melakukan perbaikan berdasarkan pengamatan lapangan atas rekomendasi dari investigasi insiden

Perseroan说我kini oleh keberHASIN dalam menciptakan lingkungan kerja yang aman, sehat, danprodukift tidak dapat dibapai tanpa keterlibatan aktif dari seluruh insan Perseroan. Oleh karena itu, komitmen terhadap pelaksanaan fungsi K3 perludilaksanan di seluruh unit kerja agar menjadi bagian integral dari budaya operasional. Di BIB, pengawasan tertinggi terhadap pelaksanaan K3 dipegang oleh Kepala Teknik Tambang yang telah memiliki sertifikasi resmi sebagai Pengawas Operasi Utama dari Kementerian ESDM melalui Direktur Teknik dan Lingkungan dan Direktur Jenderal Minerba. Kepemimpinan ini diharapkan dapat mendukung terciptanya fondasi yang kuat dalam membranungsystem K3 yang menyeluruh, adaptif, dan berkelanjutan.

Perseroan, melalui entitas anak,CCCCCCA, teknologi dan digitalisasi untuk meminimalisasi risiko keberlanjutan. Command Center di BIB memantau seluruh rantai pasok dari pit tingga ke pelabuhan secara real-time, dengan 26 layar dan 9 pengawas yang mengawasi dura super pit (Girimulya dan Kusan)serta pengangkutan sepanjang  $30~\mathrm{km}$  ke pelabuhan Bunati. Sistem ini terhubung dengan aplikasi in-house perusahaan untuk mencatkan efisiensi operational dan pengambilan keputusan. Penerapan Command Center yang terintegrasi dengan kecertdasan buatan mendukung upaya perusahaan untuk mencatkan Produktivitas dan keselamatan dan mencapai zero fatality dan zero Lost Time Injury Frequency Rate (LTIFR).

Pada tahun 2024, BIB mencatatkan LTIFR untuk karyawan sebesar 0,00.

BIB kembali meraih peringkat proaktif tingkat-4 berdasarkan survei tingkat budaya keselamatan yang dilaksanakan oleh lembaga independen. Pencapaian ini mencerminkan komitmen BIB yang konsisten dan berkelanjutan dalam membranung serta memperkuat budaya keselamatan di seluruh lini operasional perusahaan yang telah berhasil dipertahankan secara berturut-turut-Sejak tahun 2022. Keberhasilan ini juga menjadi indicator bahwa BIB telah mampu menciptakan lingkungan kerja yang tidakanya putuh terhadap regulasi keselamatan, tetapi juga mendorong kesadaran dan participasi aktif kanyakuan dalam menjaga keselamatan sebagai bagian dari nilai dan budaya kerja sehari-hari.

Several other programs that have been implemented by BlB to improve OHS are as follows:

- improve contractor performance management through implementing a contractor assessment system based on Good Mining Practices aspects and developing a CMS (Contractor Management System) application to improve the quality of monitoring business licensing, competency, and reporting of business partners  
- improve safety culture through the implementation of the SEKATA (Our Safety) program which contains project charter initiatives to improve employee behavior  
- continuous review of safety procedures to identify deficiencies and make improvements based on field observations or recommendations from incident investigations

The Company believes that the success in creating a safe, healthy, and productive work environment can not be achieved without the active involvement of all Company personnel. Therefore, the commitment to implementing the OHS function needs to be carried out in all work units so that it becomes an integral part of the operational culture. At BIB, the highest oversight of the implementation of OHS is held by the Head of Mining Engineering who has official certification as the Main Operations Supervisor from the Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources through the Director of Engineering and Environment and the Director General of Mineral and Coal. This leadership is expected to support the creation of a strong foundation for building a comprehensive, adaptive, and sustainable OHS system.

The Company, through its subsidiaries, integrates technology and digitalization to minimize sustainability risks. The Command Center at BIB monitors the entire supply chain from the pit to the port in real-time, with 26 screens and 9 supervisors overseeing two super pits (Girimulya and Kusan) and the transportation along the  $30\mathrm{km}$  route to Bunati port. This system is connected to the company's in-house application to enhance operational efficiency and decision-making. The implementation of the Command Center integrated with artificial intelligence supports the company's efforts to enhance productivity and safety and achieve zero fatalities and zero Lost Time Injury Frequency Rate (LTIFR).

In 2024, BIB recorded a LTIFR for employees of 0.00.

BIB once again achieved a level-4 proactive rating based on a safety culture survey conducted by an independent institution. This achievement reflects BIB's consistent and sustainable commitment to building and strengthening a safety culture across all operational lines of the company, which has been successfully maintained consecutively since 2022. This success also serves as an indicator that BIB has been able to create a work environment that not only complies with safety regulations but also encourages awareness and active participation of employees in maintaining safety as part of daily work values and culture.

# Sertifikasi dan Penerapan Standar

- Beberapa entitas anak Perseroan telah memperoleh sertifikasi ISO 45001:2018 ingin Sistem Manajemen K3.

Tidak adaNILI yang diferikan untuk pelaksanaan audit ini, namun sertifikat yang diferikan kepada BIB menyatakannidakterdapattemuan signifikan.Perseroan berharap Bahwa dengan penerapan ISO 45001:2018, Perseroan dapat mengurangi cedula dan penyakit akibat kerja di BIB.

# Certifications and Application of Standards

Several of the Company's subsidiaries have obtained ISO 45001:2018 certification regarding OHS Management Systems.  
- BIB, a subsidiary, obtained its ISO 45001:2018 certification in 2018 and has renewed the validity period until November 2027. No score was given for the implementation of the audit, however, the certificate given to BIB stated that there were no significant findings. The Company expects that with the implementation of ISO 45001:2018, the Company can reduce work-related injuries and illnesses at BIB.

- PT Eka Mas Republik, entitas anak, memperoleh sertifikasi ISO 45001:2018 pada tahun 2022 dengan masa berlaku sampai tahun 2025.  
- PT Rolimex Kimia Nusamas, entitas anak, memperoleh sertifikasi ISO 45001:2018 pada tahun 2022 dengan masa berlaku sampai tahun 2026.

# Kebijakan

Sebagai perusaan yang menjunjung tinggi keberlanjutan, Perseroan dan entitas anak Berkomitmen untuk tidakanyak menciptakan nilai ekonomi bagi perusaan, tetapi juga memberikan kontribusi nyata terhadap pembangunan ekonomi dan sosial masayarakat. Komitmen ini antara lain diwujudkan melalui perilatan aktif Perseroan dan entitas akan dalam mendukung pemberdayaan serta mencatingkatan kemandirian dan kesejahteraan masayarakat di sekitar wilayah operasional Perseroan dan entitas anak, dengan prioritas pada masayarakat yang berada di wilayah yang terkena dampak langsung dari kegiatan operasional Perseroan dan/atau entitas tersebut.

Untuk memperkuat komitmen dalam memberikan kontribusi sosial yang terarah dan berkelanjutan, Perseroan melalui entitiesanedah merancang dan mengimplementasikan 8 (delapan)pilar program TJSL. Program ini dikembangkan secara strukturdatan selaras dengan SDGs serta menjadu pada dengan KeputusanMenteri ESDM No. 1824K/30/MEM/2018 kerkait dengan pelaksanaan program Pengembangan dan Pemberdayaan Masyarakat (PPM).

Kedelapan pilar tersebut mencakup aspek-aspek strategis yang kesemuanya dirancang untuk menjawab tantangan sosial sekaligus membruka peluangbaru bagi pertumbuhan inklusif dan berkeadilan.

- PT Eka Mas Republik, a subsidiary, obtained ISO 45001:2018 certification in 2022 with a validity period until 2025.  
- PT Rolimex Kimia Nusamas, a subsidiary, obtained ISO 45001:2018 certification in 2022 with a validity period until 2026.

- In 2024, BIB received the Aditama Award in Mining Technical Management from ESDM for implementing a good OHS management system.  
In 2024, PT Rolimex Kimia Nusamas, a subsidiary, Surabaya branch, also received an Occupational Safety and Health Management System Certificate of Appreciation from the Minister of Manpower of the Republic of Indonesia with an achievement result of  $90.36\%$  for the advanced level category with 166 (one hundred and sixty-six) criteria valid for 3 (three) years. Meanwhile, the Medan and Palembang branches received scores of  $93.37\%$  and  $92.77\%$  from the audit results conducted by PT Surveyor Indonesia.

During 2024, the Company and its subsidiaries did not receive any report of significant violations related to HR, employment, and OHS.

# Policy

As company that upholds sustainability, the Company and its subsidiaries are committed not only to creating economic value for the company but also to making a tangible contribution to the economic and social development of the communities. This commitment is manifested through the active role of the Company and its subsidiaries in supporting empowerment and enhancing the independence and welfare of communities around the operational areas of the Company and its subsidiaries, with a priority on communities in areas directly affected by the operational activities of the Company and/or its subsidiaries.

To strengthen the commitment to providing targeted and sustainable social contributions, the Company through its subsidiaries has designed and implemented 8 (eight) blueprint pillars as guidelines in planning and implementing the CSER programs. This program is developed in a structured manner and aligned with the SGDs, as well as referring to the Decree of the Minister of ESDM No. 1824K/30/ MEM/2018 related to the implementation of the Community Development and Empowerment program.

The eight pillars encompass strategic aspects, all of which are designed to address social challenges while also opening new opportunities for inclusive and equitable growth.

Seiring dengan pengembangan Usaha, Perseroan berharap dapat memberikan manfaat yang lebih luas kepada masyarakat. [GRI3-3-c]

Along with the development of the Company's business, the Company aspires to provide greater benefits to the communities.

# 2024

Pelatihan Masyarakat Community Training

- BIB tersebut program pendidikan dan pengajaran bagi masyarakat yang berfokus di bidang perikanan, peternakan, peternakan, dan industri rumah tingga.  
- BIB organized education and teaching programs for the communities focusing on the fields of fisheries, livestock, farming, and home industries.

# 2023

- PT Surya Kalimantan Sejati, entitas anak, memberikan pendidikan keterampilan dan keahlian dasar.  
- PROGRAM UNGGULAN (2023): BIB征求意见 program melatihan operator dump truck bagi 100 orang lulusan SMA ata sederajat. BIB memfasilitasi alumni pelatihan untuk mendaftar di mitra-mitra kerja BIB.  
- PROGRAM UNGGULAN (2019): BIB meluncurkan program berkelanjutan untuk memanfaatkan lahan bekas tambang menjad pusat pembelajaran Integrated Farming System (IFS) bagi masyarakat. Pemilihan IFS sebagai topik pembelajaran disesuaikan dengan mayoritas mata pencaharian masyarakat sekitar wilayah tambang BIB.

Saat ini, BIB sedang dalam proses untuk makalkutan pembukaanlahan seluas 4 ha yang akan dimancaftkan sebagai demplot percobaan untuk 20 desa Ring-1. Lahan tersebut akan digunakan sebagai sarana pembelajaran pengerapan IFS, di mana masing-masingNama akan mengirimkan "agen desa" untuk mengelola lahan seluas  $2.000\mathrm{m}^2$  untuk diterapkan kembali di desanya.

- PT Surya Kalimantan Sejati, a subsidiary, provided basic skills and expertise training.  
- LEADING PROGRAM (2023): BIB held a dump truck operator training program for 100 high school graduates or equivalent. BIB then facilitated training alumni to apply for jobs at BIB work partners.  
- LEADING PROGRAM (2019): BIB utilized its ex-mining area as an Integrated Farming System (IFS) community learning center. IFS was chosen as a learning topic in accordance with the majority of people's livelihoods around the BIB mining area.

Currently, BIB is in the process of clearing 4 ha of land which will be used as a trial demonstration plot for 20 villages in Ring-1. This land will be used as a learning plot for implementing IFS, where each village will send a "village agent" to manage  $2,000\mathrm{m}^2$  of land to then be able to oversee the implementation of IFS in their own village.

Pada tahun 2018, Perseroan melalui entitas anak mencunjuk Lembaga Pendidikan Ekonomi dan Masyarakat Fakultas Ekonomi Universitas Indonesia (LPEM FEUI), sebagai pihak independen, untuk mengestimi kesejahteraan masyarakat yang bermukim di desa-desa di lingkar tambang (Ring-1, Ring-2, dan Ring-3), dengan kondisi kesejahteraan masyarakat di sekitar tambang. Dampak akan diukur berdasarkan capaian IPM yang dilakukan menjangan metode social return on investment dengan melibatkan seksua pemangku kepentingan tersebut.

Untuk memastikan optimalisi dampak program pengembangan masyarakat yang telah dilakukan BIB kepada masyarakat di sekitar wilayah operasional BIB dalam siklus 5 (lima) tahun, pada tahun 2023, BIB telah meminta LPEM UI untuk melakukan evaluasi atas program pengembangan masyarakat yang telah diimplementasikan, dengan survei sosial ekonomi masyarakat sekitar tambang yang dilakukan oleh LPEM FEUI pada tahun 2018 sebagai landasan survei. Hasil evaluasi atas dampak dari program pengembangan masyarakat akan dibandingkan dengan target IPM yang ditetapkan sesuai standar nasional. Hasil evaluasi capaian IPM yang telah dilakukan tahun 2023, adalah sebagai berikut:

- Provision of supporting infrastructure for community development programs (construction of floating mosques and Islamic boarding schools)

- Impact: development of the region and the improvement of the living standards of the people of Tanah Bumbu  
- Indicators: provided supporting infrastructure for PPM as a means to improve the quality of life for the people of Tanah Bumbu, in the form of the Floating Mosque as a religious tourism icon and an Islamic boarding school as an educational center in Tanah Bumbu  
Investment costs: Rp6.6 billion

In 2018, the Company through its subsidiary appointed the Institute for Economic and Social Research, Faculty of Economics, University of Indonesia (LPEM FEUI), as an independent party, to estimate the welfare of people living in villages around the mining area (Ring-1, Ring-2, and Ring-3), and the welfare conditions of the community around the mine. The impact was measured based on the achievement of the HDI which was carried out using the social return on investment method involving all relevant stakeholders.

To ensure the optimization of the impact of the community development program that has been carried out by BIB on the communities around the BIB operational area in a 5(five) year cycle, in 2023, BIB asked LPEM UI to evaluate the community development programs that have been implemented, with a socio-economic survey of the communities around the mine conducted by LPEM FEUI in 2018 as the basis for the survey. The results of the evaluation on the impact of the community development program will be compared with the HDI target determined according to national standards. # Tanggung Jawab Produk dan/atau Layanan

[GR2-25-a] ACGS C.4.1

# Kebijakan

Perseroan bergomitmen untuk menawarkan Produk dan/atau layanan yang aman dan berkualitas kepada para pelanggan. Perseroan menjadi fungung tinggi hak pelanggan untuk memperoleh Produk dan/atau layanan yang relevant dengan kebutuhan pelanggan, berkualitas, dan eman. Perseroan mencapasi oleh setup untuk layanan yang dihasikkan untuk ditawarkan oleh Perseroan dan/atau entitas tidakanyak merepresentasikan tidak komersial bagi Perseroan dan entitas tidak, namun juga memiliki tanggung jawab terhadap konsumen, lingkungan, dan masyarakat. Oleh karena itu, Perseroan senantiasa berupaya untuk memastikan bahwa setup untukProduk dan/atau layanan ditawarkan telah melalui proses pengawasan mutu yang ketat, memenuhi standar kualitas tinggi, dan eman digunakan, Seeingga diharapkan tidak memberikan dampak negatif kepada para pelanggan. [GRI3-3-c]

Untuk memastikan terpenuhinya tanggung jawab Produk dan/atau layanan, Perseroan telah menetapkan dan menerapkan kebjakan-kebjakan sebagai berikut:

- memberikan dan berupaya memastikan informasi ingin produk dan/atau layanan dapat tersampaikan dengan baik kepada pelanggan
